K05adsp55-u:2: [f. 215b] atha bhagavān ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:3: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye vā traidhātukāya vā na spṛhayate,
K05adsp55-u:6: pratiśrutkopamān yāvan nirmitopamān eva sarvadharmān vyavalokayati,
K05adsp55-u:7: na ca sākṣātkaroti. idaṃ subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya-avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ
K05adsp55-u:8: veditavyam. punar aparaṃ subhūte saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'py
K05adsp55-u:12: parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dharman deśayantaṃ paśyati,
K05adsp55-u:13: sa tan dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya dharmasya artham ājñāsyāmi iti iti,
K05adsp55-u:15: sāmīcīpratipanno 'nudharmacārī. idam api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiva
K05adsp55-u:16: avaivarkalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato
K05adsp55-u:18: vaihāyasam abhyudgamya bhikṣusaṃghāya dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ (AdSPG I 4)
K05adsp55-u:19: samanvāgataṃ vyāmaprabhām ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi sandarśayantaṃ nirmitāni ca nirmimāṇaṃ
K05adsp55-u:20: yāni nirmitāny anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakaryāṇi kurvanti. idam api subhūte avaivartikasya
K05adsp55-u:21: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. punar aparaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:22: sacet svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nottrasyati na santrasyati na santrāsam āpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:23: grāmaghāte vā vartamāne nagaraghāte vā vartamāne agnidāhe vā vartamāne,
K05adsp55-u:24: vyādamṛgān vā dṛṣṭvā tadanyāni vā cāṇḍālamṛgajātāni dṛṣṭvā,
K05adsp55-u:26: yān vā tadanyāṃ bhayabhairavāṃ saṃtrāsāṃ dṛṣṭvā,
K05adsp55-u:29: mātṛmaraṇaṃ vā pitṛmaraṇaṃ vā bhrātṛmaraṇaṃ vā bhaginīmaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā,
K05adsp55-u:30: mitrajñātisālohitamaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā na śokabhayai bhairavaḥ saṃtrāsa utpādyate. tataś ca svapnāt samanantaraprativibuddhasya sata evaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:32: mayāpy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya svapnopamāḥ sarvatraidhātukadharmā
K05adsp55-u:33: deśayitavyāḥ. idam api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ
K05adsp55-u:34: veditavyam. punar aparaṃ subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyate,
K05adsp55-u:35: yad avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ trayo 'pāyā na bhaviṣyanti?
K05adsp55-u:37: ] mahāsattvo nairayikān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā tiryagyonikān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā yamalaukikān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
K05adsp55-u:38: smṛtipratilabdhasyaivaṃ bhavati tathā kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre (AdSPG I 5)
K05adsp55-u:39: sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ trayo 'pāyā na bhaviṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:41: tathā hi yaś ca svapno yaś ca svapnāntaḥ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram. idam
K05adsp55-u:42: api subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam.
K05adsp55-u:43: punar aparaṃ subhūte saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato vā vibuddho vā
K05adsp55-u:45: ye mayā svapnānataragatena vā vibuddhena vā ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni dṛṣṭāni,
K05adsp55-u:46: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaivartiko veditavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:47: sacet me te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
K05adsp55-u:48: anena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāha upaśāmyatu śītībhavatv astaṃ gacchatu,
K05adsp55-u:51: vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher avaivartikatāyām. sacet punaḥ subhūte so 'gniskandhas tat satyavacanam atikramya gṛhād gṛhaṃ dahaty,
K05adsp55-u:53: anyāni gṛhāni dahaty anyāni gṛhāni na dahaty,
K05adsp55-u:54: anyāḥ rathyā dahaty anyāḥ rathyā na dahati,
K05adsp55-u:55: veditavyaṃ subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmapratyākhyānasaṃvartanīyam
K05adsp55-u:56: ebhiḥ sattvaiḥ karmopacitaṃ yenaiṣāṃ sattvānām ekatyāni gṛhāni dahyanta ekatyāni
K05adsp55-u:57: gṛhāni na dahyante. teṣām etad dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ karma vipacyate. tata evaitad dharmapratyākhyānāt
K05adsp55-u:58: sāvaśeṣaṃ karma vipacyate. ayaṃ subhūte hetur ayaṃ pratyaya avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05adsp55-u:59: yair hetubhir yaiḥ pratyayair avaivartiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. punar
K05adsp55-u:60: aparaṃ subhūte yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair avaivartiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp55-u:62: ākārās tāni liṅgāni tani nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi. sacet subhūte kācid eva strī vā puruṣo vā amanuṣyeṇa adhiṣṭhito bhavet,
K05adsp55-u:64: saced ahaṃ vyākṛtas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:65: samyaksaṃbodhau parisamyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariśuddho me 'dhyāśayo yathā
K05adsp55-u:66: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmo yathā aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:67: abhisaṃboddhukāmo yathā aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye pariśuddhaś
K05adsp55-u:69: apagataṃ me śrāvakacittam apagataṃ me pratyekabuddhacittam,
K05adsp55-u:71: na ahaṃ na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
K05adsp55-u:72: abhisaṃbhotsya eva aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. ye te 'pi te asaṃkhyeya-aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
K05adsp55-u:73: na teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcid ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam
K05adsp55-u:74: asākṣātkṛtam anabhisaṃbuddham. yathā me te buddhā bhagavanto jānanty āśayam iti hi
K05adsp55-u:75: [f. 216b] aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. anena satyena satyavacanena
K05adsp55-u:76: iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā yena amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto vā viheṭhito vā so 'manuṣyo 'pakrāmatu.
K05adsp55-u:77: sacet subhūte so 'manuṣyas tato na apakrāmati,
K05adsp55-u:79: veditavyaṃ subhūte na ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. sacet (AdSPG I 7)
K05adsp55-u:80: punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya so 'manuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmati,
K05adsp55-u:81: veditavyaṃ subhūte vyākṛto vatāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair
K05adsp55-u:82: arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhi
K05adsp55-u:83: liṅgair ebhi nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartiko veditavyaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:84: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritasya,
K05adsp55-u:86: acaritāvinaś caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yāvac chūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vimokṣamukheṣu,
K05adsp55-u:87: bodhisattvanyāmam anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati. sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kariṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:88: yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:89: anena satyena satyavacanena ayam amanuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmatu. tatra māraḥ pāpīyān autsukyam āpatsyate,
K05adsp55-u:90: kim ity ayam amanuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmet. tata kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:91: tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaraṃ ca tejovattaraṃ ca tatra autsukyam āpatsyate,
K05adsp55-u:92: katham ayam amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed iti. evaṃ sa māra adhiṣṭhānena tato 'pakramiṣyati. evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:93: mamaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānto. na punar evaṃ jñāsyati:
K05adsp55-u:94: mārānubhāvenaiṣo 'manuṣyo 'pakrānta iti. sa tena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullapiṣyati uccagghiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyaty:
K05adsp55-u:95: ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
K05adsp55-u:96: ete punar anye na vyākṛtā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, (AdSPG I 8)
K05adsp55-u:97: sa tāvanmātrakeṇa mānaṃ vardhayiṣyati mānam utpādayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:98: dūrīkariṣyati sarvākārajñatāṃ dūrīkariṣyaty anuttaraṃ buddhajñānam. sa tathārūpo sattvas tāvatā anupāyakuśalo 'dhimānam utpādayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:99: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye. katame dve bhūmī?
K05adsp55-u:100: yaduta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānena tasya bodhisattvasy
K05adsp55-u:101: a mahāsattvasya mārakarmotpatsyate. tatra kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyati na pratiseviṣyati
K05adsp55-u:102: na bhakṣiṣyati na paryupāsiṣyate. tad eva mārabandhanaṃ gāḍhīkariṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:103: tathāpi ca ṣaṭpāramitāsv acaritvāt upāyakauśalena ca aparigṛhītatvāt. evam api subhūte
K05adsp55-u:104: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsv
K05adsp55-u:105: acaritāvinaṃ yāvad anavakrāntanyāmaṃ nāmādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati?
K05adsp55-u:106: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvam evaṃ vakṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:107: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau [f. 217a?
K05adsp55-u:108: ] idan te nāmadheyam idan te mātur nāmadheyam idan te pitur nāmadheyam idan te bhrātur
K05adsp55-u:109: nāmadheyam idan te bhaginyā nāmadheyam imāni te mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ nāmadheyāni.
K05adsp55-u:110: yāvad ā saptamasya mātāpitṛyugasya nāmadheyam upadekṣyaty,
K05adsp55-u:111: amuṣmāt tvaṃ janapadād amuṣyā diśo 'muṣmiṃ tvaṃ janapade jāto 'muṣmiṃ nagare vā grāme vā. sa sacet prakṛtyā mṛduko bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:113: pūrvāntato 'pi tvam evaṃ mṛduko 'bhūḥ. sacet tīkṣṇo bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:115: pūrvāntato 'pi tvam evaṃ tīkṣṇo 'bhūḥ. saced āraṇyako bhaviṣyati sacet piṇḍapātiko bhaviṣyati (AdSPG I 9)
K05adsp55-u:116: sacet pāṃsukūliko bhaviṣyati sacet khalu paścādbhaktiko bhaviṣyati saced ekāsaniko
K05adsp55-u:117: bhaviṣyati sacet prāptapiṇḍiko bhaviṣyati sacec cchmāśāniko bhaviṣyati saced ābhyavakāśiko
K05adsp55-u:118: bhaviṣyati sacet vṛkṣamūliko bhaviṣyati sacen naiṣadyiko bhaviṣyati saced yāthāsaṃstariko
K05adsp55-u:119: bhaviṣyati sacet traicīvariko bhaviṣyati saced alpecchaḥ sacet saṃtuṣṭaḥ sacet praviviktaḥ
K05adsp55-u:120: yāvat prajñaḥ saced apagatapādamrakṣaṇaḥ sacen mandabhāṣyo bhaviṣati,
K05adsp55-u:122: pūrvāntato 'pi tvaṃ mandabhāṣyo 'bhūḥ. sacen mandamantro bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:124: pūrvāntato 'pi tvaṃ mandamantro 'bhūḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:125: tathā hi te ime evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
K05adsp55-u:126: niścayena te pūrvāntato 'py eta eva dhutaguṇasaṃlekhā abhūvan,
K05adsp55-u:127: so 'py anena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena gotrāpadeśena anena ca pratyutpannena dhutaguṇasaṃlekhāpadeśena mananām utpādayiṣyati. tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān saṃmūḍham iti viditvā
K05adsp55-u:129: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher avaivartikatāyām. tathā te guṇāḥ saṃvidyante. sa kadācid
K05adsp55-u:130: sa kadācid bhikṣuṇīveṣeṇa kadācid gṛhapativeṣeṇa kadācin mātṛveṣeṇa kadācit pitṛveṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:131: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:133: ye avaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. ye ca te mayā subhūte avaivartikānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:134: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāny ākhyātāni tāni tasya bodhisattvasya na (AdSPG I 10)
K05adsp55-u:135: saṃvidyante. veditavyaṃ subhūte tad anyair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair mārādhiṣṭhito vatāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:136: tathā hi subhūte yāny ākārā liṅgāni nimittāny avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K05adsp55-u:137: tāni tasya na saṃvidyante. anena ca nāmāpadeśena tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K05adsp55-u:138: atimaṃsyate uccagghiṣyaty ullapiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati. idam api subhūte
K05adsp55-u:139: nāmādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam. punar aparaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:140: nāmādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:141: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritāvī skandhamāraṃ na jānāti,
K05adsp55-u:144: ] taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyān nāmādhiṣṭhānena vyākariṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:145: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyeti idaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati iti. yadi ca tena bodhisattvena nāmadheyam anuvitarkitam anuvicintitam anuvicāritaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:147: yat tan mayā nāmadheyaṃ manasā anuvitarkitam anuvincintitam anuvicāritam,
K05adsp55-u:148: idaṃ me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyati. yathā yathā māraḥ pāpīyān nirdekṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:152: yathā ca me nāmadheyam anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ sameti nāma nāmnā ahan tena tathāgatena
K05adsp55-u:153: arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti. ye ca te mayā
K05adsp55-u:155: mahāsattvasya ākāra liṅgāni nimittāny ākhyātāni tāni tasya bodhisattvasya na saṃvidyante.
K05adsp55-u:156: tena cāsau nāmnā tena ca vyākaraṇāpadeśena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān atimaṃsyate.
K05adsp55-u:157: sa tayā atimananatayā dūribhaviṣyaty anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tasyopāyakauśalavirahitasya
K05adsp55-u:158: prajñāpāramitāvirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye,
K05adsp55-u:160: atha vā ciraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitvā bhajitvā paryupāsya
K05adsp55-u:161: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. sacet
K05adsp55-u:162: punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi na abhīkṣṇaṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
K05adsp55-u:163: sacet tenaiva ca ātmabhāvapratilaṃbhena tān paurvikāṃś cittotpādān na vigarhiṣyati na pratideśayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:165: yaduta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir yā. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śrāvakayānīyo
K05adsp55-u:166: bhikṣuś catasṛṇāṃ mūlāpattīnām anyatarānyatarām āpattim adhyāpadya abhikṣur bhavaty
K05adsp55-u:167: aśramaṇo bhavaty aśākyaputrīyaḥ so 'bhavyas tenaiva ātmabhāvena caturṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānām
K05adsp55-u:168: anyatarānyatarañc chrāmaṇyaphalam anuprāptum. evam eva subhūte gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādo
K05adsp55-u:169: yo nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
K05adsp55-u:170: tena ca nāmadheya mātreṇa anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vimaṃsyate avamaṃsyate atimaṃsyate ayan tena gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ. (AdSPG I 12)
K05adsp55-u:171: iti hi subhūte imāni nāmavyapadeśena utpatsyante mārakarmāṇi sūkṣmāṇi. tiṣṭhantu
K05adsp55-u:172: subhūte catasro gurukā mūlāpattayaḥ. pañcabhyaḥ ānantaryebhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ
K05adsp55-u:173: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya nāmāpadeśena manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannaḥ. ayan tena
K05adsp55-u:174: gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ. punar aparaṃ subhūte vivekaguṇāpadeśena bodhisattvaṃ
K05adsp55-u:175: mahāsattvaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyaty upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:177: ] varṇavādī na ca ahaṃ subhūte evaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yaduta āraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayyāsanāni. āha:
K05adsp55-u:178: kaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi na āraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayyāsanāni kīdṛgrūpaḥ sa bhagavann anyo viveko bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya?
K05adsp55-u:180: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
K05adsp55-u:181: manasikārair vivikto bhavati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āraṇyeṣu vanaprastheṣu prānteṣu
K05adsp55-u:182: śayyāsaneṣu viharati vivikta eva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. ayaṃ subhūte viveko
K05adsp55-u:183: mayā anujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anena ced vivekena rātriṃ divaṃ ca viharati
K05adsp55-u:185: mahāsattvaḥ yaś ca mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ,
K05adsp55-u:186: yaṃ ca punar enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān vivekam upadekṣaty āraṇyeṣu vanaprastheṣu prānteṣu
K05adsp55-u:187: śayyāsaneṣu viharet sa tena vivekena saṃkīrṇa eva san śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktair
K05adsp55-u:188: manasikārair avirahita prajñāpāramitā anabhisaṃyukto sarvākārajñatāṃ na paripūrayiṣyati.
K05adsp55-u:189: evaṃ so 'nena vihāreṇa viharan na pariśuddhamanasikāra eva saṃs tadanyān bodhisattvān
K05adsp55-u:190: mahāsattvān atimaṃsyate. ye grāmānte viharanti. pariśuddhacitta manasikārāḥ śrāvakacittena
K05adsp55-u:191: asaṃkīrṇāḥ pratyekabuddhacittena asaṃkīrṇās tadanyair vā pāpakaiś cittotpādair asaṃkīrṇāḥ
K05adsp55-u:192: dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnām abhijñāparijñāparipūriṃ gatāḥ. atha ca punaḥ so
K05adsp55-u:195: tatra madhyagataḥ vā saṃkalpayati varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ
K05adsp55-u:196: vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ va varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā
K05adsp55-u:197: varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā tato vottari imañ ca vivekaṃ na jānīyād yena vivekena
K05adsp55-u:200: saṃkliṣṭha eva tatra viveke niśrita ālīno 'dhyavasito 'idhyavasitavān,
K05adsp55-u:201: na me sa tāvatā cittam abhirādhayati. yaś ca mayā viveka ākhyāto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tena vivekena samanvāgatas tasminn api sa viveke na saṃdṛśyate. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:202: tathā hi sa virahitas tena vivekena. tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe sthitvaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K05adsp55-u:203: sādhu sādhu kulaputra eṣa sa bhūto vivekas tathāgatena ākhyātaḥ etena tvaṃ vivekena
K05adsp55-u:204: vihara. evaṃ tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. sa tato vivekāt
K05adsp55-u:205: taṃ vivekaṃ pradhānatamaṃ mānyamānaḥ punar api grāmāntam avatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān
K05adsp55-u:206: bhikṣūn pariśuddhacittamanasikārān yāvat peśalān kalyāṇadharmāṇo 'vamaṃsyate. saṃkīrṇavihāreṇeme
K05adsp55-u:208: ye te viviktaṃ vihariṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvās [f. 218b] tān saṃkīrṇavihariṇaś codayiṣyaty ākīrṇavihariṇaś codayiṣyaty atimaṃsyate. ye ca te saṃkīrṇavihariṇo vihariṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:210: tatra ca gauravam utpādayiṣyati. yatra ca gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ tatra mānam utpādayiṣyati. tat kasya heto?
K05adsp55-u:212: aham amanuṣyaiś codye aham amanuṣyaiḥ smārye.
K05adsp55-u:214: eṣa subhūte vihāro yena vihāreṇa ahaṃ viharāmi. ko grāmāntavihariṇaś codayiṣyati. ko grāmāntavihāriṇaḥ smārayiṣyati?
K05adsp55-u:215: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo bodhisattvayānikān kulaputrān atimaṃsyate. ayaṃ subhūte pudgalo
K05adsp55-u:216: bodhisattvaś caṇḍālo veditavyo bodhisattvadūṣī veditavyo bodhisattvaprativarṇiko
K05adsp55-u:217: veditavyaḥ cauraḥ sadevamānuṣāsure loke cauro veditavyaḥ. sa ca punaḥ bodhisattvayānikaiḥ
K05adsp55-u:218: kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tādṛgjātīyaḥ pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhakṣitavyo na
K05adsp55-u:220: ādhimānikā hi subhūte te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyaḥ. yasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktā sarvākārajñatā aparityaktā ca anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis,
K05adsp55-u:221: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
K05adsp55-u:222: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kartukāmena tādṛgjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyā na bhajitavyā
K05adsp55-u:223: na paryupāsitavyāḥ. api tu khalu svārthayogam anuyuktena bhavitavyam. nityam udvignamānasena.
K05adsp55-u:224: saṃsārād uttrastamānasena. asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātuke. tatraiva ca bodhisattvacaṇḍālaiḥ
K05adsp55-u:225: maitry utpādayitavyā tatraiva anukampām upādāya kāruṇyatā utpādayitavyā. muditopekṣotpādayitavyā.
K05adsp55-u:227: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaite mama doṣāḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:229: kṣipram etāṃ prahāsyāmi iti śikṣā karaṇīyā. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām svayamabhijñāparākramo veditavyaḥ. punar aparaṃ subhute (AdSPG I 16)
K05adsp55-u:230: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhajitavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
K05adsp55-u:231: kāni punar bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
K05adsp55-u:233: buddhā bhagavantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K05adsp55-u:234: bodhisattvā api subhūte mahāsattvā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K05adsp55-u:235: śrāvakā api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K05adsp55-u:236: ye ca ṣaṭpāramitān ākhyāyanti deśayanti prakāśayanti. [f. 219a] prasthāpayanti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkurvanti saṃprakāśayanti,
K05adsp55-u:237: ime 'pi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. punar aparaṃ subhūte ṣaṭpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi
K05adsp55-u:238: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K05adsp55-u:239: tathatā bhūtakoṭir dharmadhātur bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. punar aparaṃ subhūte ṣaṭpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstāro veditavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:241: ṣaṭpāramitā ālokaḥ. ṣaṭpāramitā ulkā avabhāso buddhir medhā prajñā,
K05adsp55-u:245: ṣaṭpāramitā mātā. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusandhi prahāṇāya saṃvartate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:246: tathā hi subhūte ye 'pi te 'bhūvann (AdSPG I 17)
K05adsp55-u:248: teṣāṃ api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhūvan. ye
K05adsp55-u:249: 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām
K05adsp55-u:250: api subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhaviṣyanti.
K05adsp55-u:251: ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante
K05adsp55-u:253: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:254: tathā hi subhūte ato niiyātā atītānāgata pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:257: caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvāḥ saṃgṛhītavyāḥ. katamaiś caturbhir?
K05adsp55-u:258: yaduta dānena priyavacane na arthacaryayā samānārthatayā. imam apy ahaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyann evaṃ vadāmi:
K05adsp55-u:260: layanaṃ trāṇaṃ dvīpaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ yaduteṣā eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena,
K05adsp55-u:263: sattvāṃś ca paripācayitukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:264: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ te dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:268: subhūte prajñāparamitā. na subhūte prajñāpāramitā [f. 219b] lakṣaṇaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:270: syād bhagavaṃ paryāyo yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran?
K05adsp55-u:272: evam etat subhūte evam etat yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:273: sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇeṇa prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
K05adsp55-u:274: tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. yaduta śūnyatālakṣaṇena viviktalakṣaṇena. āha:
K05adsp55-u:275: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmair viviktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyās,
K05adsp55-u:276: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ prajñāyate. na hi bhagavaṃ viviktam saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
K05adsp55-u:277: na sūnyatā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. na viviktaṃ na?
K05adsp55-u:278: śūnyatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid
K05adsp55-u:279: dharma upalabhyate. na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ sattva upalabhyate yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta
K05adsp55-u:280: asya bhagavaṃ vayaṃ bhāṣitasya katham arthan ājānīyāma?
K05adsp55-u:282: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti?
K05adsp55-u:283: āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. dīrgharatraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:284: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakārau viviktau śūnyau?
K05adsp55-u:285: aha: śūnyau bhagavaṃc chūnyau sugataḥ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:286: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃsaranti saṃdhāvanti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:287: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:289: yatra na ahaṃkāro na mamakāraḥ tatra nodgrāhaḥ, (AdSPG I 19)
K05adsp55-u:290: nodgrahaḥ na tatra sattvāḥ sandhāvanti na saṃsaranti,
K05adsp55-u:291: na tatra saṃkleśaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:292: evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carali,
K05adsp55-u:293: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati. na caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati yāvan na aṣṭādaśeṣv āveṇikeṣu buddharmeṣu carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:294: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yaś cared yata vā cared yatra vā cared. evaṃ caraṃ
K05adsp55-u:295: bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo anavamardanīyo bhavati. sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena.
K05adsp55-u:296: evaṃ caraṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair na
K05adsp55-u:298: tathā hi so 'nabhibhūtasthāne sthito yaduta bodhisattvanyāme,
K05adsp55-u:299: anabhibhūto hi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñātāmanasikāreṇa avirahita evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñatayā abhyāśī bhavati. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:300: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte [f. 220a] yāvatyo jāṃbudvīpakā sattvās te sarve mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran,
K05adsp55-u:301: mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeran,
K05adsp55-u:302: tān ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā. yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
K05adsp55-u:303: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
K05adsp55-u:304: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaved?
K05adsp55-u:305: ahā: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:307: vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām
K05adsp55-u:308: ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānikuryāt saṃprakāśayet
K05adsp55-u:310: evaṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāṃs te sarve mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheraṃs,
K05adsp55-u:311: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K05adsp55-u:312: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣu apramāṇeṣu catasriṣv ārūpyasamāpattīṣu yāvat srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgamīphale anāgāmīphale arhattve pratyekabodhau
K05adsp55-u:313: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tāñ ca kuśalamūlān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayet,
K05adsp55-u:314: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K05adsp55-u:315: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:316: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved, ya
K05adsp55-u:317: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair viharet,
K05adsp55-u:318: sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:319: tathā hi na kasyacit sattvasya tādṛśo vihāro yādṛśo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05adsp55-u:320: sthāpayitvā tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:321: tathā hi te kulaputrā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto mahāmaitrīm abhinirharanti,
K05adsp55-u:324: te tena vihāreṇa viharaṃto muditayā pramodanto 'bhipramodanti. te (AdSPG I 21)
K05adsp55-u:325: mahāmuditām abhinirharanti. te tena nimittena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasanti. te mahopekṣāṃ
K05adsp55-u:326: pratilabhante. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvanāṃ mahāṃ prajñāloko yaduta
K05adsp55-u:328: prajñāpāramitālokaḥ. anabhisaṃbuddhā api te kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchanti,
K05adsp55-u:329: na ca vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. yasya ca te paribhuñjate cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān
K05adsp55-u:332: sarvākārajñatāyāś ca abhyāsī bhavanti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgam upadeśayitukāmena,
K05adsp55-u:336: prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair satatasamitaṃ vihartavyam. sacet subhūte
K05adsp55-u:337: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tair prajñāpāramitāpratisamuyktair manasikārair viharet tena
K05adsp55-u:338: prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā eva kathā kathitavyā. tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān
K05adsp55-u:339: eva kathān kathitvā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair eva manasikārair vihartavyaṃ. tena
K05adsp55-u:340: prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktamanasikāreṇa viharatā anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:341: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathā tair eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair rātriṃ divam anikṣiptadhuro (AdSPG I 22)
K05adsp55-u:342: viharet. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacid eva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnam apratilabdhapūrvaṃ
K05adsp55-u:343: bhavet. so yena samayena pratilabheta tan maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya udāreṇa prītiprāmodyasaumanasyena
K05adsp55-u:344: samanvāgato bhavet. tasya sahapratilambham eva tan maṇiratnaṃ punaḥ praṇaśyet sa
K05adsp55-u:345: tatonidānaṃ mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃyukto bhavet. sa?
K05adsp55-u:346: tasya satatasamitaṃ ratnapratisaṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarterann:
K05adsp55-u:347: aho vatāhaṃ tena manoramena maṇiratnena visaṃyukta iti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:348: mahāsattvena ratnam idam iti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahitena
K05adsp55-u:349: bhavitavyam. na ca tat sarvākārajñatāratna nāmitavyam eva satataṃ sukhasaumanasya
K05adsp55-u:351: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvamanasikārā svabhāvena virahitāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā,
K05adsp55-u:352: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati?
K05adsp55-u:354: na manasikāro na sarvākārajñatā. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:355: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti:
K05adsp55-u:356: virahitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena. te na śrāvākaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair kṛtā
K05adsp55-u:357: na ca buddhair bhagavadbhir kṛtā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā
K05adsp55-u:358: dharmaniyāmatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭiḥ. avirahito
K05adsp55-u:359: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyā bhavati. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:360: [f. 221a] eṣā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā,
K05adsp55-u:362: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:363: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena śūnyā,
K05adsp55-u:364: kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudagamya (AdSPG I 23)
K05adsp55-u:367: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgamya vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
K05adsp55-u:368: na bhūtakoṭir vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
K05adsp55-u:369: na dharmadhātur vivardhate vā parihīyate vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:370: na hi prajñāpāramitā ekaṃ na dve,
K05adsp55-u:371: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na santrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:372: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyās sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartyadhātau. caraty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. subhūtir
K05adsp55-u:373: kiṃ punar bhagavan yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā riktatā vaśikatā asārakatā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:376: tato 'nyatra bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:379: kaccit punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:382: kaccit punar bhagavaṃc chūnyatā śūnyatāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:385: kaccit punar bhagavan anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:388: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:391: kiṃ punar bhagavan ṣaṭpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K05adsp55-u:400: kiṃ punar bhagavan yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatāriktatātucchatā-asārakatātathatā-avitathatā-ananyatathatā
K05adsp55-u:401: dharmatā dharmadhātu dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K05adsp55-u:404: sacet punar bhagavann ete dharmā na caranti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K05adsp55-u:405: tat kathaṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ?
K05adsp55-u:407: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [f. 221b] carati?
K05adsp55-u:408: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:409: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvam tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra bodhisattvena caritavyam?
K05adsp55-u:410: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:411: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yad dharma yaṃ tvaṃ na samanupaśyasi. kaścit sa dharma upalabhyate?
K05adsp55-u:412: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:413: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo nopalabhyate api nu sa dharma utpatsyate vā nirotsyate vā?
K05adsp55-u:414: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:415: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ. evaṃrūpayā
K05adsp55-u:416: subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato. bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛyate buddhair bhagavadbhir
K05adsp55-u:417: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. iyam ucyate subhūte daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvin mahāmaitryā
K05adsp55-u:418: mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā pratisaṃvider tāṃ. yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:419: mahāsattva. evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamāṇaḥ (AdSPG I 25)
K05adsp55-u:420: evaṃ vyāyacchamāno anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhajñānaṃ mahājñānaṃ sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ nānuprāpsyatīti. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:421: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā. tasya na kadācit teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hānir bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:422: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:423: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām utpādāya vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05adsp55-u:426: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpattikatāya vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05adsp55-u:429: tat kiṃ bhagavan naivotpattito nānutpattito vyākṛyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05adsp55-u:432: sacet punar bhagavan naivotpattito nānutpattito bodhisattvo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05adsp55-u:433: tat katham idānīṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05adsp55-u:435: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tad dharmaṃ yo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau?
K05adsp55-u:436: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. na nahan tad dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛyate 'nuttarasyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:437: samyaksaṃbodhau. tam apy ahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate
K05adsp55-u:438: yena vā dharmeṇa abhisaṃbudhyate. .... tā. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:439: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmān anupalaṃbhamānasya (AdSPG I 26)
K05adsp55-u:440: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavaty. aham abhisaṃbhotsye. anena abhisaṃbhotsyate idam abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:441: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarva ete vikalpā na saṃvidyante. tat [f. 222a] kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:445: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:446: gaṃbhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā dudṛśyā duranubodhā atarkyā atarkā avacarā yāvat
K05adsp55-u:447: sūkṣmā nipuṇā paṇḍitavijñāvedanīyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā atyantiviviktatām upādāya.
K05adsp55-u:448: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:449: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K05adsp55-u:450: tathātvāya ca pratipatsyante na ca anyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti
K05adsp55-u:451: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsjante. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:452: evam etat kauśika evam etat. na te sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
K05adsp55-u:453: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti dhārayisyanti vācayiṣyanti. tathātvāya
K05adsp55-u:454: ca pratipatsyante na ca anyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti. yāvad
K05adsp55-u:455: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. tat kiṃ manyase kauśika ye ca yāvantyo
K05adsp55-u:456: jāṃbudvīpakā sattvās te sarve daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuś
K05adsp55-u:457: caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ paṃcabhir abhijñābhiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:458: yaś ca kaluputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
K05adsp55-u:459: vācayet paryavāpnuyāt udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathātvāya pratipadyeta. (AdSPG I 28)
K05adsp55-u:460: asya kauśika kuśalamūlasya etat paurvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05adsp55-u:461: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api. kotitamīm api yāvat koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm
K05adsp55-u:462: api kalāṃ nopaiti. saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate. atha
K05adsp55-u:463: anyataro bhikṣu. śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:466: abhibhūtā kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā te sarvajāṃcaturdhyānasamanvāgatāś (sic)
K05adsp55-u:468: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām avikṣiptena cittena udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K05adsp55-u:469: paryavāpsyati tathātvāyā ca pratipatsyate. na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyati,
K05adsp55-u:470: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. evam ukte śakro devānām indras taṃ bhikṣum etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:471: ekacittotpādena bhikṣos tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena te sarvajāṃbudvīpakā sattvā
K05adsp55-u:473: caturārūpyasamāpattisamanvāgatāḥ paṃcābhijñāsamanvāgatā abhibhūtāḥ. kaḥ punar vādo
K05adsp55-u:474: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati [f. 222b] paryavāpsyati
K05adsp55-u:475: udgṛhyā dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathātvāya pratipatsyate. tena sadevamānuṣāsuro
K05adsp55-u:476: loko abhibhūto bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati. na kevalaṃ
K05adsp55-u:477: sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattva mahāsattvo. ye 'pi te srotaāpannāḥ
K05adsp55-u:479: 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhās tān api sarvān abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. na kevalaṃ srotaāpannā yāvat pratyekabuddhā,
K05adsp55-u:480: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃty upāyakauśalavirahitā prajñāpāramitāvirahitās
K05adsp55-u:481: tān api sarvān abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. na kevalaṃ ye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K05adsp55-u:482: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās
K05adsp55-u:483: tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattva. na kevalaṃ ye kṣānti pāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K05adsp55-u:484: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitās prajñāpāramitayā
K05adsp55-u:485: virahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattva. na kevalaṃ ye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K05adsp55-u:486: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalavirahitāḥ
K05adsp55-u:487: prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavaṃ gamiṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ. ye
K05adsp55-u:488: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K05adsp55-u:489: te sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyam abhibhavitum. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuvartate,
K05adsp55-u:491: mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñātāvaṃśasya anupacchedāya sthitaḥ. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
K05adsp55-u:492: tathāgatān na dūrīkaroti. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ pratipadyamāno na virāgayati
K05adsp55-u:493: bodhimaṇḍam. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān saṃsīdān uddhartukāmaḥ. ayaṃ bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:494: mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate. na pratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:496: śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya catvāro maharājāno upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
K05adsp55-u:498: śīghraṃ bho mahāpuruṣa śikṣasva laghu śikṣasva imāni tāni catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā
K05adsp55-u:499: parigṛhītavyāni bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya yāni parigrahītāni
K05adsp55-u:500: paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhai. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
K05adsp55-u:501: prajñāparamitāyām upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante catvāro mahārājakāyikāḥ devarājā. sārdhaṃ
K05adsp55-u:502: mahārājakāyikair devaputrai punar trāyastriṃśa devaputrā apy enam upsaṃkramitavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:503: maṃsyaṃte. sārdhaṃ trāyastriṃśair devaputraiḥ suyāmo 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
K05adsp55-u:504: sārdhaṃ yāmair devaputrai saṃtuṣito 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte,
K05adsp55-u:505: sārdhaṃ tuṣitair devaputraiḥ nirmito 'pi devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte. sārdhaṃ nirmāṇāratibhir devaputraiḥ vaśavarty api devarājā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:506: sārdhaṃ vaśavartibhir devaputraiḥ brahmāpi sahaṃpatir upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
K05adsp55-u:507: sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikair devaputraiḥ ābhāsvarā api devā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyaṃte.
K05adsp55-u:508: śubhakṛtsnāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ [f. 223a] sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
K05adsp55-u:509: devā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:511: tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nityaṃ samanvāhṛto
K05adsp55-u:512: bhaviṣyati ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. evaṃ carato bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:513: mahāsattvasya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāni kānicil laukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramāṇi (AdSPG I 31)
K05adsp55-u:514: kāye utpatsyante tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante. na nipatiṣyanti. ime bhikṣor
K05adsp55-u:515: dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇā bhaviṣyanti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:516: carataḥ. tasmin samaye yāni tāni sannipātikāni glānyāni,
K05adsp55-u:517: tadyathā cakṣurogaḥ śrotrarogaḥ jihvārogo dantaśūlaṃ kāyaśūlaṃ cittaśūlaṃ yāvat tāni
K05adsp55-u:518: sarvāṇi kāye notpatsyante na nipatiṣyanti. ime bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dṛṣṭadhārmikā
K05adsp55-u:519: guṇāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. athāyuṣmataḥ ānandasyaitad abhūt:
K05adsp55-u:520: kim ayaṃ śakro devānām indra ātmīyena svakena pratibhānena prajñāpāramitām upadiśati. prajñāpāramitāyāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāna utāho buddha anubhāvena?
K05adsp55-u:521: atha śakro devānām indra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:522: buddha anubhāva eṣa bhadanta ānanda veditavyo yo 'haṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśāmi. prajñāpāramitāyaś ca guṇānuśaṃsāṃ. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:524: tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāva tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam. yac chakro devānām indraḥ
K05adsp55-u:525: prajñāpāramitām upadiśati. asyāś ca prajñāpāramitāyā guṇānuśaṃsān. yasmin khalu punar
K05adsp55-u:526: samaye ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:528: tasmiṃ samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃs te sarve saṃśayaprāptā bhavaṃti:
K05adsp55-u:529: kim ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūtakotiṃ sākṣātkṛtya śrotaāpattiphalam anuprāpsyati (AdSPG I 32)
K05adsp55-u:532: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyā avirahito
K05adsp55-u:533: bhavati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃc chokaśalyaviddho bhavati. punar aparam ānanda
K05adsp55-u:534: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān ulkapātān avasṛjati. bhayaṃ janayaty apy
K05adsp55-u:535: eva nāma bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avalīnatā bhavet romaharṣo vā bhaved avalīnacittatā
K05adsp55-u:536: vā bhaved ekacittavikṣepo vā bhavet sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. athāyuṣmān ānando
K05adsp55-u:538: kina punar bhagavan sarvān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:540: na khalv ānanda sarvāṃ bodhisattvāṃ mahāsattvān māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ. ānanda āha:
K05adsp55-u:543: yeṣām ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pūrvāntataḥ iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:544: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ nādhimuktaṃ tāṃ māra pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:545: punar aparam ānanda ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvā
K05adsp55-u:546: saṃśayaprāptā 'bhūvan syād veyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na vā syād iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K05adsp55-u:547: etān ānanda māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ. punar (AdSPG I 33)
K05adsp55-u:548: aparam ānanda bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati. so 'paśyaṃ kalyāṇamitram imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na śṛṇoti. aśṛṇvan na jānāti,
K05adsp55-u:549: ajānaṃ na tathātvāyā pratipadyate. kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyeti. punar aparam
K05adsp55-u:550: ānanda bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahitaḥ asaddharmaparigrāhaṃ karoty asyāpy
K05adsp55-u:551: ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avakāśaṃ labhate. punar aparam
K05adsp55-u:552: ānanda prajñāpāramitayā virahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asaddharmasya varṇāṃ bhāṣate,
K05adsp55-u:554: sahāyako 'yaṃ mama yo asaddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K05adsp55-u:555: bahūnām apy eṣa bodhisatttvayānikānāṃ sahāyako labdho yo 'saddharmasya varṇāṃ bhāṣate. ayaṃ mama abhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:556: yat te bodhisattvayānikā dvayor bhūmyo sthāsyanti. yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabūmau vā. punar aparam ānanda kiyadrūpasya bodhisattvasya māro 'vatāraṃ labhate?
K05adsp55-u:557: yo bodhisattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamaṇāyām evaṃ vadati:
K05adsp55-u:558: gaṃbhīreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kin te 'nayā gaṃbhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā śrutayā bhāṣitayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā?
K05adsp55-u:559: aham eva tāvad gādhaṃ nopalabhe. kutas tvaṃ lapsyase?
K05adsp55-u:560: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpiyān avatāraṃ labhate. punar aparam ānanda yasmiṃ samaye bodhisattvo 'nyatarān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K05adsp55-u:561: ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi yāvad ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carasi yāvan na tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carasi, asyāpy (AdSPG I 34)
K05adsp55-u:562: ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate. punar aparam ānanda yasmiṃ
K05adsp55-u:563: samaye bodhisattva ātmānam utkṛṣṭaṃ manyate tasminn ānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyān tuṣṭo
K05adsp55-u:564: bhavaty udagra āttamanaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati tasyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:565: māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ labhate. punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:566: mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā parikīrtitaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:567: sa tena nāmagrahanena vā gotragrahaṇena vā tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān
K05adsp55-u:568: yāvat kalyāṇadharmāṇo 'bhimanyate. ātmānam utkarṣayati. paraṃ paṃsayati. te cāsya
K05adsp55-u:570: yāny avaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvanāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni. sa tair
K05adsp55-u:571: ākāraliṅganimittair asaṃvidyamānai kleśam utpādayaty ātmānaṃ cotkarṣayati paraṃś
K05adsp55-u:573: na tvam atra bodhisattvayāne sandṛśyase na bodhisattvagotre sandṛśyase,
K05adsp55-u:575: sa tena tāṃ bodhisattvayānikān pudgalāṃ kutsayati paṃsayati. tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavaty:
K05adsp55-u:576: aśūnyaṃ me bhavanaṃ bhaviṣyaty utsadā bhaviṣyanti mahānarakās tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ
K05adsp55-u:577: [f. 224a] pretaviṣayaś ca. tathā tathā ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs taṃ bodhisattvam adhiṣṭhāsyati.
K05adsp55-u:578: yathā ādeyavacano bhaviṣyati. tasya tayā ādeyavacanatayā bahujanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhatavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:579: maṃsyante. tasya te śrutvā dṛṣṭānugītam āpatsyante. te dṛṣṭānugītam āpadyamānās tathātvāya (AdSPG I 35)
K05adsp55-u:581: te tathātvāya śikṣamāṇās tathātvāya pratipadyamānāḥ kleśaṃ vardhayiṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:582: evaṃ te viparyastayā santatyā yad yad eva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā
K05adsp55-u:583: vā sarvaṃ tad aniṣṭhatvāya akāntatvāya amana āpatvāya saṃvartiṣyate. evaṃ te mahānarakā
K05adsp55-u:584: utsadā bhaviṣyanti tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ pretaviṣaya utsado bhaviṣyati. mārabhavanam
K05adsp55-u:585: utsado bhaviṣyati. imam ānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān āttamanā bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:586: pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ. punar aparam ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayānikena kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ vivadati ahaṃ pradhānataro na tvaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:588: dūrīkariṣyati vatāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvākārajñātām. na sa abhyāśi bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:589: naite kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādā sarvākārajñatāyā mārgaḥ narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga
K05adsp55-u:590: eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. punar aparam ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ
K05adsp55-u:592: sārdhaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaṃ karoti tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:593: ubhāv etau dūrīkarisyatas sarvākārajñatām. ubhāv etau nābhisaṃbhotsyete 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:595: mārgaḥ naiṣa pratipat sarvākārajñatāyā ya ābhyāṃ kulaputrābhyām ārabdhaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:596: narakatiryagyoniyamalokamārga eṣa ya ābhyāṃ kulaputrābhyām ārabdhaḥ. punar aparam
K05adsp55-u:597: ānanda saced avyākṛto bodhisattvo vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya antike cittam āghātayet
K05adsp55-u:599: tena punar eva tāvata eva kalpān samnāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ yāvanto 'sya te cittotpādāḥ
K05adsp55-u:600: pāpakā utpannāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān kurvataḥ. saced asya sarvākārajñatā
K05adsp55-u:602: asti punar bhagavann eṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ niḥsaraṇatā utāho tāvata eva kalpāṃs tena saṃnāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:604: sanniḥsaraṇo mayā ānanda dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:605: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām. tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo
K05adsp55-u:606: bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahet vā vivadeta vā ākrośed vā paribhāṣeta
K05adsp55-u:607: vā kalahitvā vivadya ākruṣya paribhāṣya na pratideśayed anuśayaṃ vahed anubaddho 'nuśayena viharen,
K05adsp55-u:608: na aham ānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
K05adsp55-u:609: avaśyam eva tena pudgalena tāvata eva kalpāṃ sannāha sannaddhavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:610: saced asya aparityaktā bhavati sarvākārajñatā. yaḥ punar ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:611: kalahitvā vivadya ākruśya paribhāṣya pratideśayati. nānuśayaṃ vahaty āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:612: durlabdhā me lābhā yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkham apahartavyaṃ tad ahaṃ mantrite
K05adsp55-u:613: pratimantrayāmi. yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyam. so 'haṃ parasya
K05adsp55-u:615: vadāmi prativacanaṃ dadāmi. evam api me na kartavyam. jaḍaiḍamūkasadṛśena me bhavitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:617: yat mayaite sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya
K05adsp55-u:618: tad aham atraiva vyāpadye tad aham atraiva kṣubhyāmi na mayātra vyāpattavyaṃ na mayātra
K05adsp55-u:619: kṣubhitavyam. asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sanniḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
K05adsp55-u:620: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate. punar aparam
K05adsp55-u:621: ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsargo na kartavyam.
K05adsp55-u:622: sacet tiṣṭhante na kasyacid antike vyāpattavyaṃ na kṣubhitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:623: tathā hi naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham eṣām antike vyāpadyeyaṃ vā kṣubhyeyaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:624: tathā hy ete mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ. ānanda āha:
K05adsp55-u:625: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam?
K05adsp55-u:627: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda śāstuḥ. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikasya pudgalasya antike sthātavyam. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:628: eṣa me sahāyaka ekanau samārūḍho yathaivānena śikṣitavyaṃ tathaiva me śikṣitavyaṃ. yatraiva anena śikṣitavyaṃ. tatraiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ. dānapāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 38)
K05adsp55-u:629: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ ca tena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ. saṃbodhimārgadeśaka
K05adsp55-u:630: eṣa me. sacet punar eṣa vyavakīrṇe vihared apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
K05adsp55-u:631: na mayātra śikṣitavyaṃ. sacet punar eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avirahito viharet
K05adsp55-u:632: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair mayā 'py evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo
K05adsp55-u:637: katamā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:641: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā. yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
K05adsp55-u:642: subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā. rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā
K05adsp55-u:643: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā,
K05adsp55-u:644: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K05adsp55-u:645: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ,
K05adsp55-u:646: yad rūpasya virāgāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yad rūpasya nirodhāya śikṣate
K05adsp55-u:647: śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yad rūpasya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
K05adsp55-u:648: yāvad yad bodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ yāvad bodher virāgāya
K05adsp55-u:649: nirodhāya anutpādāya [f. 225a] śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñātāyāṃ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:651: yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yāvad yad rūpasya anutpādāya
K05adsp55-u:652: śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yāvad yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya
K05adsp55-u:653: kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yāvad yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:656: yāvad yad bodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ yad bodher virāgāya
K05adsp55-u:657: nirodhāya anutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. tat
K05adsp55-u:658: kiṃ manyase subhūte yā rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā,
K05adsp55-u:659: yāvad yā bodhes tathatā yāvad yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgataḥ prajñapyate. api nu sā tathatā kṣīyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate
K05adsp55-u:660: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ no hīdaṃ sugata. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:661: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ.
K05adsp55-u:662: na tathatā kṣīyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:663: mahāsattvaḥ tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:664: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣate. yāvāc caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu,
K05adsp55-u:665: yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:666: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitām anuprāpnoti. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:667: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyate mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā
K05adsp55-u:668: devatābhir dharṣayitum. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣipram eva
K05adsp55-u:669: avaivartyabhūmim anuprāpnoti. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake
K05adsp55-u:671: carati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāthakaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣate.
K05adsp55-u:672: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣate. mahākaruṇāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:673: śikṣate. buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya śikṣate. sattvaparipākāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K05adsp55-u:675: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi iti
K05adsp55-u:676: śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatavaṃśasya anupacchedāya
K05adsp55-u:677: śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ amṛtasya dvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate,
K05adsp55-u:678: asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ sandarśayiṣyāmīti śikṣate. na subhūte śakyaṃ hīnasattvair ihodāraśikṣāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:679: śikṣituṃ. sarvasattvān saṃsārād uddhartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ya iha śikṣāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:680: śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na narakeṣu upapadyate. na
K05adsp55-u:681: tiryagyonau na yamaloke na pratyaṃtimeṣu janapadeṣu upapadyate na pukkasacaṇḍālakuleṣu
K05adsp55-u:682: upapadyate. na kāṇo bhavati. na kubjo bhavati. na laṃgo bhavati. nonāṇgo bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:683: na badhiro bhavati. na paṅkapatito bhavati. na vikalendriyo bhavati. paripūrṇendriyo bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:684: na aparipūrṇendriyaḥ. na prāṇātipātiko bhavati. nādattādāyī [f. 225b] na kāmamithyācāriko (AdSPG I 42)
K05adsp55-u:685: na mṛṣāvādī na paiśuniko na pāruṣikaḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpī na abhidhyālur na vyāpannacitto na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:687: saṃkalpayati. na abhūta parigrāhako bhavati na duḥśīlaparigrāhako bhavati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyate. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:688: asty asyopāyakauśalaṃ yenopāyakauśalasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyate. tat punaḥ katamad?
K05adsp55-u:689: yaduta ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalam upadiṣṭaṃ. yena upāyakauśalena samanvāgato dhyānāni samāpadyate. apramāṇāni samāpadyate. ārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:690: na dhyānānām apramāṇānām ārūpyāsamāpattīnāṃ ca vaśena upapadyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K05adsp55-u:691: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmabalapariśuddhim adhigacchati. yaduta
K05adsp55-u:694: tat katamasya dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhim adhigacchati?
K05adsp55-u:696: evam etat subhāte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi. sarvadharmāḥ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:697: evaṃ pariśuddheṣu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā cittasya asaṃsīdanatā,
K05adsp55-u:699: iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā. tat sarvabālapṛthagjanā etāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti, teṣāṃ (AdSPG I 43)
K05adsp55-u:700: sattvānāṃ kṛte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:701: caranti yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caranti. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ
K05adsp55-u:702: sarvadharmabalavaiśāradyatāṃ pratilabhate na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau patati
K05adsp55-u:703: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:704: pāraṃ gacchati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakās te mahāpṛthivīpradeśā yatra jāṃbūnadaṃ
K05adsp55-u:705: survarṇaṃ jātarūpam utpadyate. evam eva subhūte alpakās te sattvā ya iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante,
K05adsp55-u:706: yaduta prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ. ato bahutarāḥ te sattvāḥ ye śrāvakabhūmaye vā pratyekabuddhabhūmaye
K05adsp55-u:707: vā saṃpratiṣṭhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakās te sattvā ye cakravartirājasaṃvartanīyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:708: karma samādāya vartante. ato bahutarās te sattvāḥ ye koṭṭarājasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma
K05adsp55-u:709: samādāya vartante. evam eva subhūte alpakās te sattvā ye imaṃ sarvajñatāmārgaṃ samārohanti.
K05adsp55-u:710: ato bahutarāḥ sattvāḥ ye śrāvākapratyekabuddhamārgaṃ samārohanti. ye 'pi te subhūte
K05adsp55-u:712: ato 'lpatarakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathātvāya pratipadyante,
K05adsp55-u:713: ato bahutarā ye śrāvakatvāya vā pratyekabuddhatvāya vā tiṣṭhanti. ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ viharantaḥ niḥsaṃśayena (AdSPG I 44)
K05adsp55-u:714: avaivartikabhūmim ākrāmanti. ataḥ prabhūtatarā ye na avaivartikabhūmim avakrāmanti.
K05adsp55-u:715: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena [f. 226a] avaivartikabhūmim aimprāptukāmena
K05adsp55-u:716: avaivartikabhūmau gaṇanāṃ dāntukāmenehaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. punar aparaṃ
K05adsp55-u:717: subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata na mātsaryasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:719: na kṣobhasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na kausīdyasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na vikṣepasahagataṃ
K05adsp55-u:720: cittam utpadyate. na dauṣprajñasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na rāgasahagataṃ cittam
K05adsp55-u:721: utpadyate. na dveṣasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na mohasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate.
K05adsp55-u:722: na khilasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. na rūpasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:723: na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. yāvan na bodhisahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:724: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na
K05adsp55-u:725: kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate. anupalabhamāno na kvacid dharme cittam utpādayati. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:726: khalu subhūte iha gaṃbhīrāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp55-u:727: sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ samudānitā bhavanti sarvaṣaṭpāramitāḥ
K05adsp55-u:729: tathā hi subhūte iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām 6arvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatāny antargatāni bhavanti. (AdSPG I 45)
K05adsp55-u:730: evam eva subhūte iha gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti.
K05adsp55-u:731: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya kālagatasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvendriyāṇi
K05adsp55-u:732: niruddhāni bhavanti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:733: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvapāramitā antargatā bhavanti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte
K05adsp55-u:734: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvapāramitānāṃ pāraṃgantukāmena iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:735: śikṣitavyaṃ. iha punaḥ subhūte gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:736: mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām agryatāyāṃ śikṣate. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K05adsp55-u:737: lokadhātau sattvāḥ api nu te bahavaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:738: āha: bahavo bhagavaṃ bahavaḥ sugata. jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvad bhagavaṃ sattvā bahavaḥ kaḥ punar vādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:739: yāvantaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve anupūrvacaramaṃ
K05adsp55-u:740: mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeraṃs. teṣāṃ
K05adsp55-u:741: sarveṣām ekaikaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhan taṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upattiṣṭhet,
K05adsp55-u:742: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasucīta?
K05adsp55-u:743: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān [f. 226b] āha:
K05adsp55-u:744: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati (AdSPG I 46)
K05adsp55-u:745: ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. tathātvāya ca pratipatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:746: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā. anuttarasyāḥ
K05adsp55-u:747: samyaksaṃbodher āhartrī. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām
K05adsp55-u:748: anuttareṇa. bhavitukāmena sarvasattvānām anāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena. aśaraṇānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:749: śaraṇena bhavitukāmena. aparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇena bhavitukāmena. andhānāṃ cakṣuṣā bhavitukāmena
K05adsp55-u:750: avidyāndhakāraprakṣiptānāṃ dīpena bhavitukāmena. buddhatvam anuprāptukāmena buddhaviṣayam
K05adsp55-u:751: anugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena. buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhabherīṃ
K05adsp55-u:752: parāhantukāmena buddhaśaṃkhaṃ pravātukāmena buddhasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena ihaiva gaṃbhirāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:754: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na sā kācit saṃpattir yāṃ na pratilabhate. yā anena na pratilabdhavyā. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:760: tatra ca na sthātavyaṃ na pratiṣṭhātavyaṃ. jñānena ca darśanena ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā atikramitavyā.
K05adsp55-u:761: bodhisattvanyāmo 'vakramitavyaḥ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:763: abhyāśī bhavaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:764: bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsure loke dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K05adsp55-u:765: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ye tadanye dakṣiṇīyāḥ. śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tān
K05adsp55-u:766: sarvān abhibhūya gacchati. sarvākārajñatāyāś ca abhyāśī bhavaty. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K05adsp55-u:767: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati prajñāpāramitāṃ carati ca prajñāpāramitāyām
K05adsp55-u:768: avirahitaś ca prajñāpāramitāyā. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:770: dūrīkaroti śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī abhyāśī bhavaty anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K05adsp55-u:773: saced evaṃ jānāti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. atha tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānāti. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iha prajñāpāramitā,
K05adsp55-u:774: tam api na jānāti na paśyati. yasya prajñāpāramitā yena vā prajñāpāramitā yo vā prajñāpāramitayā
K05adsp55-u:775: [f. 227a] niryāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:777: na anayā prajñāpāramitayā kaścid dharmo niryāti sthitatvād dharmadhātos tathatāyā bhūtakoṭeḥ. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. ((57))
K05adsp55-u:780: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūc:
K05adsp55-u:781: carann api iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ śilapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:782: vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K05adsp55-u:783: sarvasattvān abhibhavati. kaḥ punar vādo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya.
K05adsp55-u:784: sulabdhāḥ taiḥ sattvail lābhāḥ sujīvitāṃ ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:785: cittaṃ krāmati. kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayanti.
K05adsp55-u:786: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā yair anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpāditam utpādayiṣyanti
K05adsp55-u:787: imāṃ ca prajnāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvantaḥ. atha śakro devānām indro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā
K05adsp55-u:788: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ
K05adsp55-u:789: samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma. avakīrya abhyavakīrya
K05adsp55-u:791: ye bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim adhyālambante,
K05adsp55-u:792: teṣām anena kuśalamūlena buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu sarvākārajñatādharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu. esām eva svayaṃbhūdharmāṇāṃ paripūrir
K05adsp55-u:793: eṣām eva anāsravadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu. na hi me bhagavann ekacittotpādo 'py utpadyate. yad bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nuttarasyai (AdSPG I 49)
K05adsp55-u:794: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthito vivarteta. na me bhagavann ekacittotpādo 'py utpadyate
K05adsp55-u:795: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartya śrāvakatve vā pratyekabodhau vā patet. api tu
K05adsp55-u:796: khalu janayec chandam anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. bhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ kuryād
K05adsp55-u:797: anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā arthakāmo hitakāmaḥ
K05adsp55-u:798: sukhakāmo yogakṣemakāmaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyaibhiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato
K05adsp55-u:799: bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vicunuyāt. kim iti vayaṃ tīrṇā atīrṇān sattvāṃs tārayema,
K05adsp55-u:800: kim iti vayaṃ muktā amuktān sattvān mocayema. kim iti vayam āśvāstā anāśvāstān sattvān āśvāsayema,
K05adsp55-u:801: [f. 227b] kim iti vayaṃ parinirvṛtā aparinirvṛtān sattvān parinirvāpayema. kiyat
K05adsp55-u:802: sa bhagavaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaved. yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:803: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta. ciracaritānām api bodhisattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:804: mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta avaivartikānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:805: tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta ekajātipratibaddhānām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:807: evam ukte bhagavāṃc chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:808: syāt kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgrapramāṇena parimāṇāṃ,
K05adsp55-u:809: na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃś cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ. syāt kauśika
K05adsp55-u:810: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau palāgrapramāṇena parimāṇāṃ. na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ (AdSPG I 50)
K05adsp55-u:811: cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ. syāt punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
K05adsp55-u:812: mahāsamudreṣu yaḥ apskandhas tasya apskandhasya śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā udakabindūnām
K05adsp55-u:813: utkṣipyamāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ. na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya
K05adsp55-u:814: pramāṇaṃ. evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:815: mārādhiṣṭhitā bhagavaṃs te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante,
K05adsp55-u:816: mārapakṣikā bhagavaṃs te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante,
K05adsp55-u:817: mārabhavanād bhagavaṃs te sattvāś cyutā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃś cittotpādān na anumodiṣyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:818: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi bhagavaṃs te sattvā ya imāṃś cittotpādān abhinirhṛtya
K05adsp55-u:819: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. anumoditavyās te cittotpādā ye 'nuttarasyai
K05adsp55-u:820: samyaksaṃbodhaye cittotpādā utpāditā. yeṣām aparityakto buddhaḥ aparityakto dharmaḥ
K05adsp55-u:823: anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāḥ. yathā na dvayasaṃjñā na advayasaṃjñā. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:824: evam etat kauśika evam etat. tathā yathā vadasi. ya imān kauśika cittotpādān anumodiṣyante,
K05adsp55-u:825: te kṣipram eva tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:826: ārāgya na virāgayiṣyanti. evaṃ te ebhir anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:828: na ca te jātv amanaāpaṃ rūpaṃ drakṣyanti. na amanaāpāñc chabdāṃc chroṣyanti.
K05adsp55-u:829: (AdSPG I 51) na amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti na amanaāpān rasān āsvādayiṣyanti na amanaāpān sparśān sprakṣyanti. na amanaāpān dharmān vijñāsyanti,
K05adsp55-u:830: na ca te jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti. buddhakṣetrād [f. 228a] buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyante,
K05adsp55-u:831: kuśalamūlān ca avaropayiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:832: tathā hi kauśika taiḥ kulaputraiś ca kuladuhitṛbhiś ca asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:834: tṛtīyabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad daśamībhūmīsthitānāṃ yāvad ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:835: mahāsattvānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni. taiś ca kuśalamūlair vivardhamānair
K05adsp55-u:836: anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhyāśībhavanti. te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
K05adsp55-u:837: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti. tad anena api kauśika paryāyeṇa
K05adsp55-u:838: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:839: kuśalamūlāny anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na cittaṃ
K05adsp55-u:840: na anyatra cittena. cārikāṃ caratām avaivartikānām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny
K05adsp55-u:841: anumodya anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na cittaṃ na anyatra
K05adsp55-u:842: cittena. athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad (AdSPG I 52)
K05adsp55-u:843: avocat: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K05adsp55-u:845: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:846: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan na ahaṃ bhagavan māyāṃ na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyāmi. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:847: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. yatra na māyā na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tac cittaṃ yac cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K05adsp55-u:848: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:849: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi. yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K05adsp55-u:850: āha: no hīdāṃ bhagavaṃ na ahaṃ bhagavann anyatra māyāyā nānyatra māyopamāc cittāt
K05adsp55-u:851: tad dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi. yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K05adsp55-u:853: kataman dharmam upadekṣyāmy astitā vā nāstitā vā veti?
K05adsp55-u:854: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti. yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K05adsp55-u:855: na ca asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:856: tathā hi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante. ye saṃkliśyeran vā vyavadāyeran vā. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:857: tathā hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā atyantatayā viviktā dhyānapāramitā atyantatayā viviktā
K05adsp55-u:858: vīryapāramitā atyantatayā viviktā kṣāntipāramitā atyantatayā viviktā śīlapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:860: atyantatayā viviktā yāvad bodhir atyantatayā vivikta. yaś ca atyantatayā vivikto
K05adsp55-u:861: dharmo [f. 228b] na sa bhāvayitavyo na vibhāvayitavyaḥ. nāpi sā kasyacid dharmasya
K05adsp55-u:862: āhartrī prajñāpāramitā atyantaviśuddhatvāt. atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā. kathaṃ
K05adsp55-u:863: prajñāpāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K05adsp55-u:865: tat kathaṃ viviktena viviktasya anubodho bhavati?
K05adsp55-u:867: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte evam etat. atyantaviviktā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā.
K05adsp55-u:868: atyantavivktā hi dhyānapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi vīryapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi
K05adsp55-u:869: kṣāntipāramitā atyantaviviktā hi śīlapāramitā atyantaviviktā hi dānapāramitā atyantaviviktā
K05adsp55-u:870: hi yāvad bodhiḥ atyantaviviktā hi yāvat sarvākārajñatā. yathā subhūte atyantaviviktā
K05adsp55-u:871: prajñāpāramitā. yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathā atyantaviviktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
K05adsp55-u:872: abhisaṃbudhyate. sacet subhūte prajñāpāramitā na atyantaviviktā syād yāvat sarvākārajñatā
K05adsp55-u:873: na atyantaviviktā syāt na sā syāt prajñāpāramitā yāvan na sā syāt sarvākārajñatā,
K05adsp55-u:874: tasmāt tarhi subhūte yathā prajñāpāramitā atyantaviviktā yathā yāvat sarvākārajñatā
K05adsp55-u:875: atyantaviviktā. evaṃ hi subhūte na prajñāpāramitām anāgamya anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
K05adsp55-u:876: abhisaṃbudhyate. na ca vivekena viveko 'bhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhyate ca anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:877: na ca anāgamya prajñāpāramitām abhisaṃbudhyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:878: gaṃbhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:880: gaṃbhīre subhūte arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. duṣkarakārakaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 54)
K05adsp55-u:882: ca arthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti. yaduta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:883: yathā ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi. na kiṃcid duṣkaraṃ karoti. kathaṃ duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:885: tathā hi bhagavaṃ so 'rtho nopalabhyate. yaḥ sākṣātkṛyeta,
K05adsp55-u:887: so 'pi dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt. anupalabhyamāneṣu bhagavaṃ sarvadharmeṣu
K05adsp55-u:888: katamo 'rthaḥ sākṣātkariṣyati. katamayā vā prajñāpāramitayā sākṣātkariṣyate. katamo
K05adsp55-u:889: vā dharmaḥ sākṣātkariṣyate. yaṃ sākṣātkṛtya nottrasyati. na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
K05adsp55-u:890: āpadya bhagavann anupalaṃbhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caraṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:891: sarvadharmeṣv anandhakāratām anuprāpnoti. saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:892: mahāsattvasya. cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati. na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
K05adsp55-u:893: āpadyate. evaṃ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. sa
K05adsp55-u:894: carāmi iti na samanupaśyati. prajñāpāramitām api na samanupasyati. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:895: abhisaṃbhotsya ity api na samanupaśyati. tasya khalu punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:897: dūrīkariṣyāmi śrāvakapratyekabhūmī āsanno 'smin [f. 229a] sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ na abhyavakāśasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:898: kasyacid ahaṃ dūre vā 'bhyāśe vā. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:899: abhadatvād acalatvād bhagavann abhyavakāśasya avikalpatvād bhagavann abhyavakāśasya. evam eva bhagavan (AdSPG I 55)
K05adsp55-u:900: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:901: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:902: avikalpatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃ māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:906: eṣa me dūre vā 'bhyāśe vā. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:907: avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya. evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:908: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na pratibimbasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:909: yena āraṃbaṇena pratibimbam utpannaṃ tat mama abhyāśe,
K05adsp55-u:910: ye punar atra upasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te me dūre. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:911: avikalpatvād bhagavan pratibimbasya. evam eva bhagavam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:912: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
K05adsp55-u:913: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:914: avikalpatvāt punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā. na hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ priyo vā apriyo vā asti. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:916: yasya priyo vā apriyo vā bhavet. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate,
K05adsp55-u:917: evam eva bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:920: avikalpatām upadāya. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na tathāgatanirmitasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:921: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
K05adsp55-u:922: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:923: avikalpatvād bhagavaṃs tathāgatasya tathāgatanirmitasya ca. evam eva bhagavan na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:924: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
K05adsp55-u:925: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mama abhyāśe. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato nirmitaṃ nirmimīta sa yasya kāryasya kṛte nirmitas tat kāryaṃ karoti,
K05adsp55-u:927: evam eva bhagavan yasya kāryasya kṛte prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kāryaṃ karoti,
K05adsp55-u:928: sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā nirvikalpā. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevasinā vā yantraṃ yuktaṃ syāt strivigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā,
K05adsp55-u:930: balīvardavigraho vā. tac ca yadṛśasya kāryasya kṛte kṛtaṃ tat kāryaṃ karoti. tac ca yantram avikalpaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:931: evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛte prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate,
K05adsp55-u:932: tat kāryaṃ karoti. sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā. athāyuṣmāñc chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:933: [f. 229b] kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāiva avikalpā utāho dhyānapāramitā api,
K05adsp55-u:936: dhyānapāramitā apy āyuṣmañc chāradvātīputra avikalpā. yāvad dānapāramitā apy avikalpā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:937: kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte rūpam apy avikalpaṃ yāvad vijñānam apy avikalpaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:938: cakṣur apy avikalpaṃ yāvad mano 'py avikalpaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:939: kiṃ punar rūpam apy avikalpaṃ (AdSPG I 57)
K05adsp55-u:942: apy avikalpaṃ yāvad manovijñānam apy avikalpaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:944: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā api vedanā avikalpā yāvan manahsaṃsparśajā api vedanā avikalpāḥ?
K05adsp55-u:945: kiṃ punar dhyānāny apramāṇāny ārūpyasamāpattayo 'py avikalpā?
K05adsp55-u:946: smṛtyupasthānāny api yāvan mārgo 'pi śūnyatā ānimittam apraṇihitam apy avikalpaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:947: kiṃ punar daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī
K05adsp55-u:948: mahākaruṇā apy avikalpāḥ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddharmā apy avikalpā bodhir apy avikalpā
K05adsp55-u:951: sarvadharmā apy āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra avikalpāḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:952: yady āyuṣmaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā apy avikalpāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:953: kuto 'yaṃ paṃcagatikaḥ saṃsāra iti bheda āgataḥ narakatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:954: kuta iyaṃ prabhāvanā śrotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ?
