K05adsp55-u:956: ye te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra sattvā viparyāsasamutthitaṃ karma abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
K05adsp55-u:957: teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇy āyatanāny abhinirvartante. cchandamūlakaṃ karmavipākaṃ parigṛhya
K05adsp55-u:960: kutaḥ punaḥ śrotaāpannā prabhāvyante sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā,
K05adsp55-u:962: kutas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyanta iti?
K05adsp55-u:963: avikalpataḥ āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra śrotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante (AdSPG I 58)
K05adsp55-u:966: avikalpato buddhāḥ avikalpato bodhiḥ. ye 'pi te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
K05adsp55-u:967: te 'py āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ avikalpā vikalpaprahīnāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:968: evam anāgatā apy avikalpā bhaviṣyanti. ye 'pi te śāradvatīputra etarhi daśasu dikṣu
K05adsp55-u:969: lokadhātuṣu pratyutpanne 'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhās
K05adsp55-u:970: te 'py āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ avikalpā vikalpaprahīṇāḥ. tad
K05adsp55-u:971: anena te āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:972: sarvadharmā avikalpā avikalpatathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya bhūtakoṭitathatān dharmadhātutathatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:973: pramāṇikṛtya. evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avikalpāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:975: avikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann avikalpān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhyate. ((58))
K05adsp55-u:978: atha āyuṣmañc charadvatīputra ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:979: sāre vatāyam [f. 230a] āyuṣmaṃ subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:980: carati. sāre vatāyaṃ carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. evam ukte āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ
K05adsp55-u:982: asāre vatāyaṃ caraty āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:983: tathā hy āyuṣmañc chāradvatīputra asārikā prajñāpāramitā yāvad asārikā sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:984: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asāram eva nopalabhate
K05adsp55-u:985: na samanupaśyati. kutaḥ punaḥ sāram upalapsyate. yāvad asārikāṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate.
K05adsp55-u:986: kutaḥ punaḥ sāram upalapsyate. atha saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhūn:
K05adsp55-u:987: namaskaraṇīyās te kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca yair anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K05adsp55-u:988: cittam utpāditaṃ ye ceha gaṃbhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti. atra
K05adsp55-u:989: ca arthe caranti. na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkurvanti. yāṃ sākṣātkṛtya śrāvakabhūmau
K05adsp55-u:990: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā avatiṣṭheran. anena api paryāyeṇa namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā
K05adsp55-u:991: mahāsattvā ya imān dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:993: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imān dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti yaya sākṣātkṛyayā
K05adsp55-u:994: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā avatiṣṭherann. idaṃ teṣāṃ devaputrā duṣkarataraṃ
K05adsp55-u:995: yad aprameya asaṃkhyeya aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti sannāhaṃ sannahyanti.
K05adsp55-u:996: te ca sattvā atyantatayā nopalabhyante yāṃ parinirvāpayeyuḥ. evaṃ cāran bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:997: mahāsattvaḥ saṃprasthito bhavaty anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye sarvasattvān vineṣyāmi
K05adsp55-u:999: yaḥ sattvān vinetavyaṃ manyeta. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:1001: ākāśaśūnyatayā sattvaśūnyatā draṣṭavyā. ākāśāsāratayā sattvāsāratā draṣṭavyā,
K05adsp55-u:1002: ākāśatucchatayā sattvatucchatā draṣṭavyā. anena api devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā
K05adsp55-u:1003: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye avidyamānānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛte sannāhaṃ sannahyanti. ākāśena
K05adsp55-u:1004: te sārdhaṃ vivaditukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛte sannāhaṃ sannahyanti. sa ca sannāho bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1005: mahāsattvena sannaddhas te ca sattvā nopalabhyante yeṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1006: mahāsattvena sannāhaḥ sannaddhas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1007: sattvaviviktatayā sannāhaviviktatā draṣṭavyā. saced evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
K05adsp55-u:1008: carati bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1012: subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ na avalīyate na saṃlīyate na cāsya mānasaṃ saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:1013: carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1014: kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na [f. 230b] saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ?
K05adsp55-u:1015: āha: asattvād bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1016: viviktatvāc chāntatvād anutpādatvād bhagavaṃ na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1017: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. anena bhagavan kāraṇena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:1018: tathā hi sa bhagavaṃ nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yatra vā saṃsīdet.
K05adsp55-u:1019: sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante. saced bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe
K05adsp55-u:1020: na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati. na līyate na avalīyate na saṃlīyate,
K05adsp55-u:1021: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate. carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:1022: tathā hi bhagavan sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante yo vā saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded
K05adsp55-u:1023: yatra vā saṃsīdet. evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sendrakair devāiḥ
K05adsp55-u:1025: na kevalaṃ subhūte sendrakair devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair namasyate. bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1026: mahāsattvo ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. ye 'pi te abhikrāntā abhikrāntavarṇāḥ
K05adsp55-u:1027: śubhakṛtsnā vṛhatphalāḥ yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ (AdSPG I 62)
K05adsp55-u:1028: mahāsattvaṃ namasyaṃti ya evaṃ prajñāparamitāyāṃ carati. ye 'pi te subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyāprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti,
K05adsp55-u:1029: te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti. ayaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1030: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati. yāvat
K05adsp55-u:1031: sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyati. yaṃ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1032: carantaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti. sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhatvapratipannako
K05adsp55-u:1033: dhārayitavyaḥ. yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarve
K05adsp55-u:1035: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tāvanto mārān pāpīyāṃso 'bhinirmimīta,
K05adsp55-u:1036: te sarve apratibalās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaṃ kartuṃ. dvābhyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1037: subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
K05adsp55-u:1039: sarvadharmaś ca anena sūnyatā vyavalokitā bhavanti. sarvasattvāś ca asya aparityaktā
K05adsp55-u:1040: bhavanti. ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo māhasattvo
K05adsp55-u:1041: durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato
K05adsp55-u:1042: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ?
K05adsp55-u:1044: buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ samanvāhṛyate. ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato
K05adsp55-u:1045: bodhisattvo mahāsasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. evaṃ (AdSPG I 63)
K05adsp55-u:1046: carantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya te devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. paryupāsiṣyante pariprakṣyanti paripraśnayiṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:1048: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra buddhabodhim anuprāpsyasi. tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ kulaputra anenaiva
K05adsp55-u:1049: vihāreṇa vihara yaduta śūnyatāvihāreṇa animittavihāreṇa apraṇihitavihāreṇa. [f. 231a] tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:1050: anena tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharann anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasy aśaraṇānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1051: sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasy atrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ trāṇāṃ bhaviṣyasy aparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1052: parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyasy alayanānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhaviṣyasy advīpānāṃ sattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1053: dvīpo bhaviṣyasy andhabhūtānāṃ sattvānām ālokabhūto bhaviṣyasi iti. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:1054: tathā hy anena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye 'pi
K05adsp55-u:1055: te aprameyāsaṃkheyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhaṃti dhṛyaṃte yāpayanti
K05adsp55-u:1056: dharmañ ca deśayaṃti bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā yo 'sau prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty ebhir
K05adsp55-u:1057: guṇaiḥ samanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitāguṇais tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K05adsp55-u:1058: nāmaṃ ca gotraṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ ca udānayaṃti. tadyathāpi
K05adsp55-u:1059: nāma subhūte aham etarhi ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo
K05adsp55-u:1060: dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi. sikhinaś ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1061: parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi. ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
K05adsp55-u:1063: samyaksaṃbuddhasya antike brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās
K05adsp55-u:1064: teṣām apy ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1065: deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi. ye 'pi te pūrvasyān diśi buddhā bhagavaṃtas tiṣṭhaṃti
K05adsp55-u:1067: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā
K05adsp55-u:1068: avirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1069: codānayanti. evaṃ ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād
K05adsp55-u:1070: yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavaṃtas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayaṃti,
K05adsp55-u:1071: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranty anayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitās
K05adsp55-u:1072: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti.
K05adsp55-u:1073: ye 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayaṃti,
K05adsp55-u:1075: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayaṃty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1076: evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
K05adsp55-u:1078: katameṣāṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpāś te buddhā bhagavaṃto dharman deśayaṃti. avaivartikānām atha
K05adsp55-u:1080: asti subhūte [f. 231b] bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avaivartikā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃti. asty avyākṛtakā bodhisattvā (AdSPG I 65)
K05adsp55-u:1081: mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃti. teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayaṃty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1084: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃte
K05adsp55-u:1085: 'nuśikṣamāṇarūpā viharanti. ime te subhūte avaivartikā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1086: te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. ye
K05adsp55-u:1087: 'pi te subhūte ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1088: caraṃti. teṣām api te buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharman deśayanty udānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1089: codānayaṃti. punar aparaṃ subhūte ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K05adsp55-u:1090: sarvadharmāṇām anutpattikatāyām adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
K05adsp55-u:1091: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
K05adsp55-u:1092: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā.
K05adsp55-u:1093: sarvadharmā riktakā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na ca anutpattikeṣu
K05adsp55-u:1094: dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā. eṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā
K05adsp55-u:1095: bhagavantaḥ saṃharṣayamāṇarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. yeṣām api subhūte
K05adsp55-u:1096: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavaṃto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharman
K05adsp55-u:1097: deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇāḥ
K05adsp55-u:1098: śrāvakabhūmi pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca vyākṛyaṃte te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. yasya
K05adsp55-u:1100: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavaṃto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā
K05adsp55-u:1101: dharman deśayanty udānaṃ codānayaṃti. sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avaivartikatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1102: sthāsyati. yatra sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1103: mahāsattvo gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na kāṃkṣiṣyati. na vicikitsiṣyati na dhandhāyiṣyate,
K05adsp55-u:1104: evam etad yathā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitam iti. sa punar eva vistareṇa
K05adsp55-u:1105: śroṣyaty akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya antikāt teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1108: imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitāṃ tathā adhimucyamāna avaivartikatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1109: sthāsyati. evaṃ bahukaro hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā śravaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1110: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyaṃte adhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti. tathātvāya pratipatsyante
K05adsp55-u:1111: tathātvāya sthitvā tathātvāya pratipadya sthāsyanti sarvākārajñātāyāṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1112: yat punar bhagayaṃ tathātvāya [f. 232a] sthitvā yat pratipadya na kaścid dharmam upalapsyate. kathaṃ sthāsyati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ?
K05adsp55-u:1113: yad bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhyate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati
K05adsp55-u:1114: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate ko vā tathatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1116: tathataiva tāvaṃ nopalabhyate kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tathatāyāṃ sthitvā (AdSPG I 67)
K05adsp55-u:1117: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:1118: yat subhūtir evam āha. na ca tathāgatanirmito 'nyaṃ kiṃcid dharmam upalabhate yas
K05adsp55-u:1119: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhet tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K05adsp55-u:1120: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayet. tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate. kaḥ punar vādo
K05adsp55-u:1121: yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K05adsp55-u:1122: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evam etat subhūte
K05adsp55-u:1123: evam etat tathā yathā vadasi. na subhūte tathāgatanirmito 'nyaṃ kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate.
K05adsp55-u:1124: yas tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhet tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta,
K05adsp55-u:1125: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayet. tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate kaḥ punar vādo
K05adsp55-u:1126: yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K05adsp55-u:1127: tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1128: utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1129: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā. dharmatā sthita evaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātur dharmasthititā
K05adsp55-u:1130: dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ. neha subhūte tathatāyāṃ kaścit sthāsyati. na tathatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1131: sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. na tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman
K05adsp55-u:1133: tathā hy atra tathatāyāṃ notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ. tad yasya dharmasya nāpy utpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ (AdSPG I 68)
K05adsp55-u:1134: na tatra kaścit sthāsyati. nāpi tatra sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K05adsp55-u:1135: kutaḥ punas tatra sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. atha śakro
K05adsp55-u:1137: gaṃbhīreyaṃ bhagavaṃ. prajñāpāramitā. duṣkarakārakā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ. tat kasya
K05adsp55-u:1138: na ca nāma bhagavaṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate nāpi kaścit tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati nāpi
K05adsp55-u:1139: kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate nāpi kaścid dharman deśayati. tatra
K05adsp55-u:1140: ca nāvalīyante na caiṣāṃ kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati. atha subhūti
K05adsp55-u:1141: sthaviraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1142: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣām iha gaṃbhīreṣu
K05adsp55-u:1143: dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhaṃdhāyitatvaṃ veti. śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu
K05adsp55-u:1144: kasyātra kāṃkṣayitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
K05adsp55-u:1145: śakra āha: yad subhūtir sthaviro nirdiśati. tat sarvaṃ śūnyatām eva ārabhya nirdiśati.
K05adsp55-u:1146: na kvacit sajjati. tadyathāpi nāma iṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjaty evam eva
K05adsp55-u:1147: subhūte sthavirasya [f. 232b] dharmadeśanā na kvacit sajjati. ((59))
K05adsp55-u:1150: atha śakro devanām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1151: kaceid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmatām samyak vyākurvaṃ vyākaromi?
K05adsp55-u:1153: sa khalu tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmatāṃ vyākaroṣi. śakra āha:
K05adsp55-u:1154: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad idaṃ subhūte sthavirasya pratibhāti. sarvaṃ taṃc chūnyatām
K05adsp55-u:1155: evārabhya pratibhāty ānimittam eva apraṇihitam evārabhya pratibhāti. smṛtyupasthānāny
K05adsp55-u:1156: evārabhya pratibhāti yāvan mārgam evārabhya pratibhāti. adhyātmaśūnyatām evārabhya
K05adsp55-u:1157: pratibhāti yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām evārabhya pratibhāti. yāvad bodhim evārabhya
K05adsp55-u:1159: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthavira śūnyatayā viharan dānapāramitām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar
K05adsp55-u:1160: vādo yaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ carati. śīlapāramitām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1161: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K05adsp55-u:1162: eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. smṛtyupasthānāny eva
K05adsp55-u:1163: nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo ya smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati. yāvan mārgam eva nopalabhate.
K05adsp55-u:1164: kaḥ punar vādo yo mārgaṃ bhāvayati. adhyātmaśūnyatām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo
K05adsp55-u:1166: bhavayati. yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo 'bhāvasvabhāśūnyatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1167: bhāvayati. āryasatyāny eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yo āryasatyāni bhāvayati. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1168: dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīr eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yo dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīn
K05adsp55-u:1169: bhāvayati. balāny eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo balāni bhāvayati. vaiśāradyāny
K05adsp55-u:1170: eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo vaiśāradyāny abhinirharati. pratisaṃvida eva nopalabhate
K05adsp55-u:1171: kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ pratisāṃvido 'bhinirharati. mahākaruṇām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar
K05adsp55-u:1172: vādo yo mahākaruṇāvihārī bhavati. āveṇikabuddhadharmān eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar
K05adsp55-u:1173: vādo ya āveṇikabuddhadharmān abhinirharati. bodhim eva nopalabhate,
K05adsp55-u:1174: kaḥ punar vādo yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. sarvākārajñatām eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar
K05adsp55-u:1175: vādo yas sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tathāgatam eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yas
K05adsp55-u:1176: tathāgato bhavati. anutpādam eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yo 'nutpādaṃ sākṣātkaroti.
K05adsp55-u:1177: lakṣaṇāny eva nopalabhate kaḥ punar vādo yasya lakṣaṇāni kāye bhavaṃti. anuvyaṃjanāny
K05adsp55-u:1178: eva nopalabhate. kaḥ punar vādo yasya anuvyaṃjanāni kāye bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1179: sarvadharmaviviktavihārī hi kausika subhūti sthavira anupalambhavihāri śūnyatāvihārī
K05adsp55-u:1180: ānimittavihārī apraṇihitavihārī. ya eṣa kauśika subhūte sthavirasya vihāraḥ sa bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:1181: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyaṃ carato vihārasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti. sahasratamīm
K05adsp55-u:1182: api śatasahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm [f. 233a] api saṃkhyām api kalām (AdSPG I 71)
K05adsp55-u:1183: api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1184: tathāgatavihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
K05adsp55-u:1185: yo vihāro yaś ca śrāvakānāṃ vihāro yaś ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ vihāra eṣāṃ vihārāṇām
K05adsp55-u:1186: ayam eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato vihāro 'grya ākhyāyate
K05adsp55-u:1187: jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha ākhyāyate varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta ākhyāyāte anuttaro niruttara ākhyāyate.
K05adsp55-u:1188: tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām agryatāṃ gantukāmena
K05adsp55-u:1191: atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabūmim
K05adsp55-u:1192: atikrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakramya buddhadharmān
K05adsp55-u:1193: paripūrayati. buddhadharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatājñānam anuprāpnoti. sarvākārajñatājñānam
K05adsp55-u:1194: anuprāpnuvantas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:1195: atha tasyām eva parṣadi devās trayastriṃśā māndaravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantam
K05adsp55-u:1196: avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma. ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ ca bhikṣuśatam
K05adsp55-u:1197: utthāyasanād ekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇāṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
K05adsp55-u:1198: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya animiṣābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ bhagavantaṃ prekṣamāṇā
K05adsp55-u:1199: namasyanti sma. atha buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ te 'ñjalayaḥ praṇamayanto māṇḍāravaiḥ
K05adsp55-u:1200: puṣpaiḥ paripūrṇā abhūvan. te tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais (AdSPG I 72)
K05adsp55-u:1201: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma. avakiranto 'bhyavakiranto 'bhiprakirantaḥ evaṃ c)
K05adsp55-u:1203: vayaṃ bhagavann anena kuśalamūlena anena uttamavihāreṇa viharema. yatra agatiḥ. sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ.
K05adsp55-u:1204: atha bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarṣīd. dharmatā khalu punar buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitam āviṣkurvanti,
K05adsp55-u:1205: atha tāvad eva anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo mukhadvārān niścaranti,
K05adsp55-u:1207: te trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena spharitvā punar eva āgamya bhagavantaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1208: triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhany antardhīyante sma. athāyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād
K05adsp55-u:1209: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
K05adsp55-u:1211: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkuraṇe,
K05adsp55-u:1212: na ahetu na apratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitam āviṣkurvanti. evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1213: idam ānanda ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śataṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:1214: abhisaṃbhotsyante. avakīrṇakusumanāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke
K05adsp55-u:1215: bhaviṣyanti. teṣāṃ khalu punar ānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1217: bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati. samaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati. samāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati.
K05adsp55-u:1218: yaduta varṣasahasraṃ. yato yato 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanty [f. 233b] abhiniṣkramya pravrajiṣyanti.
K05adsp55-u:1219: pravrajya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. tatra tatra pañcavarṇikānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1220: kusumānāṃ kusumavarṣam abhipravarṣiṣyati. tasmāt tarhy ānanda uttamavihāreṇa vihartukāmena
K05adsp55-u:1221: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. tathāgatavihāreṇa vihartukāmena
K05adsp55-u:1222: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
K05adsp55-u:1223: vā kuladuhitā vā iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. niṣṭhā tena ānanda
K05adsp55-u:1226: tuṣitebhyo vā devanikāyebhyaś cyutvā iha upapanno. manuṣyeṣv eveyaṃ gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1227: vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati. tuṣiteṣu vā devanikāyeṣv iyaṃ gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1228: vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati. tathāgatavyavalokitās te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K05adsp55-u:1229: draṣṭavyā ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
K05adsp55-u:1230: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti
K05adsp55-u:1231: dhārayiṣyanti. vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:1232: bodhisattvayānikāṃś ca pudgalāṃś ceha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyaty anuśāsiṣyati niṣṭhā tena ānanda bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena
K05adsp55-u:1233: saṃmukhaṃ mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikād iyaṃ (AdSPG I 74)
K05adsp55-u:1234: gaṃbhirā prajñāpāramitā śrutā bhaviṣyaty udgṛhītā ca dhāritā ca vā citā ca paryavāptā ca bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:1235: tatra ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni bhaviṣyanti. veditavyam ānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā,
K05adsp55-u:1236: na mayā śrāvakāṇām antike kusalamūlāny avaropitāni,
K05adsp55-u:1237: na śrāvakāṇām antikād iyaṃ gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:1239: arthataś ca dharmataś ca vyañjanataś ca anugamiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:1240: niṣṭhā ānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā gantavyā,
K05adsp55-u:1241: saṃmukhībhūto me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
K05adsp55-u:1242: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na pratikrokṣyanti
K05adsp55-u:1243: na prativakṣyanti śrutvā ca prasādaṃ pratilapsyante,
K05adsp55-u:1244: pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ sa ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ. avaropitakuśalumūlaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1245: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhitāḥ. kiṃ cāpy ānanda yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatānām
K05adsp55-u:1247: na tad visaṃvadiṣyati. śrāvakatve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā. api tu khalu punar ānanda supratividdhena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1250: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [f. 234a] caratā. supratividdho hy ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃc,
K05adsp55-u:1251: chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran,
K05adsp55-u:1253: caran na śrāvakatve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyati. tasmāt tarhy ānanda anuparindāmi
K05adsp55-u:1254: te imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ. sacet tvam ānanda yo mayā dharmo deśitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1255: sthāpayitvā sarvāṃ tāṃ dharmadeśanām udgṛhya paryavāpsa punar eva nāśayeḥ,
K05adsp55-u:1257: na me tvam ānanda tāvatāparādhye. sacen tvam ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya
K05adsp55-u:1258: ekapadam api nāśayes tāvatā me tvam ānanda aparādhye. sacet tvam ānanda imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1259: prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya punar eva na nāśaye punar eva notsṛjeś tāvatā me tvam ānanda
K05adsp55-u:1261: anuparindāmi te imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathodgṛhya dhāraye. vācayet paryavāpnuyā
K05adsp55-u:1262: sumanasikṛtā ca kartavyā suparigṛhitā ca suparyavāptā ca svādhāritā ca kartavyā susanāptair
K05adsp55-u:1263: akṣarapadavyañjanai suniruktā ca sūdgṛhītā ca kartavyā. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro
K05adsp55-u:1264: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K05adsp55-u:1265: paryavāpsyaty atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhir dhāritā
K05adsp55-u:1266: bhaviṣyati. yo hi kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K05adsp55-u:1267: udgrahīṣyaty atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhir anuparigṛhītā
K05adsp55-u:1268: bhaviṣyati. ya icchet mama ānanda saṃmukhībhūtaṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ. (AdSPG I 76)
K05adsp55-u:1269: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhi.
K05adsp55-u:1270: teneyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā udgṛhya
K05adsp55-u:1271: dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā,
K05adsp55-u:1272: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ. prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatāṃ gurukurvatāṃ mānayatāṃ pūjayatām ahaṃ ca tena pūjito bhaviṣyāmy,
K05adsp55-u:1273: atītānāgatapratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhaviṣyanti. yo hi kaścid ānanda
K05adsp55-u:1274: asyāṃ gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ gauravaṃ ca premaṃ ca prasādaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1275: ca utpādayiṣyati atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike tena premaś
K05adsp55-u:1276: ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhaviṣyati. yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyaś ca manaāpaś ca aparityaktaś ca,
K05adsp55-u:1277: tan te ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā ca manaāpā ca aparityaktā ca bhavatu. yathaikapadam
K05adsp55-u:1278: api te ito gaṃbhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā na nāśayitavyaṃ. subahv api te ānanda bhāṣeyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1279: prajñāpāramitāyā parindānām ārabhya. saṃkṣiptena ānanda yādṛśa eva ahaṃ te śāstās
K05adsp55-u:1281: tasmāt tarhy ānanda apramāṇayā parindānayā te 'ham imāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuparindāmi.
K05adsp55-u:1282: tasmāt tarhy ānanda sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata ārocayāmi. yasyāparityakto
K05adsp55-u:1283: buddhaḥ aparityakto dharmaḥ aparityaktaḥ saṃghaḥ aparityaktā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannā
K05adsp55-u:1284: buddhā bhagavanta. aparityaktā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhis,
K05adsp55-u:1285: tasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā aparityaktā bhavatu. iyam asmākam anuśāsanī. yo hi kaścid ānanda (AdSPG I 77)
K05adsp55-u:1286: kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā imaṃ gaṃbhirāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati. dhārayiṣyati
K05adsp55-u:1287: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pattīyeṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. pareṣāṃ cemāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1288: gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa vistareṇa ākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:1289: prasthāpayiṣyati vivariṣyati vibhajiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati sa khalu
K05adsp55-u:1290: punar ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣipram eva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K05adsp55-u:1291: abhyāśī bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1292: prajnāpāramitāniryātā hy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir. ye
K05adsp55-u:1293: 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām api
K05adsp55-u:1294: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye 'pi te
K05adsp55-u:1295: ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgāte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām api
K05adsp55-u:1296: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye 'pi te
K05adsp55-u:1297: ānanda etarhi pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād
K05adsp55-u:1298: yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti
K05adsp55-u:1299: dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva
K05adsp55-u:1300: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tasmāt tarhy ānanda anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
K05adsp55-u:1301: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyaṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:1302: eṣā hy ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ janetrī yaduta prajñāpāramitā. ye hi kecid (AdSPG I 78)
K05adsp55-u:1303: ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣiṣyanti. sarve te niryāsyanty
K05adsp55-u:1304: anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tasmāt tarhy ānanda imāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ bhūyasyā mātrayā
K05adsp55-u:1306: eṣā hy ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakośaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:1307: akṣayo hy eṣa dharmakośo yaduta ṣaṭpāramitākośaḥ. ye 'pi te ānanda pūrvasyāṃ diśi
K05adsp55-u:1308: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
K05adsp55-u:1309: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1310: ca deśayanti. te 'py ānanda buddhā bhagavanta iha eva ṣaṭpāramitākośād dharmaṃ deśayanti.
K05adsp55-u:1311: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py
K05adsp55-u:1312: atraiva ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā dharman
K05adsp55-u:1313: deśayanta. ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgāte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K05adsp55-u:1314: te 'py atraiva ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K05adsp55-u:1315: dharman deśayanti. [f. 235a] ye 'pi te anantātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1316: bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā parinirvṛtāś ca parinirvānti
K05adsp55-u:1317: ca parinirvāpayiṣyanti ca. sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvavakabhūmim
K05adsp55-u:1318: ārabhya dharman deśayes tayā ca dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
K05adsp55-u:1319: sattvās te sarve arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na
K05adsp55-u:1321: tvam ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaikapadam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayeḥ,
K05adsp55-u:1324: śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet. yā ca paurvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K05adsp55-u:1325: lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nupūrvacaramam arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryus teṣāṃ ca arhatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1326: yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu. tat kiṃ manyase
K05adsp55-u:1327: ānanda api nu tad bahu bhavet?
K05adsp55-u:1328: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:1329: ataḥ sa ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam api,
K05adsp55-u:1330: tiṣṭhatv ānandaikadivasaḥ saced ānanda ardhadivasam api,
K05adsp55-u:1331: tiṣṭhatv ānanda ardhadivasaḥ. saced ānanda yāvat purobhaktam api,
K05adsp55-u:1332: saced yāvan nāḍikāntaraṃ vā saced yāvad acchaṭāntaraṃ vā,
K05adsp55-u:1333: saced yāvat kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā muhūrttaṃ vā. ayam eva ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveti
K05adsp55-u:1334: yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1335: dharman deśayet sa sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1336: ca kuśalamūlam abhibhavati. sacet punar ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1337: pudgalānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayet antaśa ekadivasam apy ardhadivasam
K05adsp55-u:1338: api purobhaktam api nāḍikāntaram api kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā muhūrttaṃ vā,
K05adsp55-u:1339: ayam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlam abhibhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1341: ātmanā ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ paraṃ ca anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05adsp55-u:1342: samādāpayati saṃharṣayati samuttejayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. evam ānanda bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1343: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu,
K05adsp55-u:1344: yāvan mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃ kuśalamulair vivardhamānaḥ asthānam ānanda anavakāśo yad anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ parihīyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1345: asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1346: tathā sthitānām eva puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa
K05adsp55-u:1347: abhisaṃskṛtena sarve te akṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1348: bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharman deśayantaṃ sāgaropamayā parṣadā akṣobhyayā,
K05adsp55-u:1349: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
K05adsp55-u:1350: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ [f. 235b] kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
K05adsp55-u:1352: bodhisattvaiś ca mahāsattvaiḥ sāgaropamabuddhibhiḥ. atha bhagavān punar eva tam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ
K05adsp55-u:1353: pratisaṃhṛtavān pratisaṃhṛte ca tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre tāś catasraḥ parṣado na
K05adsp55-u:1354: bhūyaḥ paśyanti tam akṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1355: śrāvakān vā bodhisattvayānikān vā pudgalaṃs, tac ca (AdSPG I 81)
K05adsp55-u:1356: buddhakṣetram akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na bhūyaḥ paśyanti,
K05adsp55-u:1357: na bhūyo buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaś cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1358: pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāras. tena tena bhūyaḥ paśyanti. atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayata:
K05adsp55-u:1359: paśyasi tvam ānanda tad akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ ca akṣobhyam tathāgataṃ taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghaṃ ca?
K05adsp55-u:1360: āha: cakṣuṣo 'pi bhagavaṃs tad buddhakṣetraṃ nābhāsam āgacchati. nāpi sa tathāgato nāpi sa bhikṣusaṃgho nāpi sa bodhisattvasaṃghaḥ. bhagavān
K05adsp55-u:1361: evam eva ānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchanti. na dharmo dharmasya ābhāsam
K05adsp55-u:1362: āgacchati. na dharmo dharmaṃ paśyati. na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. yathā punar eva akṣobhyas
K05adsp55-u:1363: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas te ca śrāvakās te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalās
K05adsp55-u:1364: tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ na cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchati. evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmā na
K05adsp55-u:1365: cakṣuṣa ābhāsam āgacchanti. na dharmo dharmasya ābhāsam āgacchati. na dharmo dharmaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1366: paśyati. na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. sarvadharmā hy ānanda ajānakāḥ apaśyakāḥ akriyāsamarthāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1367: nirīhakā agrāhyā hy ānanda sarvadharmā ākaśanirīhakatayā,
K05adsp55-u:1369: avedakā hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cittavigatatvāt. viṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇatvād asārakatāṃ copādāya. evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś (AdSPG I 82)
K05adsp55-u:1370: carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na ca kiṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇa ānanda
K05adsp55-u:1371: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. sarvapāramitāḥ paripūrayitukāmena
K05adsp55-u:1372: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. eṣā śikṣā agryā ākhyāyate
K05adsp55-u:1373: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā ākhyāyate anuttarā niruttarā ākhyāyate,
K05adsp55-u:1374: sarvalokahitāya sarvalokasukhāya. anāthānāṃ nāthakarī huddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā.
K05adsp55-u:1375: yatra sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iman trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
K05adsp55-u:1376: dakṣiṇena pāṇinābhyutkṣipya punar eva nikṣipeyuḥ na ca teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ bhaved,
K05adsp55-u:1377: utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur nikṣipto vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1378: iyaṃ sā ānanda prajñāpāramitā yatra śikṣitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu
K05adsp55-u:1379: dharmeṣv asaṃgaṃ jñānadarśanam utpannaṃ. yāvantya ānanda śikṣā sarvāsāṃ śikṣāṇām
K05adsp55-u:1380: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate varā pravarā ākhyāyate.
K05adsp55-u:1381: praṇītā ākhyāyate anuttarā niruttarā ākhyāyate. ākāśasya sa ānanda [f. 236a] pramāṇaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1382: vā paryantaṃ vodgrahītavyaṃ manyeta. yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1384: apramāṇā hy ānanda prajñāpāramitā. na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇam ākhyātaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1385: nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyā hy ānanda pramāṇabaddhā na prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā. ānanda āha:
K05adsp55-u:1390: viviktatvād ānanda prajñāpārāmitā apramāṇabaddhā. ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvann atīte
K05adsp55-u:1391: 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvitā.
K05adsp55-u:1392: na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣayaṃ gatā. ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatāḥ
K05adsp55-u:1393: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvayiṣyanti. na ca
K05adsp55-u:1394: prajñāpāramitā kṣeṣyate. ye pi 'te ānandaitarhi daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1395: samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpāyanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K05adsp55-u:1396: te 'pi buddha bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prabhāvyante na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣiyate. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:1397: ākāśaṃ sa ānanda kṣapayitavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kṣapayitavyaṃ manyeta.
K05adsp55-u:1398: na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate. evaṃ na dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1399: kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate. na hy eṣāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1401: yeṣām utpādo nāsti kutas teṣāṃ kṣayaḥ prajñāsyate?
K05adsp55-u:1402: atha bhagavān jihvendriyam abhinirmāpayya sarvāntaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ jihvendriyeṇa saṃcchādya āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayata:
K05adsp55-u:1403: tasmād tarhy ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vistareṇa cakṣīthā deśayeḥ saṃprakāśayeḥ prajñapayeḥ prasthāpayeḥ vivarer vivarer uttānīkuryād vistareṇa (AdSPG I 84)
K05adsp55-u:1404: saṃprakāśayeḥ. iha hy ānanda gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattsayānikair
K05adsp55-u:1405: vā pudgalaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ. yatra yathānuśiṣṭā śikṣamāṇā svasu svasu bhūmiṣu sthāsyaṃti. iyaṃ punar ānanda gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvākṣarāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1406: iyam ānanda gaṃbhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvadhāraṇīnāṃ mukhaṃ yatra dhāraṇīmukhe bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1407: mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. imān dhāraṇīn dhārayatāṃ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānāṃ sarvapratibhānapratisaṃvida
K05adsp55-u:1408: āmukhībhavanti. iyam ānanda prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
K05adsp55-u:1409: akṣayaḥ saddharmakośaḥ ukto mayā. tasmāt tarhy ānanda ārocayāmi te prativedayāmi
K05adsp55-u:1410: te ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati. paryavāpṣyati.
K05adsp55-u:1412: iyaṃ sā ānanda prajñāpāramitā dhāraṇy uktā mayā. yān tvaṃ prajñāpāramitādhāraṇīn
K05adsp55-u:1417: gaṃbhirā vateyam tathāgatānāṃ samyakambuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ. yannv ahaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛccheyaṃ. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1418: akṣayā hi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:1419: ākāśa akṣayatvāt subhūte akṣayā prajñāpāramitā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1422: rūpa akṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākṣayatvāt
K05adsp55-u:1423: subhūte prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. dānapāramitā akṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1424: abhinirhartavyā. yāvat sarvākārajñatā akṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1425: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1427: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. dānapāramitā ākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1428: abhinirhartavyā. śīlapāramitā ākāśāakṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. kṣāntipāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1429: ākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. vīryapāramitā ākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1430: abhinirhartavyā. dhyānapāramitā ākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. yāvat
K05adsp55-u:1431: sarvākārajñatākāśākṣayatvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. punar aparaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:1432: avidyākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. saṃskārākāśāakṣayatvena
K05adsp55-u:1434: abhinirhartavyā. vijñānākaśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1435: abhinirhartavyā. nāmarūpākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1436: abhinirhartavyā. ṣaḍāyatanākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1437: abhinirhartavyā. sparśākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1438: abhinirhartavyā. vedanākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1439: tṛṣṇākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1440: upādānākāśāakṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1441: bhavākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1442: jātyākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1444: mahāsattvena prajñapāramitā [f. 237a] abhinirhartavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1445: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K05adsp55-u:1447: dharmo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇnasya yadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati. evaṃ vyavalokayaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1448: pratītyasamutpādaṃ sarvajñatājñānaṃ pratilabhate. ya kaścit subhūte anena ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa
K05adsp55-u:1449: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati. sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā
K05adsp55-u:1451: vā sthāsyati. sthāsyati so 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikā pudgalā vivartante,
K05adsp55-u:1452: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanasikārān anāgamya vivartante. na ca jānaṃti kathaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1454: vyavalokitavyaḥ. ye 'pi kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikā pudgalā vivartante sarve
K05adsp55-u:1455: te idam upāyakauśalam anāgamya vivartaṃte 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhe. ye 'pi kecit
K05adsp55-u:1456: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivartaṃte 'nuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve te
K05adsp55-u:1457: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na vivartante 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhe. upāyakauśalena
K05adsp55-u:1458: caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1459: vyavalokitavyā abhinirhartavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1460: vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ paśyaty ahetukam utpadyamānam na kaṃcid dharmaṃ nityaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1461: samanupaśyati na nirudhyamānaṃ. na kaṃcid dharmam ātmataḥ samanupaśyati. na sattvato
K05adsp55-u:1462: na jīvato na jaṃtuto na manujato na mānavato na poṣato na pudgalato na kārakato na
K05adsp55-u:1463: kārāpakato na utthāpakato na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedayitrīkato na jānakato na paśyakataḥ,
K05adsp55-u:1464: na nityataḥ samanupaśyati na anityato na sukhato na duḥkhato na ātmato na anātmato
K05adsp55-u:1465: na śāntato na aśāntataḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo
K05adsp55-u:1466: vyavalokayitavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā. yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva (AdSPG I 88)
K05adsp55-u:1469: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmānaṃ vā anātmānaṃ vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatām na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā,
K05adsp55-u:1471: śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā. yasmiṃ subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp55-u:1472: tasmim [f. 237b] samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati.
K05adsp55-u:1473: tam api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati. yena prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyet. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1474: na samanupaśyati. vīryapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati. kṣāntipāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati.
K05adsp55-u:1475: śīlapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati. dānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati. yāvad bodhiṃ na samanupaśyati.
K05adsp55-u:1476: tam api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati. yena dharmeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyet. yena ca dharmeṇa
K05adsp55-u:1477: sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ kuryāt tam api na samanupaśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1478: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. sarvadharma anupalaṃbhayogena. yasmiṃ
K05adsp55-u:1479: subhūte samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharma anupalabhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati
K05adsp55-u:1480: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃ chokaśalyasamarpito bhavati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitroḥ kālagatayo śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati. parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ,
K05adsp55-u:1481: evam eva subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
K05adsp55-u:1482: sarvadharma anupalabhamānasya śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati. parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:1483: kim eka eva bhagavaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃ parameṇa śokaśalyena samarpito bhavati. utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātu mārā pāpiyāṃsas (AdSPG I
K05adsp55-u:1484: te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samarpitā bhavaṃti?
K05adsp55-u:1486: ye 'pi te subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve parameṇa
K05adsp55-u:1487: śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavaṃti. svakasvakeṣu ca āsaneṣu na ramante. yadā bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1488: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahito bhavati. evaṃ viharato bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:1489: mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate gādhaṃ na labhate. yatra
K05adsp55-u:1490: gṛhītvā vivartayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipram anuttarāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1492: viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1493: śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā. vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
K05adsp55-u:1494: gacchati. prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1495: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchaṃti. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1496: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
K05adsp55-u:1497: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā. prajñāpāramitā kathaṃ bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
K05adsp55-u:1499: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānaṃ dadan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tad
K05adsp55-u:1500: dānaṃ dadāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
K05adsp55-u:1501: gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā [f. 238a] bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
K05adsp55-u:1502: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlaṃ rakṣan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs tac chīlaṃ rakṣati. evaṃ (AdSPG I 90)
K05adsp55-u:1503: khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
K05adsp55-u:1504: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāṃtyā saṃpādayaṃ. sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. pariṇāmayaṃs
K05adsp55-u:1505: tāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1506: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1508: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs
K05adsp55-u:1509: tad vīryam ārabhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1510: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1512: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni samāpadyamānaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs
K05adsp55-u:1513: tāni dhyānāni samāpadyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1514: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1516: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃs
K05adsp55-u:1517: tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1518: bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. athāyuṣmāñc subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1519: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1521: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānan dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ (AdSPG I 91)
K05adsp55-u:1522: manaskarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. śīlapāramitāṃ tasmiṃ samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1523: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1525: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ yan te parigrāhakā ākrośaṃti
K05adsp55-u:1526: vā paribhāṣanti vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaraṃti sa na teṣām antike
K05adsp55-u:1527: cittam āghātayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1529: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyaṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1531: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ yan te parigrāhakā akrośanti
K05adsp55-u:1532: vā paribhāṣante vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaraṃti tasyākruśyamānasya
K05adsp55-u:1533: vā paribhāṣyamānasya vā asahyābhir vā paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaryamāṇasya vā dānabuddhir
K05adsp55-u:1534: eva bhavati parityāgabuddhir eva bhavati. dātavyam eva mayā
K05adsp55-u:1535: dānaṃ na mayā dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1536: sa kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ [f. 238b] parigṛhṇāti.
K05adsp55-u:1537: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1539: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
K05adsp55-u:1540: anyatra sarvākārajñātāyām eva asya cittaṃ na pravartate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (AdSPG I 92)
K05adsp55-u:1542: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo upāyakauśalena dānan dadan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1544: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānaṃ parityajato māyābuddhir
K05adsp55-u:1545: sadā dāne pratyupasthitā bhavati. tena ca dānena na kasyacid sattvasya upakāraṃ vā
K05adsp55-u:1546: apakaraṃ vā paśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthita.
K05adsp55-u:1551: kathaṃ bhagavān bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1553: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yaḥ kāyiko vā vāciko vā
K05adsp55-u:1554: caitasiko vā saṃcaras tena saṃcareṇa śrāvakabhūmiṃ. vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā na
K05adsp55-u:1555: parāmṛśati. sa tatra ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na sattvān jīvitād vyavaropayati nādattam
K05adsp55-u:1556: ādadāti. na kāmeṣu mithyācarati na mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣate. na piśunāṃ vācāṃ bhāṣate. na
K05adsp55-u:1557: paruṣāṃ vācāṃ bhāṣate. na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:1558: na abhidhyālur bhavati na vyāpannacitto bhavati. na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati. sa tatra
K05adsp55-u:1559: śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yad dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthakebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthakebhyo
K05adsp55-u:1560: yānaṃ yānārthakebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthakebhyaḥ puṣpāṇi puṣpārthakebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthakebhyo
K05adsp55-u:1561: gandhān gandhārthakebhyo vilepanāṃ vilepanārthakebhyaḥ śayanāsanaṃ śayanāsanārthakebhyaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1562: upāśrayam upāśrayārthakebhyaḥ prājīvikaṃ prājīvikārthakebhyaḥ upakaraṇam upakaranārthakebhyaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1563: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti. tac ca dānaṃ sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1564: sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. tathā ca pariṇāmayati.
K05adsp55-u:1565: yathā pariṇāmo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu
K05adsp55-u:1568: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1570: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya sacet sarvasattvāgamyāṃgapratyaṅgāni
K05adsp55-u:1571: cchittvā cchittvā gaccheyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekacittotpādo 'pi
K05adsp55-u:1572: na kṣubhyati na vyāpadyate anyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:1573: sulabdhā me lābhā yatra hi nāma mama sarvasattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchittvā cchittvā
K05adsp55-u:1574: gacchanti. anena ca ahaṃ kāyaparityāgena. divyaṃ vajramayaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ pratilapsye.
K05adsp55-u:1575: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1577: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1579: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kāyena ca cittena ca vīryaṃ na sraṃsayati. sarvasattvā
K05adsp55-u:1580: mayā uttārayitavyā saṃsārād amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1581: mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1582: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1584: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1585: caturthaṃ yāvan nirodhaṃ samāpadyate. na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmim
K05adsp55-u:1586: adhyālambate. anyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati. iha mayā samādhipāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 95)
K05adsp55-u:1587: sthitvā sarvasattvā saṃsārāt parimocayitavyā iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05adsp55-u:1588: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1590: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlāpāramitāyāṃ sthito na kaṃcid dharmaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1591: paśyati na asaṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na bhāvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na abhāvam asaṃskṛtaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1592: paśyati. na nimittaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na animittam asaṃskṛtaṃ paśyati. na kasyacid
K05adsp55-u:1593: dharmasya astitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vā samanupaśyati. anyatra sarvadharmatathatāṃ na vyativartaṃte.
K05adsp55-u:1594: tayā ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalena ca na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau
K05adsp55-u:1595: vā patati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthita prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1596: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇātī?
K05adsp55-u:1598: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānan dadato
K05adsp55-u:1599: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā ākrośeyuḥ paribhāṣerann aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā
K05adsp55-u:1600: cchintyuś tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:1601: dātavyam eva mayaitebhya sattvebhya na mayā dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ. sa teṣāṃ sattvānām
K05adsp55-u:1602: annam annārthikebhyo dadāti. pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo dadāti. yāvad anyatarānyatarān
K05adsp55-u:1603: mānuṣyakāṃ pariṣkārāṃ dadāti. sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1604: kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati. yathā pariṇāmayatas triṣu buddhiṣu (AdSPG I 96)
K05adsp55-u:1605: na pravartate. kaḥ pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati. kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1606: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1608: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa
K05adsp55-u:1609: na kaṃcit sattvaṃ jīvitād vyavaropayati. nādattam ādadāti na kāmeṣu mithyācarati
K05adsp55-u:1610: na mṛṣāvadati na paiśunyaṃ [f. 239b] vadati. na pāruṣyaṃ vadati. na saṃbhinnapralāpī
K05adsp55-u:1611: bhavati. na abhidhyālur bhavati na vyāpannacitto bhavati na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:1612: na ca asya śrāvakabhūmau vā. pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā cittaṃ krāmati. tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K05adsp55-u:1613: sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
K05adsp55-u:1614: tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā trividhā buddhir na pravartate. kaḥ pariṇāmayati kiṃ
K05adsp55-u:1615: vā pariṇāmayati. kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1617: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1619: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito evaṃ vīryaṃ saṃjanayati.
K05adsp55-u:1620: gatvāhaṃ yojanaśataṃ vā gatvā yāvad yojanasahasraṃ vā yāvad yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā
K05adsp55-u:1621: gatvā yāval lokadhātuṃ vā gatvā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā tatra antataḥ
K05adsp55-u:1622: ekasattvam api śaraṇagamane śikṣāpadeṣu vā pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ (AdSPG I 97)
K05adsp55-u:1623: kṣāntau vā śrotaāpattiphale vā yāvad arhattve vā pratyekabodhau vā yāvad anuttarasyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1624: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam iti vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ
K05adsp55-u:1625: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte
K05adsp55-u:1626: bodhisattvo mahāsattva kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1627: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1629: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito viviktam eva kāmair
K05adsp55-u:1630: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1631: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K05adsp55-u:1632: yāvan nirodhaṃ samāpadya viharati. utpanno 'nutpannāṃś ca cittacaitasikān dharmān
K05adsp55-u:1633: kuśalopasaṃhitān sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati. tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā dhyānāni
K05adsp55-u:1634: ca dhyānāṅgāni ca tasmiṃ samaye nopalabhate. nevaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1636: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛḥṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1638: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣantipāramitāyāṃ sthito yasmiṃ samaye dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī viharati,
K05adsp55-u:1639: viviktākāreṇa vā śāntākāreṇa vā akṣayākāreṇa vā,
K05adsp55-u:1641: yāvan na bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇo bhavati. tatra ca niṣadya. sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. utthāya ca dharmacakraṃ pravartayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 98)
K05adsp55-u:1642: mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. tathā ca parigṛhṇāti yathā notsṛjati. na parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1643: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo. vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ [f. 240a] parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1645: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kāyena ca cittena ca dhuraṃ na nikṣipati,
K05adsp55-u:1646: avaśyam eva mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā. na mayā na abhisaṃboddhavyā
K05adsp55-u:1647: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. sa sattvānāṃ kṛte yojanaṃ vā yāvad yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ
K05adsp55-u:1648: vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā. lokadhātuṃ vā yāval lokadhātukoṭiṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśataṃ
K05adsp55-u:1649: vā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito 'ntaśa ekasattvam api
K05adsp55-u:1650: bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. saced bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ na labheta tatra śravakayānikaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1651: pudgalaṃ śrāvakatve pratiṣṭhāpayati. pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ pratyekabuddhatve
K05adsp55-u:1652: pratiṣṭhāpayati. antaśa ekasattvam api daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K05adsp55-u:1653: sa tad dharmadānaṃ dattvā āmiṣadānena sattvān saṃtarpayati. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na
K05adsp55-u:1654: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati. anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1655: sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1656: mahāsattvo. vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1657: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1659: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa
K05adsp55-u:1660: ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati. paraṃ ca prāṇātipātavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati.
K05adsp55-u:1661: prāṇātipātavairamaṇyasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye ca anye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti
K05adsp55-u:1662: teṣām api ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. yāvad ātmanā ea mithyādṛṣṭeḥ (AdSPG I 99)
K05adsp55-u:1663: prativirato bhavati paraṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati. mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyasya
K05adsp55-u:1664: ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratās teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:1665: samanujñaḥ. sa tayā śīlapāramitayā na kāmadhātau pratitiṣṭhati. na rūpadhātau na
K05adsp55-u:1666: arūpyadhātau pratitiṣṭhati. na śrāvakabhūmau na pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratitiṣṭhati.
K05adsp55-u:1667: nānyatra tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05adsp55-u:1668: pariṇāmayati. tathā ca pariṇāmayati. yathā asya trividhā buddhir na pravartate. kaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1669: pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati. kva vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1670: mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1671: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1673: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya
K05adsp55-u:1674: sacet manuṣyabhūto vā amanuṣyabhūto vā cittavikṣepaṃ kuryāt aṅgapratyaṅgāni vā chittvā
K05adsp55-u:1675: cchitvā ādāya gacchet tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyaṃ sthitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:1676: kaścit me chinnatti vā bhinnatti vā harati vā. api tv asyaivaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:1677: sulabdhā [f. 240b] me lābhā yeṣām eva kṛte kāyaṃ pariharāmi. ta evāgamya mamāṅgapratyaṅgāni
K05adsp55-u:1678: chittvā chittvā ādāya gacchanti. dharmāṇāṃ vā tena prakṛtiḥ sumanasikṛtā bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:1679: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra
K05adsp55-u:1680: sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādharaṇāni kṛtvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
K05adsp55-u:1682: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthita kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1683: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1685: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
K05adsp55-u:1686: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pritisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K05adsp55-u:1687: viharati. yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa maitrīsahagatena cittena
K05adsp55-u:1688: yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati. evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatena
K05adsp55-u:1689: upekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati.
K05adsp55-u:1690: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. sa teṣāṃ dhyānānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1691: ca apramāṇānāṃ ca ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ. vipākaṃ na parigṛhṇāti. anyatra yatra sarvasattvānām
K05adsp55-u:1692: arthaḥ kartavyas tatropapadyate. sa tān sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripācayati. dānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1694: buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kuśalamūlānām
K05adsp55-u:1695: avaropanatāyai. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito
K05adsp55-u:1697: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1699: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ
K05adsp55-u:1700: samanupaśyati. na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. śīlapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati.
K05adsp55-u:1702: kṣāntipāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K05adsp55-u:1705: dhyānapāramitāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. evaṃ yāvat smṛtyupasthānāni
K05adsp55-u:1706: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati. na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. sa sarvadharmān
K05adsp55-u:1708: na kaścid dharme niketaṃ karoti. sa yathāvādi tathākārī bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1709: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1711: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akusalair
K05adsp55-u:1712: dharmai savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K05adsp55-u:1713: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. sa tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1715: 241a] tebhya sattvebhya āmiṣadānaṃ ca dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti. sa ātmanā ca āmiṣadānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1716: ca dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti. parāṃś ca āmiṣadānena ca dharmadānena ca samādāpayati.
K05adsp55-u:1717: āmiṣadānadharmadānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye sattvā āmiṣadānaṃ ca dharmadānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1718: ca dadanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvākabhūmau
K05adsp55-u:1719: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvai sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni
K05adsp55-u:1720: kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp55-u:1722: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthita śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1724: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya na rāgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate na doṣasahagataṃ na mohasahagataṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1725: na vihiṃsā sahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. (AdSPG I 102)
K05adsp55-u:1727: tāni ca kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra
K05adsp55-u:1728: sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
K05adsp55-u:1729: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1730: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1732: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1733: pratyavekṣate. budbudopamāṃ vedanām marīcyupamāṃ saṃjñāṃ kadalyupamāṃ saṃskārān māyopamaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1734: vijñānaṃ pratyavekṣate. tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya pañcasu upādānaskandheṣv asārakasaṃjña
K05adsp55-u:1735: pratyupasthitā bhavati. tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivam bhavati. cchidyamāneṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu
K05adsp55-u:1736: ko 'tra chinnanti kiṃ veha cchidyate. kasya vā kāyaḥ kasya vā vedanā kasyeyaṃ saṃjñā
K05adsp55-u:1737: kasya vā saṃskārā kasya vā vijñānaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:1738: tasyaivaṃ pratyevekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati. ko 'trākruśyate vā paribhāṣyate vā yatra ākruśyamānasya vā paribhāṣyamāṇasya vā vyāpāda utpadyate?
K05adsp55-u:1739: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1740: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1742: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā viviktam eva kāmair
K05adsp55-u:1743: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam (AdSPG I 103)
K05adsp55-u:1744: upasaṃpadya viharati. yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa dhyānānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1745: dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca nimittam udgṛhya anekavidham ṛddhividhiṃ pratyanubhavati. yāvad vistareṇa kartavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:1746: yāvad divyena śrotradhātunā ubhayāṃc chabdāṃc chṛṇoti. divyāṃś ca mānuṣāṃś ca,
K05adsp55-u:1747: parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yāvad anuttaraṃ
K05adsp55-u:1748: cittam anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrve nivāsam anusmarati.
K05adsp55-u:1749: yāvad vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. yāvat sa divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣeṇa yāvad,
K05adsp55-u:1750: yathākarmopagān sattvān paśyati. sa imāḥ [f. 241b] pañcābhijñā. pratiṣṭhāya buddhakṣetrād
K05adsp55-u:1751: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati. buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropayan
K05adsp55-u:1752: sattvān paripāvayan buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayaṃs. tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau
K05adsp55-u:1753: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādharaṇaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1754: kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp55-u:1756: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1758: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito rūpaṃ nopalabhate. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1759: nopalabhate. dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1760: dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate. smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhate samyakprahāṇāni
K05adsp55-u:1761: nopalabhate. ṛddhipādāṃ nopalabhate indriyāṇi nopalabhate balāni nopalabhate. bodhyaṃgāni
K05adsp55-u:1764: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nopalabhate. saṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate.
K05adsp55-u:1765: anupalabhamāno na abhisaṃskaroti. anabhisaṃskurvan notpādayati. na nirodhayati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:1766: tathā hi subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1767: dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā sthita eva dharmadhātu sa naivotpadyate na nirudhyate. so
K05adsp55-u:1769: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1770: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1772: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti
K05adsp55-u:1774: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti samanupaśyati?
K05adsp55-u:1776: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carann
K05adsp55-u:1779: śūnyatāśūnyateti nopalabhate. mahāśūnyatāṃ mahāśūnyateti nopalabhate. paramārthaśūnyatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1783: avakāraśūnyateti nopalabhate. prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti nopalabhate sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1786: nopalabhate. sa iha caturdaśasu śūnyatāsu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ nopalabhate
K05adsp55-u:1787: [f. 242a] śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopalabhate.
K05adsp55-u:1788: śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā. smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam
K05adsp55-u:1789: iti vā. yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmāṃ nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā.
K05adsp55-u:1790: yāvad bodhim api nopalabhate śūnyeti vā aśūnyeti vā. saṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate śūnya
K05adsp55-u:1791: iti vā aśūnya iti vā. asaṃskṛtadhātuṃ nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā. sa
K05adsp55-u:1792: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yad yad eva dānaṃ dadāty annaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1793: vā pānaṃ vā yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakāṃ pariṣkarāṃs tad dānaṃ śūnyam iti na
K05adsp55-u:1794: samanupaśyati. yo vā dadāti. yasmai vā dadāti tam api śūnyam iti na samanupaśyati.
K05adsp55-u:1795: tasya mātsaryacittasya vā āgrahacittasya vā avakāśo na bhavati. tat kasya heto?
K05adsp55-u:1796: sarva ete prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vikalpāna bhavaṃti.
K05adsp55-u:1797: prathamacittotpādam upādāya. yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya. yathaiva tathāgatasya arhata
K05adsp55-u:1798: samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vā
K05adsp55-u:1800: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na mātsaryacittaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1801: vā āgrahacittaṃ vā utpadyate. eṣa eva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śāstā yaduta prajñāpāramitā.
K05adsp55-u:1802: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1803: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1805: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ (AdSPG I 106)
K05adsp55-u:1806: śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittānām avakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1807: tathā hi sa śrāvākapratyekabuddhabhūmīṃ nopalabhate. tac ca cittaṃ nopalabhate. yac
K05adsp55-u:1808: chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayet. sa prathamacittotpādam upādaya.
K05adsp55-u:1809: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaṃ prāṇātipātaṃ prahāṇāya dharman deśayati. ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt
K05adsp55-u:1810: prativirato bhavati. paraṃ ca prāṇātipātavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayati. prāṇātipātavairamaṇyasya
K05adsp55-u:1811: ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavaṃti teṣām api varṇavādī
K05adsp55-u:1812: bhavati. samanujñaḥ. yāvad ātmanā ca mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati. paraṃ ca mityādṛṣṭivairamaṇye
K05adsp55-u:1813: samādāpayati mithyādṛṣṭivairamaṇyasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye mithyādṛṣṭiviratās
K05adsp55-u:1814: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tena ca śīlena na kaṃcid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati.
K05adsp55-u:1815: śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā buddhatvaṃ vā prāg eva anye kecit. evaṃ khalu
K05adsp55-u:1816: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāni parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1817: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1819: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasya ānulomikī kṣāntir
K05adsp55-u:1820: utpadyate. tasyaivaṃ bhavati. neha kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā. jāyate
K05adsp55-u:1823: cchidyate vā bhidyate vā. [f. 242b] hanyate vā. tasya prathamacittopādam upādāya
K05adsp55-u:1824: yāvad bodhimaṇḍam atrāntarāt sacet sarvasattvā āgamya ākrośeyu paribhāṣeral loṣṭadaṇḍa
K05adsp55-u:1825: muṣṭiśastraprahārān dadyuś cchindyur bhidyur vā tatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati. aho dharmāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1827: na ca nāmeha kaścid dharma ākrośyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā
K05adsp55-u:1828: hanyate vā badhyate vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1830: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1832: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitaḥ caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu
K05adsp55-u:1833: sthita upāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayya lokadhātum
K05adsp55-u:1834: api gatvā lokadhātuśatam api gatvā lokadhātusahasram api gatvā yāval lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ
K05adsp55-u:1835: api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1836: vā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vā vīryapāramitāyāṃ vā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1837: vā. pratiṣṭhāpayati. sa bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. śrotaāpattiphale
K05adsp55-u:1838: pratiṣṭhāpayati. sakṛdāgāmīphale anāgāmīphale arhattve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarasyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1839: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. tathā ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. yathā na saṃskṛte dhātau
K05adsp55-u:1840: pratiṣṭhāpayati. na asaṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:1841: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1842: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp55-u:1844: iha subhūte hodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathāgatasamādhiṃ sthāpayitvā
K05adsp55-u:1845: yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ śrāvakasamādhayo vā pratyekabuddhasamādhayo vā bodhisattvasamādhayo
K05adsp55-u:1846: vā tān sarvān samāpadyate. tatra samādhiṣu sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1847: samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca. katamān aṣṭau?
K05adsp55-u:1848: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpī rūpāṇi paśyaty,
K05adsp55-u:1849: ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirddhārūpāṇi paśyaty, ayaṃ (AdSPG I 108)
K05adsp55-u:1851: ayaṃ tritīyo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānāntyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K05adsp55-u:1852: ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākāśānāntyāyatana samatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānanantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K05adsp55-u:1853: ayaṃ paṃcamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K05adsp55-u:1854: ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K05adsp55-u:1855: ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham [f. 243a] upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K05adsp55-u:1856: ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. imān aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate
