K05adsp55-u:1857: ca. nava ca anupūrvasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca. katamā nava?
K05adsp55-u:1858: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
K05adsp55-u:1859: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K05adsp55-u:1860: viharati. yāvac cathurthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt
K05adsp55-u:1861: saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharati. iha nava anupūrvasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1862: samāpadyate ca vyutthiṣṭhate ca. sa eṣām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇām āsāṃ ca navānām anupūrvasamāpattīnāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1863: vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā imaṃ siṃhavijṛṃbhitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate. katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:1866: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
K05adsp55-u:1867: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K05adsp55-u:1868: viharati. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanād vyutthāya nirodhaṃ samāpadyate. nirodhasamāpatter
K05adsp55-u:1870: prathamadhyānaṃ samāpadyate. sa imaṃ siṃhavijṛṃbhitaṃ samādhiṃ vipākīkṛtya viṣkandakasamādhiṃ
K05adsp55-u:1871: samāpadyate. katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viṣkandakasamādhi?
K05adsp55-u:1872: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
K05adsp55-u:1873: dharmai savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K05adsp55-u:1874: prathamadhyānād vyutthāya yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K05adsp55-u:1876: vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ
K05adsp55-u:1877: samāpadyate. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya tritīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. tṛtīyād
K05adsp55-u:1878: dhyānād vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya caturthaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1879: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. caturthād dhyānād vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate.
K05adsp55-u:1880: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samāpadyate. ākāśanantyāyatanād vyutthāya
K05adsp55-u:1881: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya vijñānanantyāyatanaṃ samāpadyate.
K05adsp55-u:1882: vijñānānantyāyatanād vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya (AdSPG I 110)
K05adsp55-u:1883: akiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samāpadyate. ākiṃcanyāyatanād vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate.
K05adsp55-u:1885: vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthāya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1893: vyutthāya asamahita [f. 243A] citte 'vatiṣṭhate. asamahitacittāc caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1895: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. tṛtīyadhyānād vyutthāya asamahitacitte 'vatiṣṭhate.
K05adsp55-u:1896: asamahitacittād dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya asamahitacitte
K05adsp55-u:1897: 'vatiṣṭhate. asamahitacittāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. prathamadhyānād vyutthāya
K05adsp55-u:1898: asamahitacitte 'vatiṣṭhate. sa iha avaskandakasamādhau sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām
K05adsp55-u:1899: anuprāpnoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito
K05adsp55-u:1903: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1904: kiyac ciraṃ saṃprasthito vatāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1906: asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1907: kiyanto buddhān bhagavantaḥ paryupāsito 'yaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1909: gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavantaḥ paryupāsito sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1910: kin tena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuśalamūlam avaropitama yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1912: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tena bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1913: mahāsattvena na paripūritā yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. na sā kācic chīlapāramitā
K05adsp55-u:1914: kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā yā tena bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:1915: mahāsattvena na paripūritā yo 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1916: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatāḥ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:1917: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āścaryam etad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatāḥ tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sūryacandramaṇḍalaṃ caturo (AdSPG I 112)
K05adsp55-u:1920: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti,
K05adsp55-u:1921: pañcapāramitā anugacchaty anuparivartate. prajñāpāramitā avirahitatvāt pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
K05adsp55-u:1922: prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvān na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
K05adsp55-u:1923: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitā prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvān na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati
K05adsp55-u:1924: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt pañcapāramitāḥ sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa
K05adsp55-u:1925: vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ
K05adsp55-u:1926: sarvasannāhasannaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durādharṣo bhavati pratirājānair vā pratyarthikair
K05adsp55-u:1928: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitā avirahitatvād durādharṣā bhavanti māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir,
K05adsp55-u:1930: yāvan bodhisattvacaṇḍālair vā. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñā cakravartinā anuvidheyā bhavanti,
K05adsp55-u:1932: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tena
K05adsp55-u:1933: anugacchanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī
K05adsp55-u:1936: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ yena sarvākārajñatā tena anugacchanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇahastaḥ sarvakṛtyāṇi karoty,
K05adsp55-u:1937: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā. yathā vāmahastaḥ evaṃ pañcapāramitā draṣṭavyā.
K05adsp55-u:1938: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yat kunadīṣu yac ca mahānadīṣu udakaṃ sarvaṃ tan mahāsamudram
K05adsp55-u:1940: evam eva subhūte pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ sarvākārajñatām anupraviṣṭā
K05adsp55-u:1941: pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñāś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya
K05adsp55-u:1943: tiṣṭhati ca. yatra rājā cakravarty annahetos tiṣṭhati,
K05adsp55-u:1945: na ca tac cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
K05adsp55-u:1946: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā,
K05adsp55-u:1950: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś tac cakraratnaṃ tac ca pariṇāyakaratnaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1951: tac ca gṛhapatiratnaṃ tac ca strīratnaṃ tac ca maṇiratnaṃ tac ca hastiratnaṃ tac
K05adsp55-u:1952: ca aśvaratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya agrato gacchaty,
K05adsp55-u:1953: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agrato gacchaty,
K05adsp55-u:1954: agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati,
K05adsp55-u:1956: dānapāramitā mama [f. 243b] anugacchet. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā anugacchet. na dānapāramitāyā evaṃ bhavaty:
K05adsp55-u:1957: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyaṃ. evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryaparamitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā (AdSPG I 114)
K05adsp55-u:1959: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1960: svabhāvo hy āsām eṣaḥ akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaśūnyā tucchā marīcisamā. athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:1962: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carañc chīlapāramitāyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1963: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anuttarāṃ
K05adsp55-u:1966: iha subhūte bodisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭpāramitāsu carataḥ evaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:1967: viparyastacitto vatāyaṃ lokasanniveśaḥ. sa na śakyam anupāyakauśalena saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ.
K05adsp55-u:1968: ahaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya dānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. śīlapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi
K05adsp55-u:1969: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. vīryapāramitāyāṃ carisyāmi. dhyānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi.
K05adsp55-u:1970: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi. sa teṣāṃ sattvānām arthāya ādhyatmikabahyāni vastūni parityajati,
K05adsp55-u:1974: tathā hy etad vastu svabhāvaśūnyaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇo
K05adsp55-u:1975: dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlasya avakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1977: naitad me pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1978: kuryāṃ yāvan mithyādṛṣṭiko bhaveyaṃ viṣayān vā prārthayeyaṃ. devatvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ
K05adsp55-u:1979: vā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā prārthayeyaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo (AdSPG I 115)
K05adsp55-u:1980: mahāsattvaḥ upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya satatam
K05adsp55-u:1981: ākruśyamānaḥ paribhāṣyamāṇaḥ kaṭukaiḥ karkaśair vacanair na kṣobhacittam utpādayati.
K05adsp55-u:1982: nāpi loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrapāṣāṇaprahārais tāḍyamāno nāpi śārirā vayaveṣu bhidyamāneṣu
K05adsp55-u:1983: nāpy aṅgapratyaṅgāvayaveṣu cchidyamāneṣu duṣṭacittam utpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1984: tathā hi sa sarvaśaṃ tāṃ pratiśrutkropamān upaparīkṣate. rūpaṃ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ yāvat
K05adsp55-u:1985: vijñānaṃ māyopamam upaparīkṣate. [f. 244a] evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K05adsp55-u:1987: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na kausīdyacittam utpādayati. sarvakuśalaparyeṣṭyāṃ yāvan na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1989: na kusīdena śakyaṃ sattvānām arthaḥ kartum anuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
K05adsp55-u:1990: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
K05adsp55-u:1991: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na vikṣiptacitto bhavati yāvan na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:1992: abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ upaparīkṣamāṇo
K05adsp55-u:1993: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāvirahito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:1994: nāpy anyathā śakyaṃ sattvān paripācayitum anyatra prajñāpāramitāpraveśāt,
K05adsp55-u:1996: cittaṃ notpādayitavyam iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām evārthāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:1998: kutaḥ iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā asamasamā ākhyāyate. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2000: na subhūte pāramitānāṃ kiṃcin nānātvāṃ. yadi punaḥ prajñāpāramitā na bhaven nemāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran,
K05adsp55-u:2001: prajñāpāramitāṃ punar āgamya imāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājam upasaṃkrāntā ekavarṇā bhavanti,
K05adsp55-u:2002: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamyemāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tāḥ sarvākārajñatām anupraviṣṭā ekavarṇā bhavanti. yaduta
K05adsp55-u:2003: na viśeṣaḥ kaścit prajñāyate iyan dānapāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2005: anena kāraṇena viśeso na prajñāyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2006: yadi bhagavaṃ nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
K05adsp55-u:2007: kuta iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānām agryākhyāyate. jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
K05adsp55-u:2008: śreṣṭhākhyāyate varā pravarā praṇītā ākhyāyate. anuttarā niruttarā asamasamā ākhyāyate. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2009: evam etat subhūte evam etat. nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
K05adsp55-u:2010: api tu khalu lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā prajñāyate śīlapāramitā (AdSPG I 117)
K05adsp55-u:2011: kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā prajñāyate. sattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2012: saṃsārata parimocanatayā. sarve te ca sattvā na jāyaṃte na mṛyaṃte na cyavyaṃte nopapadyante.
K05adsp55-u:2013: sattvāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2016: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yā kāścana striyas tāṣāṃ striratnānām agramā ākhyāyate yāvad
K05adsp55-u:2017: asamasamākhyāyate. evam eva subhūte āsāṃ paṃcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā agryākhyāyate
K05adsp55-u:2019: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agryā ākhyāyate yāvad asamasamākhyāyate?
K05adsp55-u:2021: tathā hi iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvakuśaladharmān parigṛhya yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2022: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muṃcati vā?
K05adsp55-u:2024: no hīdaṃ subhūte na prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muṃcati vā. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2025: tathā hi subhūte. te sarvadharmā agṛhītā amuktāḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2026: katamān bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṃ na gṛhṇāti na muṃcati?
K05adsp55-u:2028: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
K05adsp55-u:2029: yāvad bodhiṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2035: rūpasya subhūte amanasikārato rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:2036: vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya amanasikārato vijñānam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:2037: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā amanasikārato bodhir aparigṛhītā bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati. yāvad bodhir aparigṛhītā bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:2038: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā,
K05adsp55-u:2039: tat kathaṃ bhagavann amanasikurvato rūpaṃ yāvad amanasikurvataḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
K05adsp55-u:2041: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir aparipūryamāṇābhiḥ kathaṃ sarvākārajñatā anuprāpsyate?
K05adsp55-u:2043: yadā subhūte rūpaṃ na manasikariṣyati vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ na manasikariṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:2044: yāvad bodhiṃ na manasikariṣyati tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlaṃ vivardhiṣyante,
K05adsp55-u:2045: kuśalamūlair vivardhamānai ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayiṣyati ṣaṭpāramitā paripūrya sarvākārajñām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya heto?
K05adsp55-u:2046: amanasikṛtya rūpam amanasikṛtya vedanāṃ saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam amanasikṛtya bodhim anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2047: kim atra bhagavaṃ kāraṇāṃ yad amanasikṛtya rūpaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2048: amanasikṛtya vedanāṃ saṃjñā saṃskāravijñānaṃ amanasikṛtya bodhiṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K05adsp55-u:2051: kāmadhātau na ślesyate rūpadhātau na śleṣyate arūpyadhātau amanasikāreṇa na kvacic
K05adsp55-u:2052: cchliṣyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na (AdSPG I 119)
K05adsp55-u:2054: evañ caran bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo [f. 245a] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kva sthāsyati?
K05adsp55-u:2056: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na sthāsyati vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na sthāsyati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na sthāsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2057: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃs tatra api sarvākārajñātāyān na sthāsyati?
K05adsp55-u:2059: anabhiniveśena na kvacit sthāsyati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2060: tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatra abhiniviśed avatiṣṭhed vā. evaṃ khalu
K05adsp55-u:2061: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśena asthānayogena.
K05adsp55-u:2063: ya evaṃ carati evaṃ bhāvayati sa prajñāpārmitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp55-u:2064: sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati. ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2065: bhāvayāmi. saced evaṃ saṃjānāti dūrikaroti prajñāpāramitāṃ. sa prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2067: vīryapāramitāyā kṣāntipāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā dūrībhavati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā dūrībhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2068: na hi prajñāpāramitā kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate. na hi prajñāpāramitāyā kaścid abhiniveśa. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2069: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatra abhiniviśeta. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2070: mahāsattva prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānāti cyavate bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2071: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāś cyavate sa sarvadharmebhyaś cyavate. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati
K05adsp55-u:2074: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā. na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihīnena śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:2075: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthita vyākariṣyate 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2076: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. na hi prajñāpāramitāyāś cyuto vyākriyate 'nuttarasyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2078: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitām abhinirharati yāvat mahākaruṇām abhinirharati. cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā. tat kasya heto?
K05adsp55-u:2079: na hi prajñāpāramitāyāś cyutasya śakyaṃ dānapāramitām abhinirhartuṃ yāvan na śakyaṃ mahākaruṇām abhinirhartuṃ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati:
K05adsp55-u:2080: parigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmā svayam abhisaṃbudhya ākhyātā. deśitā prakāśitā cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya
K05adsp55-u:2083: tathā hi subhūte tathāgata na kaṃcid dharmaṃ prajñapayati. kutaḥ puna kiṃcid dharmam abhisaṃbhotsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. atha khalv āyuṣmāṃs subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:2084: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ime doṣāḥ na bhavanti?
K05adsp55-u:2086: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānāty asaṃtaḥ sarvadharmā aparigṛhītā aśakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ. saced (AdSPG I 121)
K05adsp55-u:2087: evaṃ carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. sacet punar evam aparigṛhītaṃ dharmam abhiniviśate,
K05adsp55-u:2088: virahito bodhisattvo [f. 245b] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2089: na hi prajñāpāramitā abhiniveśato vaktavyā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2090: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyā avirahitā yāvad dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā avirahitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā
K05adsp55-u:2091: sacet prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitā. yāvad dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā
K05adsp55-u:2092: avirahitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā avirahitā. kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:2095: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti na abhiniviśate idaṃ rūpam asya rūpam iti. evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam iti na abhiniviśate,
K05adsp55-u:2097: yāvat sarvākārajñateti na abhiniviśate idaṃ sarvākārajñatā asya sarvākārajñateti.
K05adsp55-u:2098: rūpaṃ nityato vā anityato vā na abhiniviśate. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ nityato
K05adsp55-u:2099: vā anityato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vā anityato vā nābhiniviśate.
K05adsp55-u:2100: rūpaṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sukhato
K05adsp55-u:2101: vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ sukhato vā duḥkhato vā nābhiniviśate.
K05adsp55-u:2102: rūpam ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate,
K05adsp55-u:2103: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatām
K05adsp55-u:2104: ātmato vā anātmato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate.
K05adsp55-u:2105: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajnatāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2106: śāntato vā aśāntato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate.
K05adsp55-u:2107: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ (AdSPG I 122)
K05adsp55-u:2108: śūnyato vā aśūnyato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate.
K05adsp55-u:2109: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat
K05adsp55-u:2110: sarvākārajñatāṃ nimittato vā animittato vā nābhiniviśate. rūpaṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato
K05adsp55-u:2111: vā nābhiniviśate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato
K05adsp55-u:2112: vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ praṇihitato vā apraṇihitato vā nābhiniviśate.
K05adsp55-u:2113: rūpaṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate,
K05adsp55-u:2114: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate. yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ viviktato vā aviviktato vā nābhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2115: na hy asvabhāvo dharmo nitya iti vā anitya iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti va ātma
K05adsp55-u:2116: iti vā anātma iti vā śānta iti vā aśānta iti vā śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā nimittam
K05adsp55-u:2117: iti vā animittam iti vā praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā vivikta iti vā avivikta
K05adsp55-u:2118: iti vā śakyam abhinirhartuṃ. svabhāvaṃ svabhāvena śūnyam iti na śakyam abhinirhartuṃ.
K05adsp55-u:2119: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2120: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2121: dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [f. 246a] sthāsyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2122: rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṃgo balakāyo. yena yena rājā cakravartī gacchati. tena
K05adsp55-u:2123: tena caturaṃgo balakāyo gacchati. evam eva subhūte yena yenaiva prajñāpāramitā gacchati.
K05adsp55-u:2124: tena tenemā pañcapāramitā anuvartante. yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyanti. tadyathāpi
K05adsp55-u:2126: ca ratham abhiruhya samena mārgeṇa gacchati. evam eva āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathī. samena mārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tena gacchati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2127: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ katamaḥ amārgaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2131: sarvākārajñatāmārgaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ. ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ ayam amārgaḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2132: mahākṛtyena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā yaivaṃ praṇayaty ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārgaḥ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2133: evam etat subhūte evam etat. mahākṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā bodhisattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2134: mahāsattvānāṃ yā mārgaṃ vā amārgaṃ vā pradarśayati. aprameyakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:2135: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā. asaṃkhyeyakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2136: mahāsattvānāṃ pratyupasthitā. prajñāparamitā subhūte tac ca kṛtyam varṇayati. na
K05adsp55-u:2137: ca rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti. na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti
K05adsp55-u:2138: na śrāvakatvasya na pratyekabuddhatvasya parigrahāya pratyupasthitā. sā khalu punar
K05adsp55-u:2139: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikā anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ
K05adsp55-u:2142: sarvākārajñatāyāś ca upanāyikā evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya utpādayitrī na nirodhayitrī dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2143: yadi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya utpādayitrī na nirodhayitrī,
K05adsp55-u:2144: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2145: kathaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kathaṃ kṣāntir bhāvayitavyāḥ kathaṃ vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ kathaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2148: sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya dānan dātavyāṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya sīlaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2149: rakṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbanīkṛtya kṣāntir bhāvayitavyā sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya
K05adsp55-u:2150: vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ sarvākārajñatām āraṃbaṇīkṛtya dhyānāni samāpattavyāni. sarvākārajñatām
K05adsp55-u:2151: āraṃbaṇīkṛtya prajñā bhāvayitavyā. tena tāni kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni
K05adsp55-u:2152: kṛtvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni. evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K05adsp55-u:2153: tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
K05adsp55-u:2154: gacchaṃti yāvad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvākārajñatā [f. 246b] bhāvanāparipūriṃ
K05adsp55-u:2155: gacchati. yaś ca kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sa
K05adsp55-u:2156: sarvākārajñatāya avirahitaḥ. tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:2157: abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2158: mahāsattvo sarvakuśalamūlāni paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasmāt tarhi
K05adsp55-u:2159: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2160: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu (AdSPG I 125)
K05adsp55-u:2163: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ. rūpaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2164: na visaṃyuktaṃ. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāra vijñānaṃ sa saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā
K05adsp55-u:2165: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
K05adsp55-u:2166: yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmi iti yoga karaṇīyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2167: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthāsyāmi iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2168: yāvan na sarvākārajñatā yāṃ sthāsyāmi iti yoga karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2170: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ kvacit sthitaṃ. yāvan na sarvākārajñatā kvacit sthitā,
K05adsp55-u:2171: evam asthānayogena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarā samyakambodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā.
K05adsp55-u:2172: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalāni vā khāditukāmo bhavet.
K05adsp55-u:2173: tena āmraphalaṃ vā panasaphalaṃ vā avaropitavyaṃ. avaropya kālena kālam udakaṃ dātavyaṃ kelayitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2174: tasya anupūrveṇa vardhamāne staṃbhe sāmagrīm āsādya āmraphalair vā panasaphalair
K05adsp55-u:2175: vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati. sa tāny āmraphalāni vā panasaphalāni vā khādiṣyati. evam eva
K05adsp55-u:2176: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
K05adsp55-u:2177: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā sattvān dānena anugrahītavyā śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena
K05adsp55-u:2178: prajñayā anugrahītavyāḥ sattvāṃ saṃsārāt parimocayitavyāḥ. tasmāt tarhi
K05adsp55-u:2179: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣīditukāmena dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena (AdSPG I 126)
K05adsp55-u:2181: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi?
K05adsp55-u:2183: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. sarvadharmavaśitābhāvanām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2184: eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā. yayā sarvadharmavaśitābhūmir anuprāpyate. eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ mukhaṃ. tadyathāpati nāma mahāsamudraḥ sarvanadīnāṃ mukham,
K05adsp55-u:2185: evam eva prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ mukhaṃ. śrāvākayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair
K05adsp55-u:2186: vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. tasmāt
K05adsp55-u:2187: tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. śilapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2189: śikṣitavyaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo
K05adsp55-u:2190: yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā.
K05adsp55-u:2191: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durādharṣo bhavati
K05adsp55-u:2192: māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp55-u:2193: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. taṃ
K05adsp55-u:2194: ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2196: tas taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
K05adsp55-u:2197: kathaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
K05adsp55-u:2198: katham adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti?
K05adsp55-u:2201: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2202: carantaṃ samanvāharanti. śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2203: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaṃ samanvāharanti. tathā punaḥ samanvāharanti yathā naiva
K05adsp55-u:2204: dānaṃ na śīlaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vīryaṃ na dhyānaṃ na prajñām upalabhate. evam anupalabhamānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2205: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti. evaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2206: carantaṃ samanvāharanti. tathā ca punaḥ samanvāharanti,
K05adsp55-u:2207: yathā naiva sarvākārajñatām upalabhate. evam anupalabhamānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2208: samanvāharanti. punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na
K05adsp55-u:2209: rūpataḥ samanvāharanti. na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato na vijñanataḥ samanvāharanti.
K05adsp55-u:2211: bahuṣu bhagavaṃs sthāneṣu bodhisattyena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2214: evam etat subhūte evam etad. bahuṣu sthāneṣu bodhisattvena manāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. na kvacic chikṣitavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2217: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgateneme dharmā saṃkṣipteṇa ca vistareṇa ca bhāṣitās, (AdSPG I 128)
K05adsp55-u:2218: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2219: ṣaṭpāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyā paryavāpya vācā suparicitāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2221: tathā ca anuprekṣitavyā yathā cittacaitasikadharmā na pravarteran. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2222: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āsu saṃkṣiptavistareṇa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo [f. 247b] mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃś ca saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2223: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati?
K05adsp55-u:2225: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskarāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2228: yasyā tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. iyaṃ rūpatathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2229: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskarāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā?
K05adsp55-u:2231: yasyā tathatāyā notpāda prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvan prajñāyate
K05adsp55-u:2232: iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatātathatā. yatra bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2233: mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. bhūtakoṭiṃ jānānaḥ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2238: śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K05adsp55-u:2239: dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2243: yasya dharmadhātor nocchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ caraṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2246: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2247: katame te bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2249: rūpaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃskṛtadhātur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2250: na hy asya svabhāvo 'sti yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā visaṃyujyeta vā,
K05adsp55-u:2252: yaś ca abhāvaḥ sa abhāvena sārddhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. evaṃ sarvadharmā
K05adsp55-u:2253: jñātavyāḥ. ayaṃ punaḥ suhhūte abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. atra hi
K05adsp55-u:2255: yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthitvā ihaiva abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣitavyaṃ. iha punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2256: tīkṣṇendriyasya bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2258: mṛdvendriyasya api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśo,
K05adsp55-u:2260: api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ asamāhitendriyasya api bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:2261: mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ. na ayaṃ kasyacid yan na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05adsp55-u:2262: na kusīdasya ayaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya na muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasya,
K05adsp55-u:2264: śikṣitukāmasya avaivartikabhūmau sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2265: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānāpāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2267: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2269: sa utpadyamānāny eva prahāsyante. tasmād upāyakauśalaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2270: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K05adsp55-u:2271: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
K05adsp55-u:2272: tasmiṃ samaye asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti
K05adsp55-u:2273: saddharmaṃ deśayaṃti. te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2275: ato niryātā hy atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavaṃta. yaduta ṣaṭpāramitebhyaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2276: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṃkṣitavyam
K05adsp55-u:2277: aham apy etān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi. ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
K05adsp55-u:2278: anuprāptā anuprāpyante. anuprāpsyante ca. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena (AdSPG I 131)
K05adsp55-u:2279: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata yogaṃ āpattavyaṃ. evaṃ yujyamāno bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2280: mahāsattva kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2281: mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyaṃ. sacet punar bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2282: mahāsattva evaṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyām antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api prajñāpāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2283: bhāvayiṣyati. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K05adsp55-u:2284: na tv eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvās tān dānena saṃtarpayet śīle
K05adsp55-u:2285: pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed
K05adsp55-u:2286: vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet śrotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed yāvad arhattve
K05adsp55-u:2288: ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām acchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api bhāvayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2290: yāvad arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi te buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu
K05adsp55-u:2291: tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te 'py ato niryātāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2292: ye 'pi te 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'py ata eva prabhāvitā. prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2293: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ va saṃvatsaraśataṃ
K05adsp55-u:2294: vā. kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyāny api kalpaśatāni imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2295: sarvākārajñatāraṃbaṇamanasikārair bhāvayiṣyati. sa prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K05adsp55-u:2296: na tv eva ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān sarvān dānena saṃtarpayet
K05adsp55-u:2297: śīle pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet
K05adsp55-u:2298: srotaāpattiphale yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau (AdSPG I 132)
K05adsp55-u:2300: ato niryātā [f. 248b] hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair etad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu prajñāptaṃ yāvad arhattvaṃ prajñaptaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ prajñaptā. yaḥ punar bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2301: mahāsattvaḥ evam upadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2302: mahāsattvaḥ avaivartika pratikāṇkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgata sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2304: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:2308: caturdaśaśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ yāvat catuḥpratisaṃvidabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2312: buddhadarśana avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2313: kuśalamūla avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. buddhakṣetra avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2319: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ akṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2320: anakṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ bodhisattvavihārakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2323: nekādhivacanakuśalo dvyadhivacanakuśalo bahvādhivacanakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2324: stryadhivacanukuśalo puruṣādhivacanakuśalo napuṃsakādhivacanakuśalo sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2326: rūpakuśalo vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalaḥ vijñānakuśalaḥ yāvat nirvāṇakuśalo dharmadhātulakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskṛtalaksaṇakuśalaḥ asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2334: dhātukuśalaḥ adhātukuśalaḥ rūpamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat
K05adsp55-u:2335: sarvākārajñatāmanasikārakuśalaḥ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa sūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānaṃ vijñānena
K05adsp55-u:2336: śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvad bodhi bodhyā śūnyeti kuśalaḥ praśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ apraśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2338: arāgakuśalaḥ adveṣakuśalaḥ amohakuśalaḥ dṛṣṭikuśalaḥ adṛṣṭikuśalaḥ mithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2339: amithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikuśalaḥ nāmakuśalo nāmarūpakuśalaḥ āraṃbaṇakuśalaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2340: adhipatikuśalaḥ ākārakuśalaḥ lakṣaṇakuśalaḥ duḥkhakuśalaḥ samudayakuśalaḥ nirodhakuśalaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2341: mārgakuśalaḥ narakakuśalaḥ tiryagyonikuśalo yamalokakuśalaḥ manuṣyakuśalaḥ manuṣyamārgakuśalaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2350: arthakuśalo vyañjanakuśalaḥ yānatrayāvasthānakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2351: ete 'nuśāṃsāḥ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
K05adsp55-u:2352: prajñāpāramitām abhinirharataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2353: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā?
K05adsp55-u:2355: rūpaśāntatayā rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchakatayā rūpāsārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:2357: asārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yat punar subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
K05adsp55-u:2359: ākāśaśūnyatābhinirhareṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. yat punar evaṃ vadasi,
K05adsp55-u:2362: kiyac ciraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇāṃ bhavati?
K05adsp55-u:2364: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. evam abhinirhartavyā bhāvayitavyā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2367: anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2369: abhinirhartavyā prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā. tathā punaś caritavyaṃ tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2370: tathā abhinirhartavyā yathā cittacaitasikā dharmā na pravartante. āha;
K05adsp55-u:2371: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitām abhinirharatā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā sarvākārajñatā anuprāpyate?
K05adsp55-u:2373: no hi iti. āha: tat kim (AdSPG I 136)
K05adsp55-u:2377: tat kiṃ bhāvayatā ca abhāvayatā ca?
K05adsp55-u:2380: tat kiṃ naiva bhāvayatā nā bhāvayatā?
K05adsp55-u:2394: yathā ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2395: kathaṃ bhagavann ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātu?
K05adsp55-u:2397: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate?
K05adsp55-u:2398: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2399: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jivaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
K05adsp55-u:2400: katham ātmadhātuṃ sattvadhātum jīvadhātuṃ pudgaladhātuṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2401: evam aprajñapayan prajñāpāramitām evaṃ aprajñapayaṃ sarvadharmān sarvākārajñātam anuprāpsyati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2402: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā. aprajñapanīyā dhyānapāramitā aprajñapanīyā
K05adsp55-u:2403: vīryapāramitā aprajñapanīyā kṣāntipāramitā aprajñapanīyā śīlapāramitā aprajñapanīyā dānapāramitā?
K05adsp55-u:2405: aprajñapanīyā subhūte prajñāpāramitā aprajñapanīyā yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2406: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyā sarvadharmā kutaḥ punar bhagavan narakāḥ prajñāyante.
K05adsp55-u:2407: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā prajñāyate. devā vā manuṣyā vā prajñāyante śrotaāpanno
K05adsp55-u:2408: vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā (AdSPG I 137)
K05adsp55-u:2411: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate?
K05adsp55-u:2412: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2413: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvān kuto narakaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi. tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2414: vā devān vā manuṣyan vā śrotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vā anāgāminaṃ vā arhattvaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2415: vā pratyekabuddhaṃ vā samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vā prajñapayiṣyāmi?
K05adsp55-u:2416: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā aprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2417: na punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2418: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ [f. 250a] yāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2420: rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. vedanāyāṃ saṃjnāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2421: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ rūpe śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. kathaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu kathaṃ vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā?
K05adsp55-u:2424: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā?
K05adsp55-u:2430: saṃskārāṇāṃ na bhāvanāyāṃ na vibhāvanāyāṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2437: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ. vedanā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. saṃjñā saṃjñayā
K05adsp55-u:2438: śūnyā draṣṭavyā saṃskārā saṃskarai śūnyā draṣṭavyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2439: cakṣuś caksūṣā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ. yāvat mano manasā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam adhyātmaśūnyatā
K05adsp55-u:2440: adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyā
K05adsp55-u:2441: draṣṭavyā dhyānāni dhyānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni. yāvan nirodhasamāpattir nirodhasamāpattyā
K05adsp55-u:2442: śūnyā draṣṭavyā smṛtyūpasthānāni smṛtyupasthānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni yāvad bodhir
K05adsp55-u:2443: bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2445: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataś caryā bhavati?
K05adsp55-u:2447: acaryā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2450: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhisattvo 'pi nopalabhyate. caryā
K05adsp55-u:2451: api nopalabhyate. yaś carati yena vā carati yatra vā carati tad api nopalabhyate.
K05adsp55-u:2452: iyaṃ subhūte acaryā bodhisattvasya māhasattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā yatraite sarvaprapaṃcā nopalabhyante. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2453: yadi bhagavann acaryā prajñāpāramitācaryā tat katham ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:2455: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam evārabhya anupalaṃbheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. tena dānaṃ dadatā anupalaṃbhayogena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2457: rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayatā anupalaṃbhayogena kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ. vīryam
K05adsp55-u:2458: ārabhamāṇena anupalaṃbhayogena vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ. samādhiṃ samāpadyamānena anupalaṃbhayogena
K05adsp55-u:2459: samādhiḥ samāpattavyaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayatā. anupalaṃbhayogena [f. 250b] prajñā bhāvayitavyā.
K05adsp55-u:2460: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayatā anupalaṃbhayogena sarvākārajñatā bhāvayitavyā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2461: kiyatā bhagavann anupalaṃbho bhavati. kiyatopalaṃbho bhavati?
K05adsp55-u:2463: yāvad dvayaṃ tāvad upalaṃbha. advayam anupalaṃbha. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2466: yāvat cakṣūrūpāṇi yāvad yāvan manodharmāś ca yāvad yāvad bodhir buddhāś ca idaṃ subhūte dvayaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2467: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ atha anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbha?
K05adsp55-u:2469: na subhūte anupalaṃbhyo 'nupalaṃbha. na anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2470: subhūte upalaṃbha anupalaṃbhasamatā anupalaṃbhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2471: mahāsattvena upalaṃbhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K05adsp55-u:2473: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalaṃbhe sajjate naivānupalaṃbhe,
K05adsp55-u:2474: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2477: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalaṃbhe sthitvā bhūmer
K05adsp55-u:2478: bhūmiṃ paripūrayati. na hy upalaṃbhe sthitvā śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2479: caratā bhūmer bhūmi paripūrayituṃ. tat kasya heto?
K05adsp55-u:2480: anupalaṃbho hi prajñāpāramitā anupalaṃbho bodhi so 'pi nopalabhyate. yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 140)
K05adsp55-u:2482: yadi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhir api nopalabhyate yo 'pi bodhau carati
K05adsp55-u:2483: so 'pi nopalabhyate. tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2484: caratā sarvadharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime
K05adsp55-u:2485: saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad iyaṃ bodhiḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2487: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2488: karoti. yathā kurvan rūpam upalabheta vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam upalabheta.
K05adsp55-u:2490: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopalabhate. yāvad bodhiṃ
K05adsp55-u:2491: katham idānīṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ kṣantipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2492: dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam
K05adsp55-u:2493: avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati. buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati.
K05adsp55-u:2494: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ
K05adsp55-u:2495: pravartayati. dharmacakraṃ pravartya buddhakāryaṃ karoti. buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā sattvān
K05adsp55-u:2498: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpasya kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. na vedanāyā
K05adsp55-u:2499: na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya kṛte yāvan na bodheḥ [f. 25la] kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2500: kasya bhagavan kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (AdSPG I 141)
K05adsp55-u:2504: kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2505: tathā hy akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2507: bodhir apy akṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā. bodhisattvo 'py akṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛta anabhisaṃskṛtayogena. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2509: tat katham eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati. śrāvākayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā?
K05adsp55-u:2511: na subhūte akṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate. abhisaṃskṛtānām abhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānam upalabhyate. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2512: tathā hi bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjano 'bhiniviśya pañcasu skandheṣu rūpe yāvad vijñāne.
K05adsp55-u:2513: yāvat sarvākārajñātāyām abhiniviśya rūpaṃ manyate rūpam upalabhate. yāvad vijñānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2514: manyate vijñānam upalabhate. yāvad bodhiṃ manyate bodhim upalabhate. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
K05adsp55-u:2515: ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye ahaṃ sattvān mocayiṣye saṃsārāt sa evam asat kalpayati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2516: tathā hi subhūte yad buddhaiḥ paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ yāvad bodhiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2517: tat te mohapuruṣā andhā acakṣuṣkā sattvāṃc chinnanti saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2518: yadi bhagavaṃs tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabhdāḥ sattvā ye saṃsārāt parimucyeran,
K05adsp55-u:2519: katham idānīṃ bhagavān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvāṃs tṛṣu rāśiṣu vyākarṣīt,
K05adsp55-u:2522: na me subhūte anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kaścit sattva upalabdhaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2523: samyaktvaniyato vā aniyato vā mithyātvaniyato vā. api tu khalu subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñina. abhūtagrāhād vārayāmi,
K05adsp55-u:2525: nanu bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
K05adsp55-u:2528: tad viparyāse sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
K05adsp55-u:2531: tad yadi bhagavan nāpi paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
K05adsp55-u:2532: nāpi viparyāse sthitvā tan mā haiva na tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
K05adsp55-u:2534: abhisaṃbuddhā subhūte tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2535: sā na kvacit sthitvā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2536: tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātau vā asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. sa
K05adsp55-u:2539: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ carec chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
K05adsp55-u:2540: yāvac catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya viharet catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattī.
K05adsp55-u:2541: pañcābhijñā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayed yāvad āryāṣṭāṃgaṃ [f. 251b] mārgaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2542: śūnyatāṃ samādhim ānimittaṃ samādhim apraṇihitaṃ samādhim adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvat
K05adsp55-u:2543: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāni catvān
K05adsp55-u:2544: vaiśāradyāni catasra pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām (AdSPG I 143)
K05adsp55-u:2545: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān dharmacakrapravartanāyai. sa ca nirmitaḥ apy apramāṇān sattvān nirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt,
K05adsp55-u:2546: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. api nu tena nirmitena kaścit sattvo vyākṛto bhavet?
K05adsp55-u:2547: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2548: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena nirmitopamā sarvadharmā jñātā gaṇitā ajñānanirmitāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2549: jñātvā na kaścit sattva upalabdho nāpi vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2550: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmita. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2552: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2554: tathāgatasya subhūte nirmitasya ca na kiṃcid viśeṣo na kiṃcin nānākaraṇam upalabhyate. nirviśeṣo hi subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca. tat kasya
K05adsp55-u:2555: tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti. taṃ nirmitaḥ karma karoti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2556: kiṃ punar bhagavan sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
K05adsp55-u:2559: atha kathaṃ punar bhagavann asati tathāgate nirmita karma karoti?
K05adsp55-u:2561: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śāntamatis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvam anupalabhamānas tathāgatavigrahaṃ nirmāya parinirvṛta,
K05adsp55-u:2562: tena ca nirmitenordhvaṃ kalpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2563: sa ca paścād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vyākṛtya parinirvṛta iti saṃjñātaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2564: na ca nirmitasya kaścid utpādo na parinirvāṇaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2565: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ yaduta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya.
K05adsp55-u:2567: nirmitasya ca tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti,
K05adsp55-u:2568: dakṣiṇāpariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati. ya ime bhagavaṃ sattvā puṇyārthikā nirvānārthikās
K05adsp55-u:2569: tathāgate 'rhe samyaksaṃbuddhe dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti. na ca jātu sā kṣīyate yāvan
K05adsp55-u:2570: na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti. evam eva nirmite dakṣiṇā
K05adsp55-u:2571: pratiṣṭhāpitā. na jātu kṣīyate yāvan na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti?
K05adsp55-u:2573: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgata sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ tathaiva
K05adsp55-u:2574: dharmatayā nirmitaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ. tiṣṭhatu tāvat subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2575: tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. tiṣṭhatu tathāgatanirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. ye
K05adsp55-u:2576: 'pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tathā tathāgataṃ maitrāvatā manasikāreṇa manasikariṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:2577: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu maitrāvān manasikāraḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2578: ye pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ākāśe puṣpaṃ kṣepsyanti tathāgataṃ manasikṛtya,
K05adsp55-u:2579: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam anadhigamya,
K05adsp55-u:2580: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu subhūte maitrāvān manasikāraḥ tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2581: ye kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā buddhaṃ namaskariṣyanti,
K05adsp55-u:2582: sarve te [f. 252a] 'nupūrveṇa duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. evaṃ mahārthikā vata subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā. tad anena paryāyeṇa subhūte veditavyaṃ. ,
K05adsp55-u:2583: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca nāsti kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2585: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2586: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyām avatīrya. sā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. iyan dhyāna pāramitā,
K05adsp55-u:2587: iyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. yāvat iyan dānapāramitā iyan dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣu kartavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2588: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
K05adsp55-u:2589: tad yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitam idaṃ rūpam yāvad idaṃ vijñānaṃ. evam adhyātmikā bāhyā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2590: evaṃ kuśalā akuśalāḥ sāsravā anāsravāḥ laukikā lokottarāḥ sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2591: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati?
K05adsp55-u:2593: no hīdaṃ subhūte. nāmanimittaiś ca mayā te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ dharmāṇāṃ sūcanā kṛtā,
K05adsp55-u:2594: kathaṃ paro 'vataret iti. na punar dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2595: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmani mittaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ pareṣām avataraṇārthaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2596: tat kathaṃ bhagavann anāmakā animittā dharmā nāmanimittena vyāhṛtāḥ bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2597: vyāhāraḥ subhūte na nāmanimittaṃ na abhiniveśo vā,
K05adsp55-u:2598: nānyatra subhūte duḥkham eva vyāharāmi na nāmni na nimitte vā abhiniveśe. na hi subhūte tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmanimitte (AdSPG I 146)
K05adsp55-u:2606: asaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛte 'bhiniviśeta. abhiniviśeta tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā
K05adsp55-u:2607: nāmanimitte. ete ca sarvadharmā nāmamātraṃ. na caite nāmamātre 'py avatiṣṭhante.
K05adsp55-u:2608: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmanimittamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ
K05adsp55-u:2609: caritavyaṃ. tatra ca na abhiniveṣṭavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2610: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmanimittamātram eva sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2611: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam
K05adsp55-u:2613: bodhaye cittaṃ utpādya anekavidhān saṃskārāviprakārān pratyanubhavati. bodhisattvacārikāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2614: carati. bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran vicitrāṇi dānāni dadāti. śīlañ ca rakṣati kṣāntyā
K05adsp55-u:2615: ca saṃpādayati. vīryaṃ ca ārabhate. samādhiṃ ca samāpadyate. prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati.
K05adsp55-u:2616: śūnyatāyāṃ ca carati. dhyānāpramāṇaiś ca arūpyasamāpattibhiś ca carati. smṛtyupaṣṭhānaiś
K05adsp55-u:2617: ca viharati samyakprahāṇaiś ca viharati. yāvac chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiś ca vimokṣamukhair viharati,
K05adsp55-u:2618: daśabhiś ca tathāgatabalair viharati yāvan mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca paripūrayati?
K05adsp55-u:2622: tat kasya idāniṃ kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati? yasmāt (AdSPG I 147)
K05adsp55-u:2623: tarhi subhūte nāmanimittamātram eva sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2625: nimittaṃ nimittena śūnyaṃ. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ
K05adsp55-u:2626: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. sarvakārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati.
K05adsp55-u:2627: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati. tasya ca nāmanimittasya
K05adsp55-u:2628: notpādo na vyayo na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2629: sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñateti bhagavan vadasi. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2631: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatā tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā,
K05adsp55-u:2633: sarvajñatāpi tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā. āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ. ko viśeṣa kin nānākaraṇaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:2635: sarvajñatā subhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgākārajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:2636: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ sarvajñatā śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ. kena kāraṇena mārgākārajñatā
K05adsp55-u:2637: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. kena kāraṇena sarvākārajñatā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ?
K05adsp55-u:2639: etāvad eva subhūte sarvaṃ yāvad eva adhyātmikāś ca bāhyāś ca dharmāḥ te śrāvakapratyekabuddhair api jñātā na punaḥ sarvamārgāṇi na sarvākāreṇa. yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha:
K05adsp55-u:2640: kena kāraṇena mārgākārajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iti?
K05adsp55-u:2643: ye ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgā. ye ca bodhisattvamārgāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2645: taiś ca mārgair mārgakaraṇīyaṃ kartavyaṃ. na ca bhūtakoṭi prativeddhavyā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2646: yat punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhamārgaḥ paripūrayitavyo nanu tena bhūtakoṭi na?
K05adsp55-u:2649: na apariśodhya subhūte buddhakṣetraṃ na aparipācya sattvāṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2650: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārge sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
K05adsp55-u:2656: tan mārge ca amārge ca sthitvā?
K05adsp55-u:2659: tan naiva mārge na amārge sthitvā?
K05adsp55-u:2662: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
K05adsp55-u:2664: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte mārge te sthitasya anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:2665: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2667: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2669: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. bhagavan āha:
K05adsp55-u:2670: tan naiva mārge na amārge sthitasya anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:2671: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. na me bhagavaṃ kvacit sthitasya anupādāyāsravebhyas cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2672: vimuktaṃ ca me bhagavaṃś cittaṃ yathā na kvacit sthitasya. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2673: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacit sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā. yat punaḥ subhūte sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatety (AdSPG I 149)
K05adsp55-u:2674: ucyate. ekena ākāreṇa sarvākārajñatety ucyate. yaduta śāntākāreṇa. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair [f. 253a] dharmā sūcyante,
K05adsp55-u:2675: sarvāṇi tāny ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tathāgatena anubuddhāni,
K05adsp55-u:2677: yat punar bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatā ca mārgākārajñatā ca sarvajñatā ca,
K05adsp55-u:2678: kaccid bhagavann āsām tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
K05adsp55-u:2681: na subhūte kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti. asti punas tathāgatasya sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ na punaḥ srāvakasya pratyekabuddhasya ca sarvāsanānusandhikleśaprahānaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:2682: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann ebhir anuprāptam asaṃskṛtaṃ. kiṃ vā punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate?
K05adsp55-u:2689: na subhūte vāsanānusandhikleśo 'sti. api tv asti teṣāṃ śrāvākapratyekabuddhānāṃ rāgadoṣamohaprahāṇaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2690: kaścit tu kāyavikārās pravartante te bālapṛthagjanānām anarthāya sanivartante. na
K05adsp55-u:2691: tu śrāvakānāṃ te tathāgatasya nāsti. athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:2694: tat kutaḥ bhagavan nirdiśyate. ayaṃ śrotaāpanna ayaṃ sakṛdāgāmī. ayam anāgāmī ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddhho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2696: sarva ete subhūte asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā. yaś ca śrotaāpanno yaś ca sakṛdāgāmī yaś ca
K05adsp55-u:2697: anāgāmī yaś ca arhan yaś ca pratyekabuddho yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaś ca tathāgato
K05adsp55-u:2699: kaccit punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtaṃ prabhāvayaty ayaṃ śrotaāpanno 'yaṃ yāvad arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti?
K05adsp55-u:2701: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ prabhāvayaty api tu khalu vacanaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya jalpyate. na punaḥ paramārthena śakyaṃ prabhāvituṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2705: lokavyavahāraṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya yair yair antaḥ ucchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭiḥ prajñapyate. api tu khalu punar yaiḥ pūrvānto vyavacchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭir prajñaptā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2706: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ punaḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ prajñāyate,
K05adsp55-u:2709: evam etat subhūte evam etat. svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvakoṭir na prajñāyate,
K05adsp55-u:2710: kutaḥ punaḥ paścimā koṭiḥ prajñapyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. api tu khalu subhūte ye te sattvā svalakṣaṇaśunyān dharmān na jānanti,
K05adsp55-u:2711: teṣām evaṃ nirdiṣṭam iyaṃ sā pūrvakoṭir iyaṃ sā paścimā koṭir iti,
K05adsp55-u:2713: pūrvakoṭir na paścimā koṭir upalabhyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp55-u:2714: svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu
K05adsp55-u:2715: caran na kvacid abhiniviśate. adhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā,
K05adsp55-u:2717: śrāvakadharmeṣu vā pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu vā. evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:2722: tenārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anayā prajñāpāramitayā
K05adsp55-u:2723: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā [f. 253b] bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā tathāgatāś ca arhantaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2725: tenārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte paramārthena yo 'rthaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2726: sarvadharmāṇāṃ abhinnaḥ sa. iha prajñāpāramitayāḥ taiś ca tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
K05adsp55-u:2728: tenārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathatā antargatā bhūtakoṭir antargatā dharmadhātur antargatās,
K05adsp55-u:2729: tenārthenocyate prajñāpāramitety. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:2730: na kenacid dharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā sanidarśanā vā anidarśanā vā pratighā
K05adsp55-u:2731: vā apratighā vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2732: tathā hi iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā arūpiṇy anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ (AdSPG I 152)
K05adsp55-u:2733: cārikā, dātrī sarvapratibhānānāṃ sarvālokānānām anacchedyeyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā
K05adsp55-u:2734: asaṃhāryā mārair vā mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikair vā pudgalair
K05adsp55-u:2735: yāvan na kaiścid anyatīrthikaiḥ pāpamitrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śakyam ācchetuṃ bodhisattvasya
K05adsp55-u:2737: tathā hi te sarve 'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nopalabhyante svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya.
K05adsp55-u:2738: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. punar
K05adsp55-u:2739: aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe
K05adsp55-u:2740: caratā anityārthe caritavyaṃ duḥkhārthe anātmārthe caritavyaṃ. duḥkhajñānārthe samudayajñānārthe
K05adsp55-u:2743: paramārthajñānārthe. yāvad yathāvajjñānārthe caritavyaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyārthe caritavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2744: yadi bhagavann iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthaś ca anarthaś ca nopalabhyate. kathaṃ bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2747: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gaṃbhīre prajñāpāramitārthe caratā evaṃ caritavyaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:2748: rāgo me 'rtho 'nartha iti na varitavyaṃ dośo me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ moho
K05adsp55-u:2749: me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭir me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2751: 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2752: na hi rāgadoṣamohānāṃ tathatā yāvan na nānādṛṣṭigatānāṃ tathatā kasyacid arthaṃ karoti na anarthaṃ karoti. rūpaṃ me artha iti na caritavyaṃ. rūpaṃ me 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2753: vijñānaṃ me artha iti na caritavyaṃ vijñānaṃ me 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ. yāvad:
K05adsp55-u:2754: bodhi me 'rtha iti na caritavyaṃ bodhi me 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2755: tathā hi subhūte tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
K05adsp55-u:2756: na kaścid dharmo upalabdho yo 'rthaṃ vā kuryād anarthaṃ vā. api tu khalu subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2757: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā
K05adsp55-u:2758: sthitaiva dharmadhātu. sa naiva kasyacid arthaṃ karoti na anarthaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2759: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena artha anarthān varjitena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2760: kena kāraṇena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na arthaṃ karoti na anarthaṃ karoti?
K05adsp55-u:2762: tathā hi subhūte saṃskārāṇām asaṃskṛtadharmatā yāś ca karaṇīyā prajñāpāramitā,
K05adsp55-u:2763: anena kāraṇena prajñāpāramitā [f. 254a] na kasyacid arthakarā na anarthakarā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2764: nanu bhagavann asaṃskṛto 'rtha sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca?
K05adsp55-u:2766: asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ subhūte sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca?
K05adsp55-u:2767: na punar kasyacid upakāreṇa vā anupakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya tathatā na kasyacid upakāreṇa vā anupakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā,
K05adsp55-u:2768: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā (AdSPG I 154)
K05adsp55-u:2769: na kasyacid dharmasya upakāreṇa vā anupakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2770: nanu bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:2772: evam etat subhūte evam etat. bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ iha gaṃbhīrāyām asaṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
K05adsp55-u:2774: kiṃ punar bhagavann advayo dharma advayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:2777: tat kiṃ dvayo dharma dvayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:2780: tat kiṃ dvayo dharma advayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:2783: tat kim advayo dharma dvayaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:2788: yadā na dvayan dharmo nādvayan dharma upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2789: anupalaṃbho hi prāpti sā na anupalaṃbhena prāpyate na punar upalaṃbhena prāpyate. (63)
K05adsp55-u:2793: gaṃbhīrā bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavaṃ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2794: ye 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante na ca nāma kaścit sattva upalabhyate
K05adsp55-u:2796: te ca sattvānāṃ kṛte anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante. tadyathāpi nāma
K05adsp55-u:2797: bhagavaṃ kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśa apratiṣṭhāne stambam icched vāpayitum evam eva bhagavaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2798: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ kṛte sarvākārajñatām icchanty anuprāptuṃ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2800: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye sattvānāṃ kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K05adsp55-u:2801: saṃpratiṣṭhante. tāṃ ca sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbudhya sattvāṃ sattvagrāhāt parimocayanti.
K05adsp55-u:2802: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣaḥ stambam icched vāpayituṃ. sa ca puruṣas
K05adsp55-u:2804: na śākhān na gaṇḍaṃ na pattrān na puṣpaṃ na phalaṃ jānīyāt,
K05adsp55-u:2805: sa tasya stambasya gaṇḍaṃ vāpayitvā kālena kālaṃ gopayet udakaṃ dadyāt tasya sa gaṇḍam anupūrveṇa śākhāsaṃpannaś ca bhavet pattrasaṃpannaś ca bhavet puṣpasaṃpannaś ca (AdSPG I 156)
K05adsp55-u:2806: bhavet phalasaṃpannaś ca bhavet. sa tasya stambasya pattrāṇi ca anubhuṃjīta puṣpāṇi
K05adsp55-u:2807: ca phalāni ca anubhuṃjīta. evam eva subhūte ye bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2808: kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante te 'nupūrveṇa ṣaṭpāramitāsu caraṃtaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2809: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti. te sarvasattvānāṃ pattrapuṣpaphalopajīvyā bhavanti.
K05adsp55-u:2810: tatredaṃ subhūte pattraṃ yad bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvāḥ tribhyo apāyebhyaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2811: [f. 254b] parimucyante. puṣpaṃ yad bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāsālakuleṣu
K05adsp55-u:2813: upapadyante yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopageṣu deveṣu upapadyante. phalaṃ yad
K05adsp55-u:2814: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya tāṃ sattvāṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati
K05adsp55-u:2815: sakṛdāgāmīphale pratiṣṭhāpayati anāgāmīphale pratiṣṭhāpayati. arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K05adsp55-u:2816: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. tam eva bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
K05adsp55-u:2817: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya te 'pi sarvasattvānāṃ pattrapuṣpaphalopajīvyā bhavaṃti. tatra ye dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayaṃti te sarve 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
K05adsp55-u:2818: yaduta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp55-u:2819: abhisaṃbudhyante. na ca tatra sattvaṃ prajñapayaṃti. na sattvaprajñaptiṃ tāṃś ca
K05adsp55-u:2820: sattvāṃ sattvagrāhāṃ parimocayaṃti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena (AdSPG I 157)
K05adsp55-u:2821: prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caritavyaṃ. na ceha kaścit sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate. yeṣāṃ kṛte sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:2822: tathāgata eva bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2823: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvanarakā ucchidyante,
K05adsp55-u:2824: sarvatiryagyonaya sarvayamalokā ucchidyante sarvākṣaṇāpāyā ucchidyante sarvadāridryāny
K05adsp55-u:2825: ucchidyante sarvahīnagataya ucchidyante sarvakāmadhātur ucchidyate sarvarūpadhātur
K05adsp55-u:2826: ucchidyate sarva ārūpyadhātur ucchidyate. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2828: tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nābhaviṣyan,
K05adsp55-u:2829: nātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prajñāsyatan,
K05adsp55-u:2830: na pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo 'bhaviṣyan na arhatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo 'bhaviṣyan
K05adsp55-u:2831: na anāgāmināṃ na sakṛdāgāmināṃ na srotaāpannānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo 'bhaviṣyat. na
K05adsp55-u:2832: punar yāvat sarvanarakā udacchetsyaṃta na sarvatiryagyonayo na sarvayamalokā udacchetsyanta.
K05adsp55-u:2833: na sarvakāmadhātur udacchetsy anta na sarvarūpadhātur udacchetsyanta na sarvārūpyadhātur
K05adsp55-u:2834: udacchetsyanta. ... ... api tu khalu punar subhūte yad evaṃ vadasi,
K05adsp55-u:2835: tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavya iti. evam etat subhūte evam etat. tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ veditavyaḥ. tat kasya [f. 255a] hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2838: pratyekabuddhaḥ prajñapyate. yayā tathatayā sarvāryāḥ prajñapyante. yayā tathatayā
K05adsp55-u:2839: rūpaṃ prajñapyate yayā tathatayā yāvad vijñānaṃ prajñapyate yayā tathatayā yāvat
K05adsp55-u:2840: saṃskṛtadhātuḥ prajñapyate. asaṃskṛtadhātu prajñapyate. sarvā sā tathataiva,
K05adsp55-u:2841: tasmāt tathatā ity ucyate. tasyāṃ tathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthitvā sarvākārajñatām
K05adsp55-u:2842: anuprāpsyati. tasmāt tathāgata ity ucyate. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
K05adsp55-u:2843: tathāgata eva veditavyaḥ tathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2844: mahāsattvena tathatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. tathatāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2845: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ śikṣate. mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā
K05adsp55-u:2848: sarvadharmatathatāvaśībhāvanatām anuprāpya sarvasattvendriyakuśalo bhaviṣyati indriyakuśalo bhūtvā. indriyaparipūrīkuśalatām anuprāpsyati. indriyaparipūrīkuśalatām
K05adsp55-u:2851: praṇidhijñānaṃ paripūrya tridhvasujñānaṃ viśodhayiṣyati. tridhvasujñānaṃ viśodhya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:2852: sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyati. buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
K05adsp55-u:2853: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati. dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvān triṣu yāneṣu (AdSPG I 159)
K05adsp55-u:2855: sattvān triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2856: khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāṃ guṇānuśaṃsān paśyatā ātmanā ca anuttarāyai
K05adsp55-u:2858: pare ca anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyaṃ. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:2859: namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭhāyāṃ caranti. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2861: namaskaraṇīyās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena. ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭhāyāṃ caranti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2862: kiyad bhagavaṃ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2864: sacet subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śrāvakabhūmau pratitiṣṭheyu pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratitiṣṭheyu. api nu te sattvā bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2865: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. aprameyaṃ bhagavann aprameyaṃ sugata. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2866: yac ca khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā puṇyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2867: yac ca prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2868: asya prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya puṇyasaṃbhārasya evaṃ (AdSPG I 160)
K05adsp55-u:2870: vā [f. 255b] puṇyaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti. yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2871: nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2872: bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikā pudgalā na punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūtā
K05adsp55-u:2873: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā. tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā
K05adsp55-u:2875: sacet ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śrāvakaguṇasamanvāgatā
K05adsp55-u:2876: pratyekabuddhaguṇasamanvāgatā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikabodhisattvapuṇyasya
K05adsp55-u:2877: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti. yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti. yāvad
K05adsp55-u:2878: upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:2879: bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūtā bodhisattvā
K05adsp55-u:2880: mahāsattvā. evaṃ saced ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śuklavidarśanābhūmau
K05adsp55-u:2881: pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikabodhisattvapuṇyasya
K05adsp55-u:2882: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate. sacet punaḥ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K05adsp55-u:2883: lokadhātau sattvās te sarve gotrabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ,
K05adsp55-u:2884: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikabodhisattvapuṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2885: nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate. yāvat saced aṣṭamakabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyur.
K05adsp55-u:2886: darśanabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ tanubhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyu. vītarāgabhūmau
K05adsp55-u:2887: pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ kṛtāvībhūmau pratiṣṭhitā bhaveyuḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhitā
K05adsp55-u:2889: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpadikabodhisattvapuṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2890: nopaiti yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2891: bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śravakapratyekabuddhaguṇā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūtā bodhisattvā
K05adsp55-u:2892: mahāsattvā. sacet punar ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā bhaveyus,
K05adsp55-u:2893: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti
K05adsp55-u:2894: yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate. sacet punar ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās
K05adsp55-u:2895: te sarve bodhipratipannakā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
K05adsp55-u:2896: puṇyasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvat koṭīśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti.
K05adsp55-u:2897: yāvad upaniśām api na ksamate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2898: prathamacittotpādikena bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā manasikartavyā?
K05adsp55-u:2900: prathamacittotpādikena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārājñatā manasikartavyā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2901: sarvākārajñatāyā bhagavaṃ ko bhāva kim āraṃbaṇaṃ kim ādhipateyaṃ ka ākāra kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:2904: animittam anābhogam anutpāda aprādurbhāvaḥ. yat punar subhūtir evam āha:
K05adsp55-u:2906: sarvākārajñatāyā kim ādhipateyaṃ ka ākāra kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti?
K05adsp55-u:2910: alakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ. sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte idam āraṃbaṇam idam ādhipateyam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ayam ākāra. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2915: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
K05adsp55-u:2916: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvārarddhipādā pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny
K05adsp55-u:2917: āryāṣṭāṇgo mārga śūnyatāsamādhiḥ ānimittasamādhiḥ apraṇihita samādhiḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2918: navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K05adsp55-u:2919: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā prathamābhijñā
K05adsp55-u:2920: dvitīyābhijñā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamy abhijñā ṣaṣṭy abhijñā saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃskṛtadhātur apy abhāvaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2922: rūpam api subhūte abhāva vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānam apy abhāvaḥ yāvat saṃskṛtadhātur apy abhāvaḥ asaṃskṛtadhātur apy abhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2923: tathā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatāyā svabhāvo nāsti. yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte svabhāvo nāsti sa abhāvaḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2924: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā svabhāvo nāsti?
K05adsp55-u:2926: nāsti subhūte sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ. yasya sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvo nāsti sa abhāvaḥ. anena
K05adsp55-u:2927: subhūte paryāyeṇa abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. api tu khalu punar subhūte śūnyatāsvabhāvāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2928: sarvadharmāḥ ānimittasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ apraṇihitasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā. api
K05adsp55-u:2930: sarvadharmāḥ bhūtakoṭisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ dharmadhātusvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
K05adsp55-u:2932: tat katamenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp55-u:2933: dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ
K05adsp55-u:2935: caran buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ prathame dhyāne
K05adsp55-u:2936: caran yāvat caturthe dhyāne maitryāṃ yāvad upekṣāyāṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2941: dhyāneṣu apramāṇeṣu yāvat navānupūrvasamāpattīṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu. catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśeṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
K05adsp55-u:2943: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:2944: etad eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāyakauśalaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:2946: buddhakṣetraṃ ca [f. 256b] pariśodhayati. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ
