K05adsp55-u:2947: tāṃś ca sattvān abhāvasvabhāvāṃ jānāti. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:2949: karoti. śīlapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti. kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caraṃ
K05adsp55-u:2950: bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti. vīryapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti.
K05adsp55-u:2951: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge
K05adsp55-u:2952: paricayam karoti. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃ bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti,
K05adsp55-u:2953: tan ca bodhimārgam abhāvasvabhāvaṃ jānāti. sa khalu punar subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:2954: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃs tāvat tasmin bodhimārge paricayaṃ karoti. yāvan na daśabhis
K05adsp55-u:2955: tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati. na caturbhir vaiśāradyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:2956: na catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgato bhavati na āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā
K05adsp55-u:2957: mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgato bhavati. ayaṃ subhūte sa bodhimārgo yatra mārge sthitvā
K05adsp55-u:2958: pāramitān paripūrayati. pāramitān paripūrya ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām
K05adsp55-u:2959: anuprāpsyati. tasya tatra avasthāyāṃ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśan prahāsyati anutpattikaprahāṇena.
K05adsp55-u:2960: sa buddhacakṣuṣā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vyavalokayann abhāva ity api na
K05adsp55-u:2961: upalapsyate prāg eva bhāvaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp55-u:2962: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam abhāvasvabhāvasarvadharmeṣu. etad eva subhūte
K05adsp55-u:2963: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāyakauśalaṃ yad abhāva iti nopalabhate prāg eva bhāvaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:2964: sa khalu punar subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ (AdSPG I 165)
K05adsp55-u:2965: dadāti, sa tan dānan dadan na kalpayati,
K05adsp55-u:2966: na nimittīkaroti naiva bhāvato na abhāvato manasikaroti. pratigrāhakam api na kalpayati,
K05adsp55-u:2968: naiva bhāvato nābhāvato manasikaroti. dāyakam api na kalpayati. na nimittīkaroti. naiva bhāvato nābhavato manasikaroti. tad api bodhicittaṃ nopalabhate. na nimittīkaroti,
K05adsp55-u:2969: nālambanīkaroti. na samanupaśyati ... yāvat ... prajñāpāramitāṃ na kalpayati,
K05adsp55-u:2971: naiva bhāvato na abhāvato manasikaroti. yo 'pi tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
K05adsp55-u:2972: tam api na samanupaśyati na nimittīkaroti,
K05adsp55-u:2974: yeṣām api sattvānāṃ kṛtaśas tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ na kalpayati na nimittīkaroti,
K05adsp55-u:2975: naiva bhāvato nābhāvato manasikaroti. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:2976: tathā hi yadi ta eva sarvadharmā abhāvās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na śrāvakair na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā. akārakāḥ hi sarvadharmā kārakavirahitāḥ
K05adsp55-u:2977: nanu bhagavaṃ dharmair eva dharmā virahitā?
K05adsp55-u:2979: evam etat subhūte evam etat. dharmair eva dharmā virahitā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:2980: yadi bhagavaṃ dharmair eva dharmā virahitās,
K05adsp55-u:2981: tat kathaṃ virahito dharmo virahitaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānāti,
K05adsp55-u:2982: bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā. na hi bhagavann abhāvo dharmo abhāvam dharmaṃ jānāti.
K05adsp55-u:2983: na bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ jānāti. na abhāvo dharmo 'bhāvan dharmaṃ jānāti.
K05adsp55-u:2984: na bhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ jānāti. evam asaṃjānaṃ sarvadharmeṣu kutaḥ evaṃ bhavati.
K05adsp55-u:2985: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā?
K05adsp55-u:2987: lokasaṃvṛtim upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 166)
K05adsp55-u:2988: caran bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā nirdiśati,
K05adsp55-u:2990: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:2992: na anya subhūte Iokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ. yena lokasaṃvṛtes tathatā saiva paramārthasya [f. 257a] tathatā,
K05adsp55-u:2993: tat te sattvā viparyastā etāṃ tathatāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti. teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokasaṃvṛtyā nirdiśati,
K05adsp55-u:2994: bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā. api tu khalu subhūte ya ete sattvāḥ pañcaskandheṣu bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ abhāva iti na jānanti. teṣām arthāyaivaṃ taṃ nirdiśyate,
K05adsp55-u:2996: katham abhāva jānīyur iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. ((64))
K05adsp55-u:3003: bodhisattvacārikā bodhisattvacāriketi subhūte ucyate bodhaye esā cārikā tasmād bodhisattvacārikety ucyate. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3004: kva bhagavaṃ sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cārikā?
K05adsp55-u:3006: rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ śūnyam iti carati. evam ādhyātmikabāhyair
K05adsp55-u:3007: āyatanair dānapāramitāyāṃ carati śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3011: prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. anupalaṃbhaśūnyatāyām
K05adsp55-u:3012: abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. svabhāvaśūnyatāyāna carati. abhāvasvabhāśūnyatāyāṃ carati.
K05adsp55-u:3013: prathame dhyāne carati. dvitīye tṛtīye eaturthe dhyāne carati maitryāṃ carati. karuṇāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3014: muditāyām upekṣāyāṃ carati. ākāśānantyāyatane carati. vijñānantyāyatane ākiṃcanyāyatane, naiva (AdSPG I 168)
K05adsp55-u:3015: saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane carati. caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati. caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu
K05adsp55-u:3016: caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu paṃcasv indriyeṣu. paṃcasu baleṣu. saptabodhyaṅgeṣv. āryāṣṭāṃge
K05adsp55-u:3017: mārge carati. śūnyatāyāṃ samādhau caraty ānimitte samādhau ca apraṇihite samādhau
K05adsp55-u:3018: carati. aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu carati. daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
K05adsp55-u:3019: carati. catasṛṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśasv
K05adsp55-u:3020: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati. buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye carati. sattvaparipāke
K05adsp55-u:3021: carati. pratibhāne caraty akṣarābhinirhāreṣu carati. akṣarapraveśeṣu carati. anakṣarapraveśe
K05adsp55-u:3022: carati. dhāranīṣu carati. saṃskṛtadhātau caraty. asaṃskṛtadhātau carati. tathā punar
K05adsp55-u:3023: carati yathā buddhir na dvidhī bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3024: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhau carati. athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:3025: buddho buddha iti bhagavamn ucyate. kasyaitad adhivacanaṃ buddha iti?
K05adsp55-u:3027: bhūto 'rtho buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte bhūto 'nena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhas,
K05adsp55-u:3028: tasmād buddha ity ucyate. bhūto [f. 257b] 'nenārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmāḥ anena yathāvad
K05adsp55-u:3033: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3036: dharmadhātor etad adhivacanaṃ. api tu khalu subhūte bodhir iti tathata avitathatā (AdSPG I 169)
K05adsp55-u:3038: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte nāmadheyanimittamātram etad yaduta bodhis,
K05adsp55-u:3039: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte buddhānām eṣā bhagavatāṃ bodhis,
K05adsp55-u:3040: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās,
K05adsp55-u:3042: yo bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha bodhaye carati,
K05adsp55-u:3043: sa kiṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir carati yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ viharati,
K05adsp55-u:3044: katameṣāṃ bhagavaṃ kuśalamūlānām ācayo bhavaty apacayo vā hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā?
K05adsp55-u:3046: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ iha bodhau carati ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir carati
K05adsp55-u:3047: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā carati. tasya na kasyacid dharmasya ācayo bhavaty apacayo
K05adsp55-u:3048: vā hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā. tat kasya heto?
K05adsp55-u:3049: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kasyacid dharmasya āraṃbaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
K05adsp55-u:3050: ācaye vā apacaye vā hānaye vā vṛddhaye vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3051: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ bodhir na kasyacid dharmasya āraṃbaṇayogena pratyupasthitā. tat katham
K05adsp55-u:3052: bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05adsp55-u:3053: katham adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. bahirddhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ (AdSPG I 170)
K05adsp55-u:3054: carati, kathaṃ dhyāneṣu apramaṇeṣu ārūpyasamāpattiṣu yāvat anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
K05adsp55-u:3055: carati. kathaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vimokṣamukheṣu carati. kathaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
K05adsp55-u:3056: carati caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśaṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K05adsp55-u:3057: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ carati. kathaṃ daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu carati. śrāvakapratyekabbuddhabhūmim
K05adsp55-u:3060: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayacāriṇī buddhiḥ. na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati. na dvayena śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp55-u:3062: na dvayena vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati. na dvayena samādhipāramitāyāṃ carati. na dvayena
K05adsp55-u:3063: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti
K05adsp55-u:3064: yāvat prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3065: yadi bhagavaṃ na dvayena [f. 258a] dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp55-u:3066: na dvayena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp55-u:3067: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhamānai prathamacittotpādam upādāya. yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair
K05adsp55-u:3070: na te vivardhante kuśalamūlaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3072: te na vivardhaṃte kuśalamūlaiḥ. bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar advayena carati,
K05adsp55-u:3073: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya kuśalamūlair vivardhate. yāvat paścimakaś cittotpāda kuśalamūlair vivardhate. tena (AdSPG I 171)
K05adsp55-u:3075: yair akuśalamūlair avamarditaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patet,
K05adsp55-u:3076: tad anyair vā akuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhṛyeta,
K05adsp55-u:3077: yaiḥ saṃhṛyamāno dānapāramitāyāṃ caran kuśalair mūlair na vivardheta,
K05adsp55-u:3078: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran kuśalamūlair na vivardheta. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3079: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kusalamūlānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ?
K05adsp55-u:3082: na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp55-u:3085: na aparipūrya kuśalamūlāni. na kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śaktaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3086: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ paryupāsya buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitrair parigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:3088: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
K05adsp55-u:3089: yac ca te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante,
K05adsp55-u:3091: tat sarvam udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya vācā suparicitaṃ kṛtvā manasā ca anuprekṣitaṃ kṛtvā
K05adsp55-u:3092: dṛṣṭyā supratividdhaṃ kṛtvā dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate. dhāraṇyāpratilabdhayā pratisaṃvida
K05adsp55-u:3094: tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇaśyati yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tatra ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlāny
K05adsp55-u:3095: yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyeṣv akṣaṇeṣu copapadyate. taiś ca kuśalaiḥ mūlaiḥ āśrayapariśuddhiṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05adsp55-u:3096: yair āśrayair buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K05adsp55-u:3097: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitrair na jātu virahito
K05adsp55-u:3098: bhavati buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya
K05adsp55-u:3099: varṇāṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3101: kuśalamūlāni ca avaropayitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni. ((65)) [f. 258b]
K05adsp55-u:3105: yaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naiva buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
K05adsp55-u:3108: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt?
K05adsp55-u:3110: nāsti subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo buddhāṃ bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny aparipūrya kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp55-u:3111: buddhān eva tāvat paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi. sevitvā ādy api
K05adsp55-u:3112: tāvat sarvākārajñatā na śakyate 'nuprāptuṃ. prāg eva aparyupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ
K05adsp55-u:3113: aparipūrya kuśalamūlāny asevitvā kalyāṇamitrāṇi sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti
K05adsp55-u:3114: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena satye bodhiṃ niṣṭhātukāmena,
K05adsp55-u:3115: kṣipraṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena buddhān bnagavataḥ paryupāsitavyā kuśalamūlāny avaropayitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni.
K05adsp55-u:3116: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ bodisattvo mahāsattvo buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitvā sarvākārajñatāṃ na anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:3119: so 'nenopāyo na śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt,
K05adsp55-u:3120: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na avaropitāni. (AdSPG I 174)
K05adsp55-u:3121: tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi na sevitāni. ye 'syopāyam upadiśanti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3122: katamad bhagavāṃs tad upāyakauśalaṃ yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp55-u:3124: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti,
K05adsp55-u:3125: buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyas pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo manuṣyabhūtebhyaḥ amanuṣyabhūtebhyaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:3126: sa taiḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair samanvāgato na ca asya dāne dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:3128: na dāyake dāyakasaṃjñā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3129: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān
K05adsp55-u:3130: anabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyati. dharmāṇāṃ ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcitsamarthāḥ
K05adsp55-u:3131: sarvadharmā ity asaṃskāralakṣaṇena avatarati. so 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgata kuśalamūlair vivardhate,
K05adsp55-u:3133: dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati. na
K05adsp55-u:3134: ca dānaphalam āśaṃsate yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjīta anyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai
K05adsp55-u:3138: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prathamacittotpādam
K05adsp55-u:3139: upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati. tasya naiva rāga
K05adsp55-u:3140: cittam āvṛnoti na doṣo na moho na anuśayā na paryutthānāni na anye 'py akuśalā dharmā
K05adsp55-u:3142: tadyathā mātsaryaṃ vā dauśīlyaṃ vā kṣobhaṇacittaṃ vā kausīdyacittaṃ vā hīna [f. 259a]
K05adsp55-u:3143: vīryacittaṃ vā vibhrāntacittaṃ vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā māno vā avamāno vā adhimāno
K05adsp55-u:3144: vāsmimāno vā. śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3145: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty,
K05adsp55-u:3146: asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati. dharmāṇāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3147: ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcitsamarthāt sarvadharmā ity asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇena avatarati.
K05adsp55-u:3148: so 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate. sa kuśalamūlair vivardhamānaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3149: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa śīlapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. buddhakṣetraṃ
K05adsp55-u:3150: ca pariśodhayati. na ca śīlaphalam ākāṇkṣate,
K05adsp55-u:3151: yac chīlaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjīta anyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai sattvaparipācanatāyai śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. ((67))
K05adsp55-u:3154: evaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā kartavyā. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:3155: mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair
K05adsp55-u:3156: manasikāraiḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati. tasya naiva rāga cittam āvṛṇoti,
K05adsp55-u:3157: na doṣo yāvan na śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3158: tathā hi sa subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān
K05adsp55-u:3159: anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati. dharmāṇāṃ ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcit
K05adsp55-u:3160: asamarthāḥ sarvadharmā ity asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇena avatarati. so 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgataḥ
K05adsp55-u:3161: kuśalamūlair vivardhate sa kuśalamūlair vivardhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. sa
K05adsp55-u:3163: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati. na ca prajñāphalam ākāṃkṣate yat prajñāphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai sattvaparimocanatāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. ((68))
K05adsp55-u:3166: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamadhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāvat caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K05adsp55-u:3168: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate. na ca vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3169: tathā hi sa upāyakauśalena samanvāgato yenopāyakauśalena tān dhyāna apramāṇaārūpyasamāpattīn
K05adsp55-u:3170: svalakṣaṇaśūnyān jānāti yāvad anabhinirvṛttān jānāti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp55-u:3171: mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya upāyakauśalena samanvāgato darśanabhāvanāprahātavye ca mārge carati,
K05adsp55-u:3172: na ca srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnoti na sakṛdāgāmīphalaṃ na anāgāmīphalaṃ na arhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3173: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāti yāvad anabhinirvṛttān jānāti. teṣu
K05adsp55-u:3174: ca bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu caraṃc chrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati. iyaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:3175: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti. punar aparaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:3176: 'bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aṣṭau vimokṣān samāpadyate navānupūrvasamāpattīn
K05adsp55-u:3177: samāpadyate na ca srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnoti yāvan na arhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat (AdSPG I 178)
K05adsp55-u:3179: tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān [f. 259b] jānāti yāvad anabhinirvṛttāṃ sarvadharmān
K05adsp55-u:3180: jānāti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu paricayaṃ karoti,
K05adsp55-u:3181: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3182: mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca paricayaṃ karoti. na ca tāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti yāvan
K05adsp55-u:3183: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati sattvāś ca paripācitā bhavanti. evaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:3185: paramabuddhimāṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati,
K05adsp55-u:3186: ya evaṃ gaṃbhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati na ca vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:3187: evam etat subhūte evam etat. paramabuddhimān bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya evaṃ gaṃbhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati,
K05adsp55-u:3188: na ca vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3189: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svabhāvato na calati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3192: abhāvān na calati. yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha:
K05adsp55-u:3195: vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya svabhāvān na calati,
K05adsp55-u:3198: kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā prajñāpāramitāyā svabhāvān na calati.
K05adsp55-u:3199: dhyānasvabhāvān na calaty apramāṇasvabhāvān na calaty ārūpyasamāpattisvabhāvān na
K05adsp55-u:3200: calati. smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvān na calati. yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya svabhāvān
K05adsp55-u:3201: na calati. śūnyatāsamādher ānimittasya samādher apraṇihitasya samādheḥ svabhāvān
K05adsp55-u:3203: na calati. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ svabhāvān na calati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3204: buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvān na calati. mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā svabhāvān na calati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3205: tathā hi subhūte ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ. na hi subhūte abhāvena abhāvaḥ śakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3206: kiṃ punar bhagavan bhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyam abhisaṃboddhuṃ?
K05adsp55-u:3218: tan mā haiva bhagavan na prāptir na abhisamayo bhaviṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:3219: yadi na abhāvena abhāvasya abhisamayo na bhāvena bhāvasya abhisamayaḥ na abhāvena bhāvasya abhisamayo na bhāvena abhāvasya abhisamayaḥ. bhagavān
K05adsp55-u:3221: na punar anena catuṣka abhinirhāreṇa. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3224: yatra naiva bhāvo na abhāvaḥ sa tādṛśo 'bhisamayaḥ yatraite prapaṃcā na saṃvidyante,
K05adsp55-u:3226: kaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3228: rūpaṃ nityam ity anityam iti vā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañca. vedanāsaṃjñasaṃṣkāravijñānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3229: nityam ity anityam iti vā prapañcaḥ. rūpaṃ sukham iti [f. 260a] vā duḥkham iti vā
K05adsp55-u:3230: prapañca. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vā prapañca. rūpam
K05adsp55-u:3231: ātmety anātmeti vā prapañca. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānam ātmety anātmeti (AdSPG I 180)
K05adsp55-u:3232: vā prapañca. rūpaṃ śāntam ity aśāntam iti vā prapañca. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3233: śāntam ity aśāntam iti vā prapañca. rūpaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañca.
K05adsp55-u:3235: parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañca. duḥkham āryasatyaṃ parijñeyam iti prapañca,
K05adsp55-u:3238: mārgo bhāvayitavya iti prapañcaḥ. catvāri dhyānāni bhāvayitavyāni iti prapañcaḥ catvāry
K05adsp55-u:3239: apramāṇāni bhāvayitavyāni iti prapañcaḥ catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayo bhāvayitavyā iti
K05adsp55-u:3240: prapañcaḥ. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3241: catvārariddhipādā bhāvayitavyā iti prapañcaḥ. evaṃ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny
K05adsp55-u:3242: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyā iti prapañcaḥ. śūnyatāvimokṣamukham ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukham
K05adsp55-u:3243: apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayitavyam iti prapañcaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo
K05adsp55-u:3245: śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmīphalam anāgāmīphalam arhattvaṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ.
K05adsp55-u:3246: pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ daśabodhisattvabhūmīn paripūrayiṣyāmi
K05adsp55-u:3247: iti prapañcaḥ bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3249: sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi iti prapañcaḥ. daśatathāgatabalāny utpādayisyāmi iti prapañcaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3250: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān utpādayiṣyāmi
K05adsp55-u:3251: iti prapañcaḥ. sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi iti prapañcaḥ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3252: prahāsyāmi iti prapañcaḥ. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K05adsp55-u:3253: rūpaṃ nityam ity anityam ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati (AdSPG I 181)
K05adsp55-u:3254: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ nityam ity anityam ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati ...
K05adsp55-u:3255: nnityam ity anityam ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati. yāvat sarvākārajñātām anuprāpsyāmi
K05adsp55-u:3256: ity aprapañcyan na prapañcayati. sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaṃ prahāsyāmi ity aprapañcyan
K05adsp55-u:3258: na hi svabhāvaḥ svabhāvaṃ prapañcayati. na abhāva abhāvaṃ prapañcayati. na ca svabhāva abhāvau sthāpayitvā anyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
K05adsp55-u:3259: yaḥ prapañcayed yena vā prapañcayed yatra vā prapañcayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte niṣprapañcyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3260: rūpaṃ. niṣprapañcyā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā niṣprapañcyaṃ vijñānaṃ. yāvan niṣprapañcyā
K05adsp55-u:3261: sarvākārajñatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena niṣprapañcyāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3262: caritavyaṃ. api tu khalu subhūte nāsti rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyā
K05adsp55-u:3263: saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ. yāvan nāsti sarvākārajñatāyā svabhāvaḥ. yasya
K05adsp55-u:3264: svabhāvo nāsti tad niṣprapañcyaṃ. [f. 260b] anena subhūte kāraṇena niṣprapañcyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3265: rūpaṃ niṣprapañcyā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā niṣprapañcyaṃ vijñānaṃ. yāvan niṣprapañcyā
K05adsp55-u:3266: sarvākārajñatā. evaṃ khalu suhhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K05adsp55-u:3268: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāva upalabhyate. katamena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati,
K05adsp55-u:3269: śrāvakamārgeṇa vā pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā buddharmārgeṇa vā?
K05adsp55-u:3271: na subhūte śrāvakamārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. na (AdSPG I 182)
K05adsp55-u:3272: pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa na buddhamārgeṇa. api tu khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3273: sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamakaḥ sarvamārgeṣu
K05adsp55-u:3274: śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāmati. na ca tāvat phalam anuprāpnoti yāvan na phalamārgam utpādayati,
K05adsp55-u:3275: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati.
K05adsp55-u:3276: na ca tāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. yāvan na vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ pratilabdho
K05adsp55-u:3277: bhavati. sa tasya samādheḥ pratilaṃbhād ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3278: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvanyāmo 'vakrāmitavyaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3279: nanu bhagavann anya eva aṣṭamakasya mārgaḥ anyaḥ srotaāpannasya anyaḥ sakṛdāgāmitāyai
K05adsp55-u:3280: pratipannakasya anyaḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anyo 'nāgāmitāyai pratipannakasya anyo 'nāgāminaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3281: anyo 'rhattvapratipannakasya anyo 'rhato mārgaḥ anyaḥ pratyekabuddhasya anyaḥ tathāgatasya
K05adsp55-u:3282: arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mārgaḥ. yadi bhagavann anya eṣāṃ mārgas,
K05adsp55-u:3283: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvanyāmo 'vakramitavyaḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3284: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3285: tan mā haiva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādya aṣṭamako bhaved,
K05adsp55-u:3288: bhāvanāmārgam utpādya sakṛdāgāmīpratipannako bhavet. sakṛdāgāmī bhaved anāgāmīpratipannako bhaved anāgāmī bhaved arhattvapratipannako bhaved (AdSPG I 183)
K05adsp55-u:3289: arhan bhavet pratyekabuddhamārgam utpādya pratyekabuddho bhaved,
K05adsp55-u:3290: asthānaṃ ca bhagavann anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamako bhūtvā bodhisattvanyāmam
K05adsp55-u:3291: avakrāmen nedaṃ stānaṃ vidyate yad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāman sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyān
K05adsp55-u:3292: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ śrotaāpattiphalam anuprāpya sakṛdāgāmīphalam anuprāpya
K05adsp55-u:3293: anāgāmīphalam anuprāpya arhattvam anuprāpya pratyekabodhim anuprāpya bodhisattvanyāmam
K05adsp55-u:3294: avakrāmet bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāman sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyān nedaṃ sthānaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3295: vidyate. tat kathaṃ bhagavan jānīyāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya
K05adsp55-u:3297: bodhisattvanyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. sarvavāsanānusandhiṃ ca prajahāti?
K05adsp55-u:3299: evam etat subhūte evam etat. asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp55-u:3300: 'ṣṭamako bhūtvā śrotaāpattiphalaṃ ca anuprāpyayāvad arhattvaṃ ca anuprāpya pratyekabodhiṃ
K05adsp55-u:3301: ca anuprāpya bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. bodhisattvanyāmam
K05adsp55-u:3302: anavakramya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyān nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. api tu khalu subhūte
K05adsp55-u:3303: [f. 261a] bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann
K05adsp55-u:3304: aṣṭau bhūmīñ jñānena ca darśanena ca atikrāmati. katamā aṣṭau?
K05adsp55-u:3305: śūklavidarśanabhūmi gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmi darśanabhūmis tanubhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ
K05adsp55-u:3306: kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ īdṛśaḥ sa imā aṣṭau bhūmīñ jñānena ca darśanena
K05adsp55-u:3307: ca atikramya mārgākārajñatayā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakramya
K05adsp55-u:3309: prajahāti. tatra subhūte. yad aṣṭamakasya jñānaṃ sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3310: yac chrotaāpannasya jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
K05adsp55-u:3311: yat sakṛdāgāmino jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ. yad
K05adsp55-u:3312: anāgāmino jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ. yad arhataḥ
K05adsp55-u:3313: jñānaṃ ca prahānaṃ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3314: yat pratyekabuddhasya jñānaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
K05adsp55-u:3315: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgān paripūrya mārgākārajñatājñānena
K05adsp55-u:3316: bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3317: prajahāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya anuttarāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3318: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ phalopājīvyo bhavati. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3323: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārgākārajñatāviśuddhir utpādayitavyā. tatreyaṃ subhūte mārgākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3324: yair yair ākārair yair yair liṅgair yair yair nimittair mārgaḥ sūcyate. tatra tān
K05adsp55-u:3325: ākārān tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena abhisaṃboddhavyāny
K05adsp55-u:3330: abhyudīrayitavyāḥ ādhārayitavyāḥ yādṛśais trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vijñāpayen
K05adsp55-u:3331: pratiśrutkā ājñānana arthena. tad anena api subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp55-u:3332: sarvamārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ mārgākārajñatāṃ paripūrya sattvānām āśayā jñātavyāḥ.
K05adsp55-u:3333: nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ mārgo jñātavyaḥ hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3334: tataś ca nairayikā mārgato nivārayitavyāḥ hetuto nivārayitavyā phalato nivārayitavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3335: tiryagyonikā mārgato nivārayitavyāḥ hetuto nivārayitavyā phalato nivārayitavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3336: yamalaukikā mārgato nivārayitavyāḥ hetuto nivārayitavyā phalato nivārayitavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3337: kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragānāṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ manuṣyānāṃ mārgo jñātavyaḥ hetur jñātavyaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3338: phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. brahmaṇānāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3339: mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavya phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. ābhāsvarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo
K05adsp55-u:3340: hetur jñātavya phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. śubhakṛtsnānāṃ vṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisattvānām avṛhāṇām
K05adsp55-u:3341: atapānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ [f. 261b] sudarśanānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur
K05adsp55-u:3342: jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3343: phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatananaṃ devānāṃ mārgo jnātavyo hetur
K05adsp55-u:3344: jnātavya phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni jñātavyāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
K05adsp55-u:3345: catvāri ṛddhipādā pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni jñātavyāni yāvac śūnyatāvimokṣamukham
K05adsp55-u:3348: vaiśāradyāni jñātavyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido jñātavyāḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
K05adsp55-u:3349: jñātavyāḥ mahāmaitrī jñātavyā mahākaruṇā jñātavyā. yaiś ca mārgair ye sattvā srotaāpattiphale
K05adsp55-u:3350: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tāṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati. yāvad ye 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās
K05adsp55-u:3351: tān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati. ye pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tāṃ pratyekabodhau
K05adsp55-u:3352: pratiṣṭhāpayati. ye bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. iyaṃ subhūte
K05adsp55-u:3353: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgākārajñatā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva śikṣitvā
K05adsp55-u:3354: sattvāśayatām avatarati. sattvāśayatām avatīrya. tathaiva dharmaṃ deśayati. sā ca
K05adsp55-u:3355: asya dharmadeśanā akṣūṇā amoghāś ca bhavati. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:3356: tathā hy anena pareṣām indriyāṇi prabhāvitāni bhavanti. sa sattvānāṃ gatiṃ cāgatiñ
K05adsp55-u:3357: ca cyutim upapattiṃ ca prajānāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3358: caritavyaṃ. atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvamārgā antargatā. ye kecid bodhipakṣikā dharmā
K05adsp55-u:3359: yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caritavyaṃ śrāvakair vā pratyekabuddhair vā caritavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3360: yadi bhagavan ye ca bodhipakṣikā dharmā yā ca bodhiḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā
K05adsp55-u:3361: na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā. kathaṃ bhagavaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3362: bodhipakṣikā dharmā bodher āhārakā bhavanti. na hi bhagavana na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3363: arūpiṇo 'nidarśano 'pratigho ekalakṣaṇo yadutālakṣaṇo dharma kasyacid dharmasya āhārako (AdSPG I 187)
K05adsp55-u:3364: vā apahārako vā. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan na ākāśaṃ kasyacid dharmasya āhārako vā apahārako vā,
K05adsp55-u:3365: evam eva bhagavan na svalakṣaṇaśūnyo dharmaḥ kasyacid dharmasya āhārako vā apahārako vā. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:3366: evam etat subhūte evam etan. na subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyo dharmaḥ kasyacid dharmasya
K05adsp55-u:3367: āhārako vā apahārako vā. ye punaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti
K05adsp55-u:3368: teṣām arthāyaivaṃ nirdiśyate. ime bodhipakṣikā dharmā bodher upanāyakā bhavanti iti.
K05adsp55-u:3369: api tu khalu punar subhūte yac ra rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā
K05adsp55-u:3370: yac ca vijñānaṃ yā ca dānapāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā ca
K05adsp55-u:3371: vīryapāramitā. yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ea prajñāpāramitā yā ca ādhyātmaśūnyatā yā
K05adsp55-u:3372: ca bahirddhāśūnyatā yāvad yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā yac ca prathamadhyānaṃ yā ca yāvan
K05adsp55-u:3373: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir ye ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yo ca yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgo
K05adsp55-u:3374: mārgo ye ca yāvat trivimokṣamukhāni ye [f. 262a] ca yāvad aṣṭau vimokṣā yāvan navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3375: ye ca yāvad daśatathāgatabalāni catvari vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā
K05adsp55-u:3376: buddhadharmā yā ca mahāmaitrī yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatā asminn
K05adsp55-u:3377: ārye dharmavinaye sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā
K05adsp55-u:3378: ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ. te ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tathāgatena sattvānām avataraṇārtham
K05adsp55-u:3379: evaṃ lokavyavahāreṇa vyāhṛtā na punaḥ paramārthena. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp55-u:3381: jñānena darśanena śikṣitvā kecid dharmāḥ prativeddhavyāḥ (AdSPG I 188)
K05adsp55-u:3382: kecid dharmā na prativeddhavyāḥ. katame dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena jñānena darśanena śikṣitvā prativeddhavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3383: katame dharmā jñānena darśanena śikṣitvā na prativeddhavyāḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3384: śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāḥ śikṣitvājñānena darśanena ca na prativeddhavyāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3385: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmā prativeddhavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āryadharmavinaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3386: āryo dharmavinayo āryo dharmavinaya iti bhagavann ucyate. kiyatā bhagavann āryo dharmavinaya ity ucyate?
K05adsp55-u:3388: iha subhūte śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3389: samyaksaṃbuddhā rāgeṇa na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ doṣeṇa na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ
K05adsp55-u:3390: mohena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ vicikitsayā
K05adsp55-u:3391: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ śīlavrataparāmarśena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ kāmarāgavyāpādena
K05adsp55-u:3392: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ rūparāgārūparāgeṇa na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ avidyayā
K05adsp55-u:3393: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ manauddhatyena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ prathamena dhyānena
K05adsp55-u:3394: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ yāvat caturthena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ maitryā
K05adsp55-u:3395: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ karuṇayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ muditayā na saṃyuktā
K05adsp55-u:3396: na visaṃyuktāḥ upekṣayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanena
K05adsp55-u:3397: na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair na saṃyukta na visaṃyuktāḥ
K05adsp55-u:3398: yāvan mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3400: saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ asaṃskṛtadhātunā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā iti. tena te āryā ity ucyante. teṣāṃ cāyaṃ dharmo vinayaś ca,
K05adsp55-u:3401: tasmād āryo dharmavinaya ity ucyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3402: tathā hi te sarvadharmā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ. te arūpiṇaḥ arūpiṇāḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3403: anidarśanā anidarśanena sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3404: apratighā apratighena sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3405: alakṣaṇā alakṣaṇena sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. iyaṃ subhūte arūpy anidarśanā
K05adsp55-u:3406: apratighā ekalakṣaṇā alakṣaṇā pāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ [f. 262b] mahāsattvānāṃ yatra
K05adsp55-u:3408: yo 'tra śikṣitvā na kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇam upalabhate. subhūtir āha:
K05adsp55-u:3410: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ. na cakṣurlakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na yāvat manolakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3412: na pṛthivīdhātor abdhātor tejodhātor vāyurdhātor ākāśadhātor vijñānadhātor lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3414: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyā lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3415: nādhyātmaśūnyatālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3416: na pratha madhyānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na caturthadhyānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3417: na maitryā lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na yāvan naivasāṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3418: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya lakṣaṇe (AdSPG I 190)
K05adsp55-u:3420: na śunyatā samādher nānimittasya samadher nāpraṇihitasya samādher laksane śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3421: na vimokṣāṇāṃ na anupūrvasamāpattīnāṃ lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3422: na daśabalānāṃ na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ ca catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3423: na mahāmaitryā na mahākaruṇāya lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na duḥkhāryasatyānāṃ lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3424: na samudayalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na nirodhalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na mārgalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ nāryalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ nānulomapratilomapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇe
K05adsp55-u:3425: na saṃskṛtadhātulakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na asaṃskṛtadhātulakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ. yadi bhagavann atrāpi dharmalakṣaṇeṣu na śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3426: kathaṃ bhagavann aśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmalaksaṇe saṃskāralakṣaṇe
K05adsp55-u:3431: dharmacakram apravartya kathaṃ sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyati,
K05adsp55-u:3432: śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahayānena vā?
K05adsp55-u:3434: yadi subhūte kasyacid dharmasya laksaṇaṃ bhavet tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tatra
K05adsp55-u:3435: lakṣaṇeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ alakṣaṇā arūpiṇo anidarśanā
K05adsp55-u:3436: apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā. tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena naiva lakṣaṇe
K05adsp55-u:3438: na hi pūrvam alakṣaṇā abhūvan paścāt salakṣaṇā bhūtāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3440: subhūte pūrvam apy ete dharmā etarhy apy alakṣaṇās tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena naiva lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3442: utpādād vā anutpadād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita evāyam alakṣaṇadhātur. [f. 263a] āha:
K05adsp55-u:3443: yadi bhagavann alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na vilakṣaṇas,
K05adsp55-u:3444: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitabhāvanā bhaviṣyati?
K05adsp55-u:3445: na ca bhagavann abhāvayitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakta śrāvākabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā atikramituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3446: anatikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na ca śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvanyāmo 'vakramituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3447: anavakramya bodhisattvanyāmaṃ na śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntim utpādayituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3448: anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir notpādya na śakyam abhijñā utpādayituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3449: bodhisattvo 'bhijñā anutpade na śakyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayituṃ sattvāṃś ca paripācayituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3450: buddhakṣetram apariśodhya sattvāṃś ca aparipācya na śakyaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3451: ananuprāpya sarvākārajñatāṃ na śakyaṃ dgarmacakraṃ pravartayituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3452: dharmacakram apravartya na śakyaṃ sattvāṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ
K05adsp55-u:3453: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3454: nāpi śakyaṃ sattvān dānamaye puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ na śīlamaye bhāvanāmaye puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ. bhagavān āha:
K05adsp55-u:3455: evam etat subhūte evam etat. alakṣaṇā subhūte sarvadharmā na vilakṣaṇāḥ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3456: ta katham alakṣaṇeṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati? bhagavān (AdSPG I 192)
K05adsp55-u:3457: āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vilakṣaṇā naivalakṣaṇā. alakṣaṇabhāvanā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3495: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ rūpavibhāvanābhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāvat kathaṃ sarvavāsanānusandhiprahānavibhāvanābhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
K05adsp55-u:3497: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati yāvad vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati. yāvat sarvākarajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati yāvat
K05adsp55-u:3498: sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ [f. 264a] bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp55-u:3500: nāsti śilapāramitābhāvanā kṣāntipāramitābhāvanā vīryapāramitābhāvanā dhyānapāramitābhāvanā nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvana. (AdSPG I 195)
K05adsp55-u:3501: nāsti bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanā. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:3502: tathā hi subhūte tasja bhāve saktasya dānena śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñāyām
K05adsp55-u:3503: eṣa saṃgaḥ. yas tathā saktas tasya nāsti mokṣaḥ. nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā,
K05adsp55-u:3505: na bodhyaṅgabhāvanā na mārgabhāvanā na śūnyatābhāvanā na animittabhāvanā na apraṇihitabhāvanā,
K05adsp55-u:3506: yāvan nāsti sarvākārajñatābhāvanā. tat kasya hetos?
K05adsp55-u:3507: tathā hi subhūte sa bhāve saktaḥ. evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:3518: rūpasaṃjñā yāvad dharmasaṃjñā yāvad buddhasaṃjñā bodhisaṃjñā saṃskṛtadhātusaṃjñā
K05adsp55-u:3519: asaṃskṛtadhātusaṃjñā yāvat subhūte sarvasaṃjñā yāvac ca asaṃjñā sarvam etad dvayaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:3522: yāvat saṃskāras tāvat sattvā na parimucyante jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ (AdSPG I 196)
K05adsp55-u:3523: tad anena api subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam:
K05adsp55-u:3524: nāsti dvayasaṃjñino dānaṃ nāsti śīlaṃ nāsti kṣāntir nāsti vīryaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prajñā,
K05adsp55-u:3525: nāsti mārgo nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayo,
K05adsp55-u:3527: kutaḥ punar rūpasya parijñā yāvad vijñānasya parijñā,
K05adsp55-u:3530: kutas tasya srotaāpattiphalaṃ kuto yāvad arhatvaṃ kutaḥ pratyekabodhiḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3535: yadi bhagavan bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ anulomiky api kṣāntir nāsti,
K05adsp55-u:3537: kiṃ punar abhāvasaṃjñinaḥ anulomikī kṣāntiḥ nāsti,
K05adsp55-u:3538: śuklavidarśanabhūmir vā gotrabhūmir vā aṣṭamakabhūmir vā darśanabhūmir vā tanubhūmir
K05adsp55-u:3539: vā vītarāgabhūmir vā kṛtāvībhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā bodhisattvabhūmir vā
K05adsp55-u:3540: buddhabhūmir vā. mārgabhāvanā vā yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān na prajahāti śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān
K05adsp55-u:3542: yaiḥ kleśair āvṛto bodhisattvanyāmaṃ na avakrāmet,
K05adsp55-u:3544: sarvākārajñatāṃ na anuprāpnuvan sarvavāsanānusandhikleśān na prajahīta?
K05adsp55-u:3545: yadi bhagavan nāsti kasyacid dharmasya utpadyamānasya utpādaḥ na ca anutpādya imān dharmāṃc chakyaṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ anuprāptuṃ?
K05adsp55-u:3547: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir asti yāvan nāsti sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaprahānaṃ. āha:
K05adsp55-u:3548: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā bhavaty abhāvasaṃjñā vā,
K05adsp55-u:3573: no hīdaṃ subhūte. na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kvacid
K05adsp55-u:3574: dharme bhāvasaṃjñī vā abhāvasaṃjñī vā bhavati. eṣaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K05adsp55-u:3575: ānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā na abhāvasaṃjñā. eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā
K05adsp55-u:3576: yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā na abhāvasaṃjñā. etad eva asya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā
K05adsp55-u:3577: na abhāvasaṃjñā. abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3578: abhāva eva abhisamayas. tad anena api te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam:
K05adsp55-u:3581: tat kathaṃ bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05adsp55-u:3583: anuprāptā? evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp55-u:3584: iha ahaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ,
K05adsp55-u:3586: viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
K05adsp55-u:3587: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvad caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharāmi. so 'haṃ
K05adsp55-u:3588: teṣān dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāñ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs,
K05adsp55-u:3591: dhyānāni nopalabhe. so 'haṃ tāni dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāni samāpadye,
K05adsp55-u:3592: so 'haṃ tāni dhyānāni vipākīkṛtvā vividhajñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
K05adsp55-u:3594: divyacakṣurjñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi. tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyāyāṃ nimittam
K05adsp55-u:3595: anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñabhir na manye na āsvādayāmi nopalabhe. so 'haṃ tāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ
K05adsp55-u:3596: ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye. so 'haṃ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā anuttarāṃ
K05adsp55-u:3601: so 'haṃ daśabhiḥ tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ
K05adsp55-u:3602: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā 'ṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs
K05adsp55-u:3604: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs [f. 265a] tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena abhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāni utpāditāni,
K05adsp55-u:3608: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānāṃ vā akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo 'bhaviṣyad bhāvo vābhaviṣyat para bhāvo vābhaviṣyan,
K05adsp55-u:3609: na ahaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān kāmān viditvā abhāvasvabhāvān
K05adsp55-u:3610: pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ. yasmāt tarhi
K05adsp55-u:3611: subhūte na kāmānāṃ pāpakānāṃ ca akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo 'sti na bhāvo na parabhāvaḥ
K05adsp55-u:3613: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
K05adsp55-u:3614: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ.
K05adsp55-u:3615: evaṃ yāvat caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ. sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ bhāvo
K05adsp55-u:3616: vā svabhāvo vā parabhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
K05adsp55-u:3617: na ahaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ na bhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvo 'sti,
K05adsp55-u:3619: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ.
